tika-s0304t:14_0: 1. Cakkhatīti cakkhu, ñāṇaṃ, yathāsabhāvato ārammaṇassa jānanena samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ
tika-s0304t:14_1: viya pavattatīti attho. Tathā maṃsacakkhu. Tampi hi rūpadassane cakkhatīti cakkhu.
tika-s0304t:14_2: Buddhānaṃyeva cakkhūti buddhacakkhu, asādhāraṇato hi sattasantānesu sassatucchedadiṭṭhi
tika-s0304t:14_4: āsayānusayañāṇaṃ indriyaparopariyattañāṇañca. Heṭṭhimā tayo maggā catusaccadhammesu
tika-s0304t:14_5: vuttākārena pavattiyā dhamme cakkhūti dhammacakkhu, tathā tesaṃ phalāni taṃtaṃpaṭipakkhesu
tika-s0304t:14_7: samantacakkhu, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. Dibbavihārasannissayena laddhabbato devānaṃ dibbacakkhu
tika-s0304t:14_8: viyāti taṃ dibbacakkhu, abhiññāviseso. Ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā rūpadassanato “ālokapharaṇenā”ti
tika-s0304t:14_9: vuttaṃ. “Idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ
tika-s0304t:15_0: Paccayabhūtehi etehi abhisambharīyantīti sambhārā, upatthambhabhūtā catusamuṭṭhānikarūpā.
tika-s0304t:15_1: Saha sambhārehīti sasambhāraṃ. Mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasīdatīti pasādo. Akkhikūpake
tika-s0304t:15_2: akkhipaṭalehīti ubhohi akkhidalehi. Sambhavoti āpodhātumeva sambhavabhūtamāha. Idha
tika-s0304t:15_3: “terasa sambhārā”ti vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pana saṇṭhānena saddhiṃ “cuddasa sambhārā”ti
tika-s0304t:15_4: āgataṃ. Tattha saṇṭhānanti vaṇṇāyatanameva parimaṇḍalādisaṇṭhānabhūtaṃ. Visuṃ vacanaṃ
tika-s0304t:15_5: pana nesaṃ tathābhūtānaṃ atathābhūtānañca āpodhātuvaṇṇāyatanānaṃ yathāvutte maṃsapiṇḍe
tika-s0304t:15_6: vijjamānattā. Sambhavassa catudhātunissitehi saha vuttassa dhātuttayanissitatā yojetabbā.
tika-s0304t:15_8: diṭṭhiyā pavattiṭṭhānabhūte maṇḍale. Sanniviṭṭhanti etena cakkhupasādassa anekakalāpagatabhāvo
tika-s0304t:15_9: dassito. Tathā hi so satta akkhipaṭalāni abhibyāpetvā vattati. Yasmā so satta akkhipaṭalāni
tika-s0304t:15_10: byāpetvā ṭhitehi attano nissayabhūtehi katūpakāraṃ taṃnissiteheva āyuvaṇṇādīhi anupālitaparivāritaṃ
tika-s0304t:15_11: tisantatirūpasamuṭṭhāpakehi utucittāhārehi upatthambhiyamānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati. Rūpadassanasamatthanti
tika-s0304t:15_12: attānaṃ nissāya pavattaviññāṇassa vasena rūpāyatanadassanasamatthaṃ. Vitthārakathāti
tika-s0304t:15_13: tassa cakkhuno sotādīnañca hetupaccayādivasena ceva lakkhaṇādivasena ca vitthārakathā.
tika-s0304t:16_0: Sammasanacāracittanti vipassanāya pavattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ vipassitabbaṃ cittaṃ. Keci
tika-s0304t:16_1: “vipassanupagatakiriyamayacitta”nti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ. Tīṇi lakkhaṇāni
tika-s0304t:16_2: dassetvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattassa pāpanavasena desanāya pavattattā.
tika-s0304t:19_0: 2-3. Dve lakkhaṇānīti dukkhānattalakkhaṇāni. Ekaṃ lakkhaṇanti anattalakkhaṇaṃ. Sesānīti
tika-s0304t:19_1: vuttāvasesāni lakkhaṇāni. Tehīti yehi dutiyatatiyāni suttāni desitāni, tehi. Sallakkhitānīti
tika-s0304t:19_2: sammadeva upadhāritāni. Ettakenāti dvinnaṃ ekasseva vā lakkhaṇassa kathanena.
tika-s0304t:22: 4-6. Vuttasadisovāti “dve lakkhaṇānī”tiādinā vuttasadiso eva. Nayoti atidesanayo.
tika-s0304t:25_0: 7-12. Sallakkhetvāti atītānāgatānaṃ avijjamānattā gāhassa daḷhatāya sallakkhetvā.
tika-s0304t:25_1: Paccuppannesu vijjamānattā balavatā taṇhādigāhena vipassanāvīthiṃ paṭipādetuṃ kilamantānaṃ vineyyānaṃ vasena.
tika-s0304t:30_0: 13-16. Dvīsupi suttesu āyatanānaṃ vasena desanā ekarasāvāti “paṭhamadutiyesū”ti ekajjhaṃ
tika-s0304t:30_1: paduddhāro kato. Āhito ahaṃmāno etthāti attā, attabhāvo. Attānamadhi ajjhattaṃ, tappariyāpannattā
tika-s0304t:30_2: tattha bhavāni ajjhattikāni, tesaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ. Ajjhattañca nāma ajjhattajjhattaṃ,
tika-s0304t:30_3: niyakajjhattaṃ, gocarajjhattaṃ, visayajjhattanti catubbidhaṃ. Tattha ajjhattajjhattaṃ
tika-s0304t:30_4: ajjhatte bhavanti ajjhattikanti āha “ajjhattajjhattavasena ajjhattikāna”nti. Tesaṃ
tika-s0304t:30_6: adhimattabalavatāyā”ti. Idāni tattha tamatthaṃ paṭiyoginā saddhiṃ udāharaṇavasena
tika-s0304t:30_7: dassento “manussānaṃ hī”tiādimāha. Taṃ uttānameva. Bāhirānīti ajjhattikato bahi bhavāni.
tika-s0304t:33_0: 17-18. Nikkhantāti lokato nikkhantā. Visaṃyuttā saṃyogahetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ pahīnattā
tika-s0304t:33_1: no saṃyuttā. No adhimuttāti na ussukkajātā. Vimariyādī…pe… cetasāti vigatakilesavaṭṭamariyādatāya
tika-s0304t:33_2: nimmariyādīkatena cittena. Catusaccameva kathitaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ assādādino kathitattā.
tika-s0304t:36: 19-22. Vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ abhinandanānaṃ uppādanirodhānañca vasena desanāya pavattattā. Anupubbakathāti ādito paṭṭhāya padatthavaṇṇanā. Nesanti suttānaṃ.
tika-s0304t:41_0: 23. Sabba-saddo pakaraṇavasena katthaci sappadesepi pavattatīti tato nivattanatthaṃ
tika-s0304t:41_1: anavasesavisayena sabba-saddena visesetvā vuttaṃ “sabbasabba”nti, sabbameva hutvā
tika-s0304t:41_2: sabbanti attho. Āyatanabhāvaṃ sabbaṃ āyatanasabbaṃ, sesadvayepi eseva nayo.
tika-s0304t:42_0: Tassa avisayābhāvato na addiṭṭhamidhatthi kiñcīti. Idhāti nipātamattaṃ, idha vā sadevake
tika-s0304t:42_1: loke, dassanabhūtena ñāṇena adiṭṭhaṃ nāma kiñci natthīti attho. Yadi evaṃ anumānavisayaṃ
tika-s0304t:42_2: nu kho kathanti āha “atho aviññāta”nti. Aññesaṃ apaccakkhampi aviññātaṃ tassa kiñci
tika-s0304t:42_3: natthīti adiṭṭhaṃ aviññātaṃ natthi. Paccuppannaṃ atītameva ñeyyaṃ gahitaṃ, anāgataṃ
tika-s0304t:42_4: nu kho kathanti āha – “ajānitabba”nti, tassa kiñci natthīti ānetvā sambandho. Jānituṃ
tika-s0304t:42_5: ñātuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ nāma tassa kiñci natthīti dassento āha “sabbaṃ abhiññāsī”tiādi.
tika-s0304t:43_0: Sakalassa sakkāyadhammassa pariggahitattā sakkāyasabbaṃ. Sabbadhammesūti pañcannaṃ
tika-s0304t:43_1: dvārānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtesu sabbesu dhammesu. Yasmā chasupi ārammaṇesu gahitesu padesasabbaṃ
tika-s0304t:43_2: nāma na hoti, tasmā “pañcārammaṇamatta”nti vuttaṃ. Padesasabbaṃ sakkāyasabbaṃ na
tika-s0304t:43_3: pāpuṇāti tassa tebhūmakadhammesu ekadesassa asaṅgaṇhanato. Sakkāyasabbaṃ āyatanasabbaṃ
tika-s0304t:43_4: na pāpuṇāti lokuttaradhammānaṃ asaṅgaṇhanato. Āyatanasabbaṃ sabbasabbaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0304t:43_5: Yasmā āyatanasabbena catubhūmakadhammāva pariggahitā, na lakkhaṇapaññattiyo, yasmā
tika-s0304t:43_6: sabbasabbaṃ dassentena buddhañāṇavisayo dassito, tasmā “sabbasabbaṃ na pāpuṇātī”ti
tika-s0304t:43_7: etthāpi “kasmā…pe… natthitāyā”ti sabbaṃ ñātārammaṇeneva pucchāvissajjanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0304t:44_0: Paṭikkhipitvāti “idaṃ sabbaṃ nāma na hotī”ti evaṃ paṭikkhipitvā. Tassāti “aññaṃ sabbaṃ
tika-s0304t:44_2: viya etassa vācāya kevalaṃ vattabbavatthukameva bhaveyya, na attho, vacanamattakamevāti
tika-s0304t:44_3: attho. Atikkamitvāti anāmasitvā aggahetvā. Taṃ kissa hetūti vighātāpajjanaṃ kena
tika-s0304t:44_4: hetunā. Yathā taṃ avisayasminti yathā aññopi koci avisaye vāyamanto, evanti attho.
tika-s0304t:44_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yasmā pāḷiyaṃ “taṃ kissa hetū”ti vuttakāraṇameva upanayanavasena
tika-s0304t:44_6: dassetuṃ “yathā ta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Kāraṇopanayanañca kāraṇamevāti “yathāti kāraṇavacana”nti
tika-s0304t:47_0: 24. Sabbassāti dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattassa. Pahānāyāti tappaṭibaddhachandarāgapahānavasena
tika-s0304t:47_2: paccayaṃ katvā, sahajātavedanāya cakkhusamphassapaccayabhāve vattabbameva natthi.
tika-s0304t:47_3: Eseva nayoti apadesena “sotasamphassaṃ mūlapaccayaṃ katvā”tiādinā vattabbanti dasseti.
tika-s0304t:47_4: Manoti bhavaṅgacittaṃ manodvārassa adhippetattā. Ārammaṇanti dhammārammaṇaṃ. Sahāvajjanakajavananti
tika-s0304t:47_6: sabbesveva cakkhudvārādīsu vuttittā tadanurūpato “bhavaṅgasahajāto samphasso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t:47_8: vedanāya gahaṇe vattabbameva natthi. Bhavaṅgato amocetvā bhavaṅgacittena saddhiṃyeva
tika-s0304t:47_9: āvajjanaṃ gahetvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yā panettha desanāti yā
tika-s0304t:47_10: ettha “pahānāyā”tiādinā pavattadesanā satthu anasiṭṭhi āṇā. Ayaṃ paṇṇatti nāma tassa
tika-s0304t:47_11: tassa atthassa pakārato ñāpanato. Ettha sabbaggahaṇena sabbe sabhāvadhammā gahitā,
tika-s0304t:47_12: paññatti pana katamāti vicāraṇāya taṃ dassetuṃ “yā panetthā”tiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0304t:50_0: 25. Abhiññāti abhiññāya. Ya-kāralopavasenāyaṃ niddeso “sayaṃ abhiññā”tiādīsu viya,
tika-s0304t:50_1: tathā “pariññā”ti etthāpi. Sabbanti āyatanasabbaṃ. Tañhi abhiññeyyaṃ. Abhijānitvāti
tika-s0304t:50_2: abhiññāya jānitvā. Parijānitvāti tīraṇapariññāya aniccādito parijānitvā. Pajahanatthāyāti
tika-s0304t:53: 26. “Abhijāna”ntiādinā ettha bhagavā paṭhamaṃ kaṇhapakkhaṃ dassetvā sukkapakkhaṃ dasseti veneyyajjhāsayavasena. Tenettha vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-s0304t:56_1: Idha anāpāthagataṃ “cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā”ti vuttattā. Heṭṭhā āpāthagatampi
tika-s0304t:56_2: anāpāthagatampi gahitameva “ye ca rūpā”ti anavasesato vuttattā. Te hi vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhā
tika-s0304t:56_3: saha cakkhuviññāṇena viññātabbattā. Tathā hi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ tehi ekuppādaṃ ekavatthukaṃ
tika-s0304t:56_4: ekanirodhaṃ ekārammaṇameva. Sesapadesūti sesesu “yañca sotaṃ ye ca saddā”tiādinā
tika-s0304t:56_5: āgatesu kaṇhapakkhe pañcasu, sukkapakkhe chasupi padesu. Eseva nayoti yvāyaṃ “heṭṭhā
tika-s0304t:56_6: gahitarūpameva gaṇhitvā”ti attho vutto. Eso eva tatthapi atthavaṇṇanānayo.
tika-s0304t:59_0: 28. Gayānāmikāya nadiyā avidūre pavatto gāmo gayā nāma, tassaṃ gayāyaṃ viharatīti
tika-s0304t:59_1: samīpatthe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Gayāgāmassa hi āsanne gayāsīsanāmake piṭṭhipāsāṇe
tika-s0304t:59_2: bhagavā tadā vihāsi. Tenāha “bhagavā tattha viharatī”ti.
tika-s0304t:60_0: Tatrāti “bhikkhū āmantesī”ti ye bhikkhū āmantesi, yathā cāyaṃ desanā tesaṃ sappāyā
tika-s0304t:60_1: jātā, tatra tasmiṃ atthadvaye vibhāvetabbe ayaṃ anupubbikathā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya
tika-s0304t:60_2: anupaṭipāṭikathā. Itoti imasmā kappato. Kirāti anussavanatthe nipāto. Pāramitāparibhāvanāya
tika-s0304t:60_3: paripākagate. Ñāṇeti bodhiñāṇe. Kaniṭṭhaputto vemātikabhātā bhagavato. Veḷubhittikuṭikāhi
tika-s0304t:61_0: Sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ. Puññacetanaṃ anto abbhantare paveseti. Bhagavāpi tassa puttoti
tika-s0304t:61_1: katvā “aññe tayo puttā”ti vuttaṃ. Avippakiritvāti parājayena avippakiriya apalāyitvā.
tika-s0304t:61_2: Pidahīti dātuṃ na sakkomīti tathā akāsi. Saccavāditāya gaṇhiṃsūti rājakulassa saccavāditāya
tika-s0304t:62_0: Vinivattitunti paṭiññāya nivattituṃ. Antarāti tumhehi paricchinnakālassa antarā eva
tika-s0304t:62_1: matā. Aṭṭhavīsatihatthaṭṭhānaṃ usabhaṃ nāma. Usabhe aṭṭhavīsatihatthappamāṇe ṭhāne.
tika-s0304t:63_0: Soti bhagavā. Tathārūpañhi buddhānaṃ desanāpāṭihāriyaṃ, yathā desanāya gahito attho
tika-s0304t:63_1: paccakkhato vibhūto hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Tenāha “imesaṃ…pe… desessāmī”ti. Sanniṭṭhānanti
tika-s0304t:63_3: padīpitaṃ ekādasahi aggīhi ekajālībhūtaṃ. Tenāha “sampajjalita”nti. Dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0304t:63_4: kathitaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ ekādasahi aggīhi ādittabhāvena dukkhamatāya dukkhassa kathitattā.
tika-s0304t:66: 29. Adhisaddena samānattho addhasaddoti āha “addhabhūtanti adhibhūta”ntiādi. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-s0304t:69_0: 30. Maññitaṃ nāma taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi gahetabbaṃ maññitaṃ. Sabbasmiṃ maññitanti sabbamaññitaṃ,
tika-s0304t:69_1: tassa samugghāto setughāto, tadāvahaṃ sabbamaññitasamugghātasāruppaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0304t:69_2: pana “maññitaṃ nāma cakkhādīsu eva uppajjati, nāññasmi”nti dutiyanayo vutto. Anucchavikanti
tika-s0304t:69_3: anurūpaṃ avilomaṃ. Idhāti idheva sāsane aññattha tadabhāvato. “Taṇhā-mānadiṭṭhimaññitāna”nti
tika-s0304t:69_4: vuttaṃ maññitattayaṃ saparasantānesu paṭipakkhavasena yojetvā dassetuṃ “cakkhuṃ ahanti
tika-s0304t:69_5: vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “cakkhuṃ aha”nti iminā ajjhattavisayaṃ diṭṭhimaññitañca dasseti
tika-s0304t:69_6: attābhinivesāhaṃkāradīpanato. “Mama”nti iminā taṇhāmaññitaṃ mānamaññitampi vā, pariggahamukhenapi
tika-s0304t:69_7: seyyādito mānuppajjanato. Sesapadadvayepi iminā nayena maññitavibhāgo veditabbo.
tika-s0304t:69_8: Ahanti attāva, so ca cakkhusmiṃ tadadhīnavuttittā “paro”ti na maññati. Mama kiñcanapalibodho
tika-s0304t:69_9: cakkhusmiṃ sati labbhanato, asati na maññati tathāmaññitassa paccayaghātato. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
tika-s0304t:70_0: Ahaṃ cakkhuto niggatoti “aha”nti vattabbo ayaṃ satto cakkhuto niggato tattha sukhumākārena
tika-s0304t:70_1: upalabbhanato. Mama kiñcanapalibodho cakkhuto niggato tasmiṃ sati eva upalabbhanato.
tika-s0304t:70_2: Sesadvayepi eseva nayo. Tattha paroti paro satto. Mama cakkhūti na maññati yassa
tika-s0304t:70_3: taṃ cakkhu, tassa “aha”nti vattabbasseva abhāvato. Mamattabhūtanti mama kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0304t:70_5: satta vārā cakkhudvāre, tathā sotadvārādīsūti cha sattakā dvecattālīsa. Puna sakkāyavasena
tika-s0304t:70_6: “sabbaṃ na maññatī”tiādinā vuttaṃ, tena tecattālīsa. Puna tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ “loko”ti
tika-s0304t:70_7: gahetvā “na kiñci loke upādiyatī”ti vuttaṃ, tena catucattālīsa honti. Evaṃ sabbathāpi
tika-s0304t:70_8: catucattālīsāya ṭhānesu arahattaṃ pāpetvā vipassanā kathitāti veditabbā. “Catucattālīsādhikasatesū”ti
tika-s0304t:70_9: kesuci potthakesu likhanti, sā ca pamādalekhā.
tika-s0304t:73_0: 31. Upakārabhūtā tadāvahattā. Tatoti maññitākārato. Tanti maññanāvatthuṃ. Aññenākārenāti
tika-s0304t:73_1: yathā maññati aniccādiākārato, aññena aniccādinā ākārena hoti. Aññathābhāvaṃ vipariṇāmanti
tika-s0304t:73_2: uppādavayatāya aññathābhāvaṃ jarāya maraṇena ca dvedhā vipariṇāmetabbaṃ. Taṃ upagamanena
tika-s0304t:73_3: aññathābhāvī, evaṃbhūto hutvāpi jīraṇabhijjanasabhāvesu. Bhavesu satto loko uparipi
tika-s0304t:73_4: bhavaṃyeva abhinandati. Heṭṭhā gahitameva saṅkaḍḍhitvāti “cakkhuṃ na maññatī”tiādinā
tika-s0304t:73_5: heṭṭhā gahitameva khandhadhātuāyatanāti khandhādipariyāyena ekato gahetvā punapi
tika-s0304t:73_6: maññanāvatthuṃ dasseti. Avasāne “tato taṃ hotī”ti vuttapadena saddhiṃ sabbavāresu
tika-s0304t:76_0: 32. Dassetvāti ettha lakkhaṇe ayaṃ tvā-saddo, hetumhi vā. Anādisattasantānagatagāhattayalakkhitā
tika-s0304t:76_1: hi satthu, tiparivaṭṭadesanā taṃnimittaṃ yāvadeva tappahānāya pavattitabhāvato. Arahattaṃ
tika-s0304t:76_2: pāpetvā vipassanā kathitāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “saha vipassanāya cattāropi maggā kathitā”ti.
tika-s0304t:80_1: jīraṇasabhāvaṃ. Yattha cakkhādayo, tattheva visabhāgasamuṭṭhānalakkhaṇena byādhino
tika-s0304t:83_0: 43-52. Ñātapariññā āgatā visayavasena tabbisayassa dhammassa jotitattā. Itarā dve
tika-s0304t:83_1: tīraṇapahānapariññāpi āgatā evāti veditabbā, tāsaṃ abhiññeyyadhammavisayattā ñāṇassa
tika-s0304t:83_2: ca tīraṇapahānapariññāsambhavato. Pariññeyyapade tīraṇapariññāva āgatā, pahātabbapade
tika-s0304t:83_3: pahānapariññāva āgatāti yojanā. Itarāpi dve gahitāyeva tāhi vinā atthasiddhiyā abhāvato.
tika-s0304t:83_4: Paccakkhaṃ kātabbaṃ ārammaṇato asammohato paṭivijjhanena. Avuttāpi gahitāyeva parijānanassa
tika-s0304t:83_5: yāvadeva pahānatthattā. Ekasabhāvena vinābhāvo anekaggaṭṭho. Upasaṭṭharogena viya
tika-s0304t:87_0: 53-62. Catūsu saccesu aññāṇaṃ tappaṭicchādakasammoho. Avindiyaṃ vindati, vindiyaṃ
tika-s0304t:87_1: na vindatīti katvā vijjāya paṭipakkhova avijjā. Vijjāya uppannāya anavasesato avijjā
tika-s0304t:87_2: pahīyati, taṃ dassento “vijjāti arahattamaggavijjā”ti āha. Na kevalaṃ aniccānupassanāvaseneva
tika-s0304t:87_3: maggavuṭṭhānaṃ, atha kho itarānupassanāvasenapīti dassento “dukkhā…pe… pahīyatiyevā”ti
tika-s0304t:87_4: āha. Sabbatthāti uparisuttante sandhāyāha. Tato aparepi taṃatthalakkhaṇavasena kathitasuttantepi.
tika-s0304t:91_1: Kamanīyāti kāmetabbā. Manaṃ appāyantīti manāpāti āha “manavaḍḍhanakā”ti. Piyāyitabbasabhāvā
tika-s0304t:91_2: piyarūpā. Kāmūpasaṃhitāti kāmapaṭisaṃyuttā. Ālambitabbatā eva cettha upasaṃhitatāti
tika-s0304t:91_3: “ārammaṇaṃ katvā”tiādimāha. Taṇhāsaṅkhātā nandī taṇhānandī, na tuṭṭhinandīyeva “nandiṃ
tika-s0304t:91_4: caratī”tiādīsu viya. Gāmantanti gāmasamīpaṃ. “Anupacāraṭṭhāna”nti vatvā taṃ dasseti “yatthā”tiādinā.
tika-s0304t:92: Etthāti yathānīhate pāṭhe. “Imaṃ ekaṃ pariyāyaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti vuttaṃ tassa “pantānī”tipadena saṅgahitattā. Appasaddāni appanigghosānīti ettha appa-saddo abhāvattho.
tika-s0304t:95: 68. Āyācanasuttato paṭṭhāyāti migajālavagge dutiyasuttato paṭṭhāya. Paṭhamasutte pana dutiyakavihārādibhāvo vuttoti.
tika-s0304t:98_0: 69. Gahetvāti pārupanassa sithilakaraṇena vīmaṃsato mocetvā. Leṇacchāyāyāti purimadisāya
tika-s0304t:98_1: leṇacchāyāyaṃ. Patitvāti leṇacchadanato bhassitvā. Phuṭṭhavisoti catūsu āsīvisesu
tika-s0304t:98_2: so phuṭṭhaviso. Tenāha “tasmā”tiādi. Pariyādiyamānamevāti khepentameva, vināsentamevāti
tika-s0304t:98_3: attho. Yathāparicchedenāti attano visaparicchedānurūpaṃ. Aññathābhāvanti vaḍḍhabhāvādipakatijahanaṃ.
tika-s0304t:101_0: 70. Rūpaṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ karoti ñātapariññāvasena. Rūparāganti nīlādibhede rūpadhamme
tika-s0304t:101_1: rāgaṃ. Paṭisaṃviditaṃ karoti “ayaṃ me rāgo appahīno”ti. Etena sekkhānaṃ paccavekkhaṇā
tika-s0304t:101_2: kathitā. Tena vuttaṃ “evampi kho, upavāṇa, sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hotī”tiādi. Rūparāgaṃ
tika-s0304t:101_3: paṭisaṃviditaṃ karoti “natthi me ajjhattaṃ rūpesu rāgo”ti pajānāti. Asekkhānaṃ hāyaṃ paccavekkhaṇā.
tika-s0304t:104_0: 71. Phassākarānanti channaṃ phassānaṃ ākarānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānānaṃ, cakkhādīnanti attho.
tika-s0304t:104_1: Naṭṭho nāma ahanti vadati, yo channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayādiṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti,
tika-s0304t:104_2: so vusitavā, itaro avusitavā ahañca tādisoti. Ayamevāti ayaṃ cakkhusmiṃ “netaṃ mamā”tiādinā
tika-s0304t:109: 73. Panassasanti ekaṃsena naṭṭhoti ayamettha atthoti āha “atinaṭṭho”ti, dhurato eva naṭṭhoti attho.
tika-s0304t:114: 74-78. Appaññātoti nāmagottato ceva sīlādiguṇehi ca appaññāto avissuto. Theramajjhimabhāvaṃ appattatāya navo.
tika-s0304t:117_0: 80. Aniccādivasena abhinivisanaṃ abhiniveso, so eva dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā parato
tika-s0304t:117_1: āmasanato parāmāso, so eva gāho. Tena abhinivesaparāmāsaggāhena gaṇhituṃ na yuttā
tika-s0304t:117_2: aniccādisabhāvattā. Saṅkhārā eva pavattiyā kāraṇabhāvato saṅkhāranimittāni. Yo saṅkhāresu
tika-s0304t:117_3: apariññātābhinivesena passitabbo attākāro, so na hotīti añño anattākāro, tato aññato
tika-s0304t:117_4: passati. Pariññātābhinivesoti tīraṇapariññāya paricchijja ñātamicchābhiniveso. Pariññātābhinivesoti
tika-s0304t:117_5: vā pariññātavipassanābhiniveso. Vipassanāti arūpasattakavasena vipassanāya parijānitabbā.
tika-s0304t:122_0: 83. Taṇhāya pahīnāya diṭṭhimānāpi pahīnā evāti “taṇhāpapañcassa chinnattā chinnapapañce”ti
tika-s0304t:122_1: vuttaṃ. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Idha sattavohāro cakkhādīsu vijjamānesu eva hoti,
tika-s0304t:122_2: tasmā parinibbutānañca vohāro cakkhādīsu sannissayeneva, nāññathāti atikkantabuddhehi
tika-s0304t:122_3: pariharitāni cakkhusotādīni pucchāmīti pucchati “atthi nu kho bhante”tiādinā. Cakkhusotādivaṭṭaṃ vaṭṭe pavatteyya.
tika-s0304t:127: 84. Aniccalakkhaṇameva kathitaṃ, tañca pariyāyena, aniccalakkhaṇe kathite itaralakkhaṇāni kathitāneva honti byabhicārabhāvato.
tika-s0304t:131: 86. Vuttanayeneva veditabbanti khandhiyavagge khandhavasena āgataṃ, idha āyatanavasenāti ayameva viseso.
tika-s0304t:133_0: 87. Sabbanimittehi paṭisallīyati etenāti paṭisallānaṃ, phalasamāpatti. Jīvitahārakasatthaṃ
tika-s0304t:133_1: jīvitassa haraṇato, sattānañca sasanato hiṃsanato. Paricaritoti payirupāsito. Tena
tika-s0304t:134_0: Anupavajjanti parehi na upavaditabbaṃ. Taṃ panettha āyatiṃ appaṭisandhibhāvato hotīti
tika-s0304t:134_1: āha “appavattika”nti. “Netaṃ mamā”tiādīni vadanto arahatte pakkhipitvā kathesi. Puthujjanabhāvameva
tika-s0304t:134_2: dīpento vadati akatakiccabhāvadīpanena. Kiñcāpi thero pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ arahatte pakkhipitvā
tika-s0304t:134_3: kathesi, “na samanupassāmī”ti pana vadanto kiñci nipphattiṃ na kathesi, tasmā “idampi
tika-s0304t:135_0: Kilesapassaddhīti kilesapariḷāhavūpasamo. Bhavatthāya puna bhavatthāya. Ālayanikanti
tika-s0304t:135_1: pariyuṭṭhāneti bhavantare apekkhāsaññite ālaye nikantiyā ca pariyuṭṭhānappattiyā.
tika-s0304t:135_2: Asati avijjamānāya. Paṭisandhivasena aññabhavato idhāgamanaṃ āgati nāma. Cutivasena
tika-s0304t:135_3: gamananti cavanavasena ito gati. Anurūpagamanaṃ gati nāma tadubhayaṃ na hoti. Cutūpapāto
tika-s0304t:135_4: aparāparabhavanavasena cuti, upapajjanavasena upapāto, tadubhayampi na hoti. Evaṃ
tika-s0304t:135_5: pana cutūpapāte asati nevidha na idha loke. Na huraṃ na paraloke hoti. Tato eva na
tika-s0304t:135_6: ubhayattha hoti. Ayameva anto ayaṃ idhaloke paraloke ca abhāvoyeva dukkhassa pariyosānaṃ.
tika-s0304t:135_7: Ayamevāti yathāvutto eva – ettha etasmiṃ pāṭhe paramparāgato pamāṇabhūto attho.
tika-s0304t:136_0: Ye panāti sammavādino sandhāya vadati. Antarābhavaṃ icchanti “evaṃ bhavena bhavantarasambandho
tika-s0304t:136_1: yujjeyyā”ti. Niratthakaṃ antarābhavassa nāma kassaci abhāvato. Cutikkhandhānantarañhi
tika-s0304t:136_3: Tattha bhāvoti atthitā. Abhidhamme kathāvatthuppakaraṇe paṭikkhittoyeva. Yadi evaṃ
tika-s0304t:136_4: “antarenā”ti idaṃ kathanti āha “antarenā”tiādi. Vikappato aññaṃ vikappantaraṃ, tassa
tika-s0304t:136_5: dīpanaṃ “antarenā”ti vacanaṃ. Na antarābhavadīpanaṃ tādisassa anupalabbhanato payojanābhāvato
tika-s0304t:136_6: ca. Yattha hi vipākaviññāṇassa paccayo, tatthassa nissayabhūtassa vatthussa sahabhāvīnañca
tika-s0304t:136_7: khandhānaṃ sambhavoti saddhiṃ attano nissayena viññāṇaṃ uppajjatevāti nāssa uppattiyā
tika-s0304t:136_8: desadūratā veditabbā. “Neva idha na hura”nti vuttadvayato aparaṃ vikappena “na ubhaya”nti,
tika-s0304t:136_9: tatthapi na hotiyevāti adhippāyo. “Antarenā”ti vā “vinā”ti iminā samānattho nipāto,
tika-s0304t:136_10: tasmā nevidha, na huraṃ, ubhayaṃ vināpi nevāti attho.
tika-s0304t:137_0: Āharīti chinnavasena gaṇhi. Tenāha “kaṇṭhanāḷaṃ chindī”ti. Pariggaṇhantoti sammasanto.
tika-s0304t:137_1: Parinibbuto dīgharattaṃ vipassanāyaṃ yuttapayuttabhāvato. “Anupavajjaṃ channena bhikkhunā
tika-s0304t:137_2: satthaṃ āharita”nti, kathesīti asekkhakāle byākaraṇaṃ viya katvā kathesi.
tika-s0304t:138_0: Imināti “upavajjakulānī”ti iminā vacanena. Theroti sāriputtatthero. Evanti evaṃ pubbakālesu
tika-s0304t:138_1: saṃsaṭṭhavihārī hutvā ṭhito pacchā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatīti āsaṅkanto pucchati. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0304t:141_0: 88-89. Tanti cakkhurūpadvayaṃ. Tenāha “cakkhuñceva rūpañcā”ti. Nandisamudayāti nandiyā
tika-s0304t:141_1: samudayataṇhāya sesakāraṇehi nandiyā samuditi samodhānaṃ nandisamudayo, tasmā nandisamudayā.
tika-s0304t:141_2: Tenāha “taṇhāya samodhānenā”ti. Pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātassa dukkhassa samodhānena samuditi
tika-s0304t:141_3: pavattiyevāti saha samudayena dukkhassa dassitattā “vaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t:141_4: Nirodhūpāyena saddhiṃ nirodhassa dassitattā “vivaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā”ti. Pucchānusandhiādīsu
tika-s0304t:142_0: Caṇḍāti kodhanā. Duṭṭhāti dosavantoti attho. Kibbisāti pāpā. Kakkhaḷāti dāruṇā. Ghaṭikamuggarenāti
tika-s0304t:142_1: ekasmiṃ pakkhe ghaṭikaṃ dassetvā katena rassadaṇḍena. Sattānaṃ sasanato satthaṃ,
tika-s0304t:142_2: tato eva jīvitassa haraṇato hārakañcāti satthahārakaṃ. Indriyasaṃvaro “damo”ti vutto
tika-s0304t:142_3: manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ damanato. Paññā “damo”ti vuttā kilesavisevitānaṃ damanato
tika-s0304t:142_4: vūpasamanato. Uposathakammaṃ “damo”ti vuttaṃ kāyadvārādīhi uppajjanakaasamassa damanato.
tika-s0304t:142_5: Khanti “damo”ti veditabbā akkhantiyā damanato vūpasamanato. Tenāha “upasamoti tasseva vevacana”nti.
tika-s0304t:143_0: Etthāti sunāparantajanapade. Ete dveti ayaṃ puṇṇatthero tassa kaniṭṭhoti ete dve
tika-s0304t:143_1: bhātaro. Āhacca aṭṭhāsi uḷāraṃ buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā. Satta sīhanāde naditvāti
tika-s0304t:143_3: leḍḍuppahārassa, daṇḍappahārassa, satthappahārassa, jīvitavoropanassa, khamane santosābhāvadīpanañcāti
tika-s0304t:143_4: evaṃ satta sīhanāde naditvā. Catūsu ṭhānesu vasitattā pāḷiyaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ anuddesikaṃ
tika-s0304t:144_0: Catūsu ṭhānesūti abbuhatthapabbate, samuddagirivihāre, mātulagirimhi, makuḷakārāmavihāreti
tika-s0304t:144_1: imesu catūsu ṭhānesu. Tanti caṅkamaṃ āruyha koci bhikkhu caṅkamituṃ samattho natthi
tika-s0304t:144_2: mahatā samuddaparissayena bhāvanāmanasikārassa anabhisambhuṇanato. Uppātikanti uppātakaraṃ
tika-s0304t:144_3: mahāsaṅkhobhaṃ uṭṭhapetvā. Sammukheti anilapadese. Paṭivedesunti pavedesuṃ.
tika-s0304t:145_0: Āraddhakālato paṭṭhāyāti maṇḍalamāḷassa kātuṃ pathavīmitakālato pabhuti. Saccabandhena
tika-s0304t:145_1: pañcasatāni paripūretuṃ “ekūnapañcasatāna”nti vuttaṃ. Gandhakuṭinti jetavanamahāvihāre mahāgandhakuṭiṃ.
tika-s0304t:146_1: Arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti pañcābhiññāparivāraṃ arahattaṃ adhigacchi. Tenāha “maggenevassa abhiññā āgatā”ti.
tika-s0304t:147_0: Tasmiṃ sannipatitā mahājanā keci sotāpannā, keci sakadāgāmino, keci anāgāmino, keci
tika-s0304t:147_1: arahanto ahesuṃ. Tatthāpi keci tevijjā, keci chaḷabhiññā, keci paṭisambhidappattā
tika-s0304t:147_2: ahesuṃ. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “mahājanassa bandhanamokkho jāto”ti. Ye pana tattha saraṇagamanapañcasīladasasīlasamādānena
tika-s0304t:147_3: laddhānuggahā, tesaṃ devatānañca vasena “mahantaṃ buddhakolāhalaṃ ahosī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t:148_0: Aruṇaṃ pana mahāgandhakuṭiyaṃyeva uṭṭhapesi devatānuggahatthañceva kulānudayāya ca.
tika-s0304t:148_1: Apāyamagge otārito “koci lokassa sajitā atthi, tassa vasena pavattisaṃhārā honti,
tika-s0304t:148_2: tenevāyaṃ pajā sanāthā hoti, taṃ yuñjati ca tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kamme”ti micchāgāhehi.
tika-s0304t:149: Chaṭṭhanti bāhiyasuttaṃ. Taṃ uttānameva heṭṭhā vuttanayattā.
tika-s0304t:152_0: 90-91. Ejati chaḷārammaṇanimittaṃ kampatīti ejā. Tenāha “calanaṭṭhenā”ti. Ābādhanaṭṭhena
tika-s0304t:152_1: pīḷanaṭṭhena. Anto dosanaṭṭhenāti antocitte eva padussanaṭṭhena. Nikantanaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0304t:152_2: chindanaṭṭhena. Heṭṭhā gahitamevāti heṭṭhā maññitasamugghātasāruppasutte āgatameva.
tika-s0304t:155_0: 92-93. Dvayanti dukaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ āmeḍitalopena niddesoti āha “dve dve koṭṭhāse”ti.
tika-s0304t:155_1: Evametanti evaṃ aniccādibhāvena etaṃ cakkhurūpañcāti dvayaṃ. Calatīti anavaṭṭhānena
tika-s0304t:155_2: pacalati. Byathatīti jarāya maraṇena ca pavedhati. Hetu ceva uppattinimittattā. Sahagatīti
tika-s0304t:155_3: sahappavatti, tāya gahetabbattā “saṅgatī”ti phasso vutto. Esa nayo sesapadadvayepi.
tika-s0304t:155_4: Yasmā ca saṃgacchamānadhammavimuttā saṅgati nāma natthi, tathā sannipātasamavāyā,
tika-s0304t:155_5: tesaṃ vasena nibbatto phasso tathā vuccatīti. Tenāha “iminā”tiādi.
tika-s0304t:156_0: Vatthūti cakkhu nissayapaccayādibhāvena. Ārammaṇanti rūpaṃ ārammaṇapaccayādibhāvena.
tika-s0304t:156_1: Sahajātā tayo khandhā vedanādayo, te sahajātādipaccayabhāvena. Ayaṃ hetūti ayaṃ tividho
tika-s0304t:156_2: hetū. Phassenātiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yasmā rūpārammaṇe phasse attano phusanakiccaṃ
tika-s0304t:156_3: karonte evaṃ vedanā anubhavanakiccaṃ, saññā sañjānanakiccaṃ karoti, tasmā “phassena
tika-s0304t:156_5: vuttaṃ. Pañceva khandhā bhagavatā samatiṃsāya ākārehi vuttā. Kasmāti āha “katha”ntiādi.
tika-s0304t:156_6: Rukkhasākhāsu rukkhavohāro viya ekekadhammepi khandhavohāro hotiyeva. Tenāha bhagavā
tika-s0304t:161_0: 94. Adamitāti damaṃ nibbisevanabhāvaṃ anītā. Agopitāti satisaṅkhātāya vatiyā na rakkhitā.
tika-s0304t:161_1: Apihitāti satikavāṭena na pihitā. Catūhipi padehi indriyānaṃ anāvaraṇamevāha. Adhikaṃ
tika-s0304t:161_2: vahantīti adhivāhā, dukkhassa adhivāhā dukkhādhivāhā. Nirayesu uppajjanakaṃ nerayikaṃ.
tika-s0304t:162: Saḷevāti cha-kārassa sa-kāro, ḷa-kāro padasandhikaro. Yatthāti nimittatthe bhummaṃ. Anavassutā atintāti rāgena atemitā.
tika-s0304t:163_0: Assāditanti assādaṃ itaṃ upagataṃ. Tenāha “assādavanta”nti. Sukhadukkhanti iṭṭhāniṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0304t:163_1: Anvayatīti anvayo, hetu. Phassoti anvayo etassāti phassanvayanti āha – “phassahetuka”nti.
tika-s0304t:164_1: hutvā”ti. Papañcasaññā etesaṃ atthīti papañcasaññā, itarītarā narā. Papañcayantāti
tika-s0304t:164_2: saṃsāre papañcaṃ cirāyanaṃ karontā. Saññinoti gehassitasaññāya saññāvanto. Manomayaṃ
tika-s0304t:164_3: vitakkanti kevalaṃ manasā sambhāvitaṃ micchāvitakkaṃ. Irīyatīti iriyaṃ paṭipattiṃ
tika-s0304t:165_0: Suṭṭhu bhāvitoti suṭṭhubhāvaṃ subhāvanaṃ ito bhāvitabhāvito. Phuṭṭhassa cittanti
tika-s0304t:165_1: tena yathāvuttaphassena phuṭṭhaṃ assa cittaṃ. Na vikampate kvacīti kismiñci iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇe
tika-s0304t:168: 95. Apasādetīti tajjeti. Ussādetīti ukkaṃseti. Ayaṃ kira thero mālukyaputto. Pamajjitvāti yonisomanasikārassa ananuyujjanena pamajjitvā.
tika-s0304t:169_0: Yatrāti paccattaṃ vacanālaṅkāre. Nāmāti asambhāvane apasādanapakkhe, ussādanapakkhe
tika-s0304t:169_1: pana sambhāvane. Kiṃ jātanti kiṃ tena mahallakabhāvena jātanti mahallakabhāvaṃ tiṇāyapi
tika-s0304t:169_2: amaññamāno vadati. Tenāha “yadi…pe… anuggaṇhanto”ti. Anuggaṇhantoti acintento. Mādisānaṃ
tika-s0304t:169_3: bhagavato ovādo upakārāvahoti etarahi ovādañca pasaṃsanto.
tika-s0304t:170_1: na honti, evamitaresupi pariññātesū”ti nayapaṭipajjanatthaṃ, tesampi imehi samānetabbattā.
tika-s0304t:171_0: Cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattanti cakkhuviññāṇassa rūpāyatanaṃ yattako gahaṇākāro,
tika-s0304t:171_1: tattakaṃ. Kittakaṃ pamāṇanti attasaṃvediyaṃ parassa na disitabbaṃ, kappanāmattaṃ
tika-s0304t:171_2: rūpaṃ. Tenāha “cakkhuviññāṇaṃ hī”tiādi. Rūpeti rūpāyatane. Rūpamattamevāti nīlādibhedaṃ
tika-s0304t:171_3: rūpāyatanamattaṃ, na nīlādi. Visesanivattanattho hi ayaṃ matta-saddo. Yadi evaṃ,
tika-s0304t:171_4: eva-kāro kimatthiyo? Cakkhuviññāṇañhi rūpāyatane labbhamānampi nīlādivisesaṃ “idaṃ
tika-s0304t:171_5: nīlaṃ nāma, idaṃ pītaṃ nāmā”ti na gaṇhāti. Kuto niccāniccādisabhāvatthanti saṃhitassapi
tika-s0304t:171_6: nivattanatthaṃ evakāraggahaṇaṃ. Tenāha “na niccādisabhāva”nti. Sesaviññāṇehipīti javanaviññāṇehipi.
tika-s0304t:172_0: Diṭṭhaṃ nāma cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpāyatanassa dassananti katvā. Tenāha “rūpe rūpavijānana”nti.
tika-s0304t:172_1: Cakkhuviññāṇamattamevāti yattakaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpāyatane gahaṇamattaṃ, taṃmattameva
tika-s0304t:172_2: me sabbaṃ cittaṃ bhavissatīti attho. “Rāgādirahenā”ti vā pāṭho. Diṭṭhaṃ nāma padatthato
tika-s0304t:172_3: cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ. Tatthevāti cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭhamatte rūpe. Cittattayaṃ
tika-s0304t:172_4: diṭṭhamattaṃ nāma cakkhuviññāṇaṃ viya rāgādivirahena pavattanato. Tenāha “yathā ta”nti ādi.
tika-s0304t:173: Manodvārāvajjanena viññātārammaṇaṃ viññātanti adhippetaṃ rāgādivirahena viññeyyato. Tenāha “yathā āvajjanenā”tiādi.
tika-s0304t:174_0: Tadāti tasmiṃ kāle, na tato paṭṭhāyāti ayamettha atthoti dasseti. “Diṭṭhamatta”ntiādinā
tika-s0304t:174_1: yesaṃ rāgādīnaṃ nivattanaṃ adhippetaṃ, te “tenā”ti ettha ta-saddena paccāmasīyantīti
tika-s0304t:174_2: “tena rāgena vā ratto”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti visaye bhummaṃ, visayabhāvo ca visayinā
tika-s0304t:175: Satīti rūpassa yathāsabhāvasallakkhaṇā sati muṭṭhā piyanimittamanasikārena anuppajjanato na dissati nappavattati. Ajjhosāti ajjhosāya. Gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā attaniyakaraṇena.
tika-s0304t:176_0: Abhijjhā ca vihesā cāti karaṇatthe paccattavacananti āha – “abhijjhāya ca vihesāya
tika-s0304t:176_1: cā”ti. Atthavasena vibhattipariṇāmoti āha – “abhijjhāvihesāhī”ti. Ācinantassāti vaḍḍhentassa.
tika-s0304t:176_2: Paṭissatoti patissato sabbattha satiyā yutto. Sevato cāpīti ettha ca-saddo api-saddo
tika-s0304t:179_1: nibbisevanabhāvākārena. Sarasaṅkappāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ visaye anavaṭṭhitabhāvena saṅkappā.
tika-s0304t:179_2: Saṃyojaniyāti saṃyojetabbā. Saṃyojanānañhi punappunaṃ uppattiyā okāsaṃ dento kilesajātaṃ
tika-s0304t:179_3: adhivāseti nāma. Kileso eva kilesajātaṃ. Ārammaṇaṃ pana citte karonto adhivāseti
tika-s0304t:179_4: nāma. Chandarāgappahānena na pajahati ārammaṇaṃ, kilesaṃ pana anuppattidhammatāpādanena
tika-s0304t:179_5: eva. Abhibhavitaṃ āyatananti kathitaṃ adhivāsanādinā. “Kathañca, bhikkhave, parihānadhammo
tika-s0304t:179_6: hotī”ti dhammaṃ pucchitvā taṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā “tañce bhikkhu adhivāsetī”tiādinā
tika-s0304t:182_0: 97. Na pidahitvā cakkhundriyaṃ na pidahitvā sañchāditvā ṭhitassa. Byāsiñcatīti kilesehi
tika-s0304t:182_1: visesena āsiñcati. Kilesatintanti kilesehi avassutaṃ. Dubbalapīti taruṇā na balappattā.
tika-s0304t:182_2: Balavapīti ubbegā pharaṇappattā ca pīti. Darathappassaddhīti kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā
tika-s0304t:182_3: passaddhi. Na uppajjanti paccayaparamparāya asiddhattā. “Kathañca, bhikkhave, pamādavihārī
tika-s0304t:182_4: hotī”tiādinā puggalaṃ pucchitvā “pāmojjaṃ na hoti, pāmojjaṃ jāyatī”tiādinā ca, dhammena
tika-s0304t:185_0: 98. Idanti “kathañca, bhikkhave, asaṃvaro”ti? Idaṃ vacanaṃ. Pahātabbadhammakkhānavasenāti
tika-s0304t:185_1: pahātabbadhammasseva kathanaṃ vuttaṃ. “Kathañca, bhikkhave, asaṃvaro hotī”ti dhammaṃ
tika-s0304t:185_2: pucchitvā “santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā”tiādinā dhammova vibhatto.
tika-s0304t:188: 99. Cittekaggatāyāti samathavasena cittekaggatāya. Parihāyamāneti tassa alābhena parihāyamāne. Kammaṭṭhānanti vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ, samathameva vā.
tika-s0304t:192: 101-102. Upamaṃ parivāretvāti upamaṃ pariharitvā. Suddhikavasenāti upamāya vinā kevalameva.
tika-s0304t:194_0: 103. Udakoti tassa nāmaṃ. Vedaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Sabbaṃ jitavāti sabbaji. Avakhatanti nikhataṃ.
tika-s0304t:200_0: 104. Catūhi yogehīti kāmayogādīhi catūhi yogehi. Kheminoti khemavato kusalino. Kāraṇabhūtanti
tika-s0304t:200_1: kattabbaupāyassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ. Pariyāyati pavattiṃ nivattiñca ñāpetīti pariyāyo,
tika-s0304t:200_2: dhammo ca so pariyattidhammattā pariyāyo cāti dhammapariyāyo, taṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ.
tika-s0304t:200_3: Yasmā pana so tassādhigamassa kāraṇaṃ hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “dhammakāraṇa”nti. Yuttinti
tika-s0304t:200_4: samathavipassanādhammānīti vā catusaccadhammānīti vā. “Tasmā”ti padaṃ uddharitvā
tika-s0304t:200_5: – “kasmā”ti kāraṇaṃ pucchanto “kiṃ akkhātattā, udāhu pahīnattā”ti vibhajitvā pucchi.
tika-s0304t:200_6: Yasmā pana chandarāgappahānaṃ yogakkhemibhāvassa kāraṇaṃ, na kathanaṃ, tasmā “pahīnattā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t:203_1: sukhaṃ dukkha”nti vuttattā vimuttisukhassa ca saḷāyatanadukkhassa ca kathitattā vivaṭṭasukhaṃ
tika-s0304t:203_2: cettha kathitamevāti sakkā viññātuṃ. Kāmaṃ khandhiyavagge khandhavasena desanā āgatā,
tika-s0304t:203_3: na āyatanavasena. Ettha pana vattabbaṃ atthajātaṃ khandhiyavagge vuttanayamevāti.
tika-s0304t:208_0: 114-115. Āvasati ettha kilesamāroti āvāso. Kāmaguṇaajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni.
tika-s0304t:208_1: Kilesamārassa āvāsaṃ gato vasaṃ gato. Tividhassāti papañcasaññāsaṅkhātassa tividhassapi
tika-s0304t:208_2: mārassa. Tato eva devaputtamārassapi vasaṃ gatoti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-s0304t:211_0: 116. Lokiyanti ettha sattakāyabhūtagāmādīti loko, cakkavāḷo. Saṅkhāro pana lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena
tika-s0304t:211_1: loko. Antanti osānaṃ. Sabbaññutaññāṇena saṃsanditvāti sabbaññutaññāṇagatiyā samānetvā
tika-s0304t:212_0: Evaṃsampattikanti evaṃsampajjanakaṃ evaṃpassitabbaṃ idaṃ mama ajjhesanaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0304t:212_1: “īdisanti attho”ti. Jānaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitabbaṃ jānāti eva. Na hi
tika-s0304t:212_2: padesaññāṇe ṭhito jānitabbaṃ sabbaṃ jānāti. Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena hi avisesaggahaṇena
tika-s0304t:212_3: ca “jāna”nti iminā niravasesaṃ ñeyyajātaṃ pariggayhatīti tabbisayāya jānanakiriyāya
tika-s0304t:212_4: sabbaññutaññāṇameva karaṇaṃ bhavituṃ yuttaṃ. Pakaraṇavasena “bhagavā”ti padasannidhānena
tika-s0304t:212_6: ñāṇacakkhūhi passitabbaṃ passati eva. Atha vā jānaṃ jānātīti yathā aññe savipallāsā
tika-s0304t:212_7: kāmarūpapariññāvādino jānantāpi vipallāsavasena jānanti, na evaṃ bhagavā. Bhagavā
tika-s0304t:212_8: pana pahīnavipallāsattā jānanto jānāti eva, diṭṭhidassanassa abhāvā passanto passati evāti attho.
tika-s0304t:213_0: Dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhenāti yathā cakkhu sattānaṃ dassanatthaṃ pariṇeti sādheti, evaṃ
tika-s0304t:213_2: vā sayambhūñāṇena paññācakkhuṃ bhūto pattoti vā cakkhubhūto. Ñāṇabhūtoti etassa ca
tika-s0304t:213_3: evameva attho daṭṭhabbo. Dhammā vā bodhipakkhiyā, tehi uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanato
tika-s0304t:213_4: anaññasādhāraṇaṃ vā dhammaṃ patto adhigatoti dhammabhūto. “Brahmā”vuccati seṭṭhaṭṭhena
tika-s0304t:213_5: maggañāṇaṃ, tena uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanato tañca sayambhūñāṇena pattoti
tika-s0304t:213_6: brahmabhūto. Catusaccadhammaṃ vadatīti vattā. Ciraṃ saccapaṭivedhaṃ pavattento vadatīti
tika-s0304t:213_7: pavattā. Atthaṃ nīharitvāti dukkhādiatthaṃ uddharitvā. Paramatthaṃ vā nibbānaṃ pāpayitā.
tika-s0304t:213_8: Amatasacchikiriyaṃ sattesu uppādento amataṃ dadātīti amatassa dātā. Bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ
tika-s0304t:213_9: tadāyattabhāvato dhammassāmī. Punappunaṃ yācāpento bhāriyaṃ karonto garuṃ karoti
tika-s0304t:214_0: Cakkhunā vijjamānena lokasaññī hoti, na tasmiṃ asati. Na hi ajjhattikāyatanavirahena
tika-s0304t:214_1: lokasamaññā atthi. Tenāha “cakkhuñhi loko”tiādi. Appahīnadiṭṭhīti asamūhatasakkāyadiṭṭhiko
tika-s0304t:214_2: ghanavinibbhogaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto samudāyaṃ viya avayavaṃ “loko”ti sañjānāti ceva
tika-s0304t:214_3: maññati ca. Tathāti iminā “lokoti sañjānāti ceva maññati cā”ti padattayaṃ ākaḍḍhati.
tika-s0304t:214_4: Tassāti puthujjanassa, cakkavāḷalokassa vā. Cakkhādimeva hi sahokāsena “cakkavāḷo”ti
tika-s0304t:214_5: puthujjano sañjānāti. Gamanenāti padasā gamanena. Na sakkā tesaṃ anantattā. Lujjanaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0304t:214_6: abhisaṅkhāralokavasena lokassa antaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tassa anto nāma nibbānaṃ. Taṃ
tika-s0304t:214_7: pattuṃ sakkā sammāpaṭipattiyā pattabbattā. Cakkavāḷalokassa pana anto nāma, natthi
tika-s0304t:215_0: Imehi padehīti imehi vākyavibhāgehi padehi. Tāni pana akkharasamudāyalakkhaṇānīti
tika-s0304t:215_1: āha “akkharasampiṇḍanehī”ti. Pāṭiyekkaakkharehīti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pade paṭiniyatasannivesehi
tika-s0304t:215_2: visuṃ visuṃ cittena gayhamānehi akkharehīti attho.
tika-s0304t:216_0: Gamanaṭṭhena “paṇḍā” vuccati paññā, tāya ito gato pattoti paṇḍito, paññavā. Mahāpaññatā
tika-s0304t:216_1: nāma paṭisambhidāvasena veditabbāti āha “mahante atthe”tiādi. Yathā tanti ettha tanti
tika-s0304t:216_2: nipātamattaṃ paṭhamavikappe, dutiyavikappe pana paccāmasananti āha “taṃ byākata”nti.
tika-s0304t:219_0: 117. Cetasoti karaṇe sāmivacanaṃ. Cittena saṃphusanaṃ nāma anubhavoti āha “cittena
tika-s0304t:219_1: anubhūtapubbā”ti. Ututtayānurūpatāvasena pāsādattayaṃ, taṃ vasena tividhanāṭakabhedo.
tika-s0304t:219_2: Manorammatāmattena kāmaguṇaṃ katvā dassitaṃ, na kāmavasena. Na hi abhinikkhamanato
tika-s0304t:219_3: uddhaṃ bodhisattassa kāmavitakkā bhūtapubbā. Tenāha māro pāpimā –
tika-s0304t:222_0: Metteyyo nāmātiādi anāgatārammaṇadassanamattaṃ, na bodhisattassa evaṃ uppajjatīti.
tika-s0304t:222_1: Attā piyāyitabbarūpo etassāti attarūpo, uttarapade purimapadalopenāti “attano hitakāmajātikenā”ti
tika-s0304t:222_2: attho vutto. Attarūpenāti vā pītisomanassehi gahitasabhāvena tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhena udaggudaggena.
tika-s0304t:222_3: Appamādoti appamajjanaṃ kusaladhammesu akhaṇḍakāritāti āha “sātaccakiriyā”ti. Avossaggoti
tika-s0304t:222_4: cittassa kāmaguṇesu avossajjanaṃ pakkhandituṃ appadānaṃ. Purimo vikappo kusalānaṃ
tika-s0304t:222_5: dhammānaṃ karaṇavasena dassito, pacchimo akusalānaṃ akaraṇavasena. Dve dhammāti appamādo
tika-s0304t:222_6: satīti dve dhammā. Appamādo sati ca tathā pavattā cattāro kusaladhammakkhandhā veditabbā.
tika-s0304t:223_0: Tasmiṃ āyataneti tasmiṃ nibbānasaññite kāraṇe paṭivedhe. Taṃ kāraṇanti channaṃ āyatanānaṃ
tika-s0304t:223_1: kāraṇaṃ. Saḷāyatanaṃ nirujjhati etthāti saḷāyatananirodho vuccati nibbānaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0304t:226_0: 118-119. Diṭṭheti paccakkhabhūte. Dhammeti upādānakkhandhadhamme. Tattha hi attāti
tika-s0304t:226_1: bhavati saññā diṭṭhi cāti attabhāvasaññā. Tenāha – “diṭṭheva dhammeti imasmiṃyeva
tika-s0304t:226_2: attabhāve”ti. “Tannissita”nti ettha taṃ-saddena heṭṭhā abhinandanādipariyāyena vuttā
tika-s0304t:226_3: taṇhā paccāmaṭṭhāti āha – “taṇhānissita”nti. Taṃ upādānaṃ etassāti tadupādānaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0304t:226_4: – “taṃgahaṇa”ntiādi. Taṇhupādānasaṅkhātaṃ gahaṇaṃ etassāti taṃgahaṇaṃ. Chaṭṭhaṃ uttānameva
tika-s0304t:229: 120. Ghaṭessatīti pubbenāparaṃ ghaṭitaṃ sambandhaṃ karissati. Vicchedanti brahmacariyassa virodhipaccayasamuppattiyā ucchedaṃ.
tika-s0304t:231_0: 121. Ye dhammā sammadeva bhāvitā bahulīkatā vimuttiyā arahattassa sacchikiriyāya
tika-s0304t:231_1: saṃvattanti, te saddhādayo sambhārā vimuttiparipācaniyāti adhippetā. Paripācentīti
tika-s0304t:231_2: paripākaṃ pariṇāmaṃ gamenti. Dhammāti kāraṇabhūtā dhammā. Visuddhikāraṇavasenāti
tika-s0304t:231_3: visuddhikāraṇatāvasena, sā pana saddhindriyādīnaṃ kāraṇato visuddhi. Yathā nāma jātisampannassa
tika-s0304t:231_4: khattiyakumārassa vipakkhavigamena pakkhasaṅgahena pavattiṭṭhānasampattiyā ca parisuddhi
tika-s0304t:232_0: Assaddhādayopi puggalā saddhādīnaṃ yāvadeva parihānāya honti, saddhādayo pāripūriyāva,
tika-s0304t:232_2: Sammappadhāneti sammappadhānasuttante. Satipaṭṭhāneti cattāro satipaṭṭhāne. Jhānavimokkheti
tika-s0304t:232_3: jhānāni ceva vimokkhe ca uddissa pavattasuttante. Gambhīrañāṇacariyeti khandhāyatanadhātupaṭiccasamuppādapaṭisaṃyuttasuttante.
tika-s0304t:233_0: Kalyāṇamittatādayoti kalyāṇamittatā sīlasaṃvaro abhisallekhakathā vīriyārambho nibbedhikapaññāti
tika-s0304t:233_1: ime kalyāṇamittādayo pañca dhammā, ye “idha, meghiya, bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto hotī”tiādinā
tika-s0304t:233_2: udāne kathitā. Lokaṃ volokentassāti āyasmato rāhulassa tāsañca devatānaṃ indriyaparipākaṃ
tika-s0304t:233_3: passantassa. Tato yena andhavanaṃ, tattha divāvihārāya mahāsamāgamo bhavissatīti.
tika-s0304t:233_4: Tathā hi vakkhati “ettakāti gaṇanāvasena paricchedo natthī”ti.
tika-s0304t:234: Rukkhapabbatanissitā bhūmaṭṭhakā, ākāsacārivimānavāsino antalikkhaṭṭhakā. Dhammacakkhunti veditabbāni catusaccadhammānaṃ dassanaṭṭhena.
tika-s0304t:239: 124-126. Dvīsūti imasmiṃ gahapativagge paṭhamadutiyesu tatiye ca vuttatthameva pāṭhajātaṃ apubbaṃ natthīti attho.
tika-s0304t:241_0: 127-128. Kāmaṃ aññepi pabbajitā yuttakāle piṇḍaṃ ulamānā carantiyeva, ayaṃ pana odarito,
tika-s0304t:241_1: teneva kāraṇena pabbajitoti dassento “piṇḍaṃ ulamāno”tiādimāha. Ghaṃsantovāti bhūmiyaṃ
tika-s0304t:241_2: ghaṃsanto eva pattaṃ ṭhapeti. Parikkhīṇanti samantato parikkhīṇaṃ. Nāḷiko …pe… jātaṃ,
tika-s0304t:241_3: atirekapattaṭṭhapanassa paṭikkhittattā aññaṃ na gaṇhāti. “Indriyabhāvananti cakkhādipañcindriyabhāvana”nti
tika-s0304t:241_4: keci vadanti, tathā vipassanābhinivesaṃ katvā uparivipassanaṃ vaḍḍhitvāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0304t:241_5: Apare pana “saddhāpañcamānaṃ indriyānaṃ vasena vipassanābhinivesaṃ katvā tena sukhena
tika-s0304t:242_0: Upasaṅkamatīti ettha yathā so rājā upasaṅkami, taṃ āgamanato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ “thero
tika-s0304t:242_1: kirā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Mahāpānaṃ nāma aññaṃ kammaṃ akatvā pānapasuto hutvā sattāhaṃ
tika-s0304t:242_2: tadanurūpaparijanassa surāpivanaṃ. Tenāha “mahāpānaṃ nāma pivitvā”ti. Sālithusehīti
tika-s0304t:242_3: rattasālithusehi. Ḍayhamānaṃ viya kipillikadaṃsanajātāhi dukkhavedanāhi. Mukhasattīhi
tika-s0304t:242_4: vijjhiṃsu vallabhatāya. Itthilolo hi so rājā.
tika-s0304t:243_0: Paveṇinti tesaṃ samādānapaveṇiṃ brahmacariyapabandhaṃ. Paṭipādentīti sampādenti.
tika-s0304t:243_1: Garukārammaṇanti garukātabbaārammaṇaṃ, avītikkamitabbārammaṇanti attho. Assāti rañño.
tika-s0304t:243_2: Cittaṃ anotarantanti pasādavīthiṃ anotarantaṃ anupagacchantaṃ. Viheṭhetunti vibādhituṃ.
tika-s0304t:244_1: attho yeva, yasmā uppajjamāno lobhadhammo attano hetupaccaye pariggahāpento jānāpento
tika-s0304t:244_2: viya sahati pavattatīti. Imameva kāyanti ettha samūhatthe eva kāya-saddo gabbhāsayādiṭṭhānesu
tika-s0304t:247_0: 129. Rūpā ca manāpāti nīlādibhedā rūpadhammā ca manasā manuññā piyarūpā saṃvijjanti,
tika-s0304t:247_1: idañca sukhavedanīyassa phassassa sabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Evaṃ “rūpā ca manāpā upekkhāvedaniyā”ti
tika-s0304t:247_2: etthāpi yathārahaṃ vattabbaṃ. Cakkhuviññāṇa…pe… phassanti vuttaṃ. Upanissayakoṭiyā
tika-s0304t:247_3: hi cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttaphasso sukhavedanīyo, na sahajātakoṭiyā. Tenāha – “ekaṃ
tika-s0304t:247_4: phassaṃ paṭicca javanavasena sukhavedanā uppajjatī”ti. Sesapadesūti “saṃvijjati kho,
tika-s0304t:248: Tevīsati dhātuyo kathitā channaṃ dvārānaṃ vasena vibhajjagahaṇena. Vatthunissitanti hadayavatthunissitaṃ. Pañcadvāre vīsati, manodvāre tisso evaṃ tevīsati.
tika-s0304t:251_0: 130-131. Taṃ itthetanti cakkhunā yaṃ rūpaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ itthanti attho. Taṃ sukhavedaniyanti
tika-s0304t:251_1: taṃ sukhavedanāya upanissayakoṭiyā paccayabhūtaṃ cakkhuviññāṇañceva, yo ca yathārahaṃ
tika-s0304t:251_2: upanissayakoṭiyā vā, anantaro ce anantarakoṭiyā vā, sahajāto ce sampayuttakoṭiyā
tika-s0304t:251_3: vā, sukhavedanāya paccayo phasso. Taṃ sukhavedaniyañca phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati
tika-s0304t:251_4: sukhavedanāti yojanā. Esa nayo sabbattha sabbesu sesesu sattasu vāresu. Manodhātuyeva
tika-s0304t:251_5: vā samānāti abhidhammanayena. Suttantanayena pana suññataṭṭhena nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena
tika-s0304t:251_6: ca manodhātusamaññaṃ labhateva. Aṭṭhamaṃ uttānameva heṭṭhā vuttanayattā.
tika-s0304t:254: 132. Tepi māṇavakātveva vuttā, na brāhmaṇakumārā eva. Seleyyakānīti aññamaññaṃ silissanalaṅghanakīḷanāni.
tika-s0304t:255_0: Upaṭṭhānavasena ibhaṃ harantīti ibbhā, hatthigopakā. Te pana nihīnakuṭumbassa bhoggaṃ
tika-s0304t:255_1: upādāya gahapatibhāvaṃ upādāya “gahapatikā”tipi vuccantīti āha “gahapatikā”ti. Kaṇhāti
tika-s0304t:255_2: kaṇhābhijātikā. Raṭṭhaṃ bharantīti yasmiṃ raṭṭhe vasanti, tassa raṭṭhassa baliṃ bharaṇena,
tika-s0304t:255_3: attano vā kuṭumbassa bharaṇena bharatā. Pariyāyantāti parito saṃcarantā kīḷanti.
tika-s0304t:256: Sīlajeṭṭhakāti sīlappadhānā. Ye purāṇaṃ saranti, te sīluttamā ahesuṃ. Dvārāni cakkhādidvārāni.
tika-s0304t:257: Apakkamitvā apetā virahitā hutvā. Visamānīti vigatasamāni duccaritasabhāvāni. Nānāvidhadaṇḍā nānāvidhadaṇḍanipātā.
tika-s0304t:258_0: Anāhārakāti kiñci abhuñjanakā. Paṅko viya paṅko, malaṃ. Dantapaṅko purimapadalopena
tika-s0304t:258_1: paṅkoti vuttoti “paṅko nāma dantamala”nti vuttaṃ. Ajehi kātabbakānaṃ akopetvā karaṇaṃ
tika-s0304t:258_2: samādānavasena vataṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Kohaññaṃ nāma attani vijjamānadosaṃ paṭicchādetvā
tika-s0304t:258_4: parikkhārabhaṇḍā kappakāti. Te ca kho attano jīvikatthāya āmisakiñjakkhassa attanibandhanatthāya amocanatthāya katā.
tika-s0304t:260: Adhimuttoti abhirativasena yuttapayutto. Parittacittoti parito khaṇḍitacitto. Appamāṇacittoti ettha “ko aya”nti paṭikkhituṃ sakkuṇeyyacitto.
tika-s0304t:263: 133. Brāhmaṇiṃ dhammasavanāya codento māṇavako “yagghe”ti avoca. Tenāha “yaggheti codanatthe nipāto”ti.
tika-s0304t:268: 134. Manaṃ ramayantāti āpāthagatā manassa ramaṇavasena piyāyitabbatāvasena pavattantā.
tika-s0304t:270_1: chahipi dvārehi ārammaṇassa paṭisaṃvedanā hotiyeva sabbaso dukkhānubhavanatthaṃ.
tika-s0304t:270_2: Tāvatiṃsapuranti sudassanamahānagaraṃ. Abhāvo nāma natthi sabbathā sukhānubhavanato.
tika-s0304t:270_3: Nirayeti iminā duggati bhavasāmaññena itarāpāyāpi gahitā eva. Maggabrahmacariyavāsaṃ
tika-s0304t:270_4: vasituṃ na sakkāti iminā pana sabbesampi acchindikaṭṭhānānaṃ gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0304t:270_5: Imevāti imasmiṃ manussaloke eva. Apāyopi paññāyati apāyadukkhasadisassa dukkhassa
tika-s0304t:270_6: kadāci paṭisaṃvedanato. Saggopi paññāyati devabhogasadisasampattiyā kadāci paṭilabhitabbato.
tika-s0304t:271_0: Ayaṃ kammabhūmīti ayaṃ manussaloko purisathāmakaraṇāya kammabhūmi nāma tāsaṃ yogyaṭṭhānabhāvato.
tika-s0304t:271_1: Tattha padhānakammaṃ dassento “idha maggabhāvanā”ti āha. Ṭhānānīti kāraṇāni. Saṃvejaniyānīti
tika-s0304t:271_2: saṃvegajananāni bahūni jātiādīni. Tathā hi jāti, jarā, byādhi, maraṇaṃ, apāyabhavaṃ,
tika-s0304t:271_4: atīte vaṭṭamūlakaṃ, anāgate vaṭṭamūlakaṃ, paccuppanne āhārapariyeṭṭhimūlakanti bahūni
tika-s0304t:271_5: saṃvegavatthūni paccavekkhitvā saṃvegajāto sañjātasaṃvego yoniso padhānamanuyuñjassu.
tika-s0304t:274_0: 136. Sammuditā sammodappattā, pamoditā sañjātapamodā. Dukkhāti dukkhavanto sañjātadukkhā.
tika-s0304t:274_1: Tenāha “dukkhitā”ti. Sukhaṃ etassa atthīti sukho, sukhī. Tenāha “sukhito”ti. Yattakā
tika-s0304t:274_2: rūpādayo dhammā loke atthīti vuccati. Passantānanti saccapaṭivedhena sammadeva passantānaṃ.
tika-s0304t:274_3: “Paccanīkaṃ hotī”ti vatvā taṃ paccanīkabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “loko hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Asubhāti
tika-s0304t:274_5: sukhato vidū”ti ca vuttaṃ. Sabbametaṃ nibbānameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Nibbānameva hi
tika-s0304t:275_0: Pañcanavutipāsaṇḍino tesañca pāsaṇḍibhāvo papañcasūdaniṭṭhakathāyaṃ pakāsito eva.
tika-s0304t:275_1: Kilesanīvaraṇena nivutānanti kilesakhandhā kilesanīvaraṇaṃ, tena nivāritānaṃ. Nibbānadassanaṃ
tika-s0304t:275_2: nāma ariyamaggo, tena tassa paṭivijjhanañca kāḷameghaavacchāditaṃ viya candamaṇḍalaṃ.
tika-s0304t:276: Paricchinditvāti asubhabhāvaparicchindanena sammāviññāṇadassanena ca paricchinditvā. Maggadhammassāti ariyamaggadhammassa.
tika-s0304t:277: Anupannehīti anu anu avihāya paṭipannehi. Ko nu añño jānituṃ arahati, añño na jānātīti dasseti.
tika-s0304t:280_0: 137-145. Suddhikaṃ katvā gāthābandhanena vinā kevalaṃ cuṇṇiyapadavaseneva. Tathā
tika-s0304t:280_1: tathāti ajjhattikāni bāhirāni ca āyatanāni aniccalakkhaṇena dukkhānattalakkhaṇehi
tika-s0304t:285_0: 146. Sampati vijjamānassa cakkhussa taṃnibbattassa kammassa ca adhippetattā “na cakkhu
tika-s0304t:285_1: purāṇaṃ, kammameva purāṇa”nti vatvā yathā tassa cakkhussa purāṇapariyāyo vutto, taṃ
tika-s0304t:285_3: vattabbassa paccayabhūtassa kammassa nāmena. Evaṃ vuttanti “purāṇakamma”nti evaṃ
tika-s0304t:285_4: vuttaṃ. Paccayehi abhisamāgantvā katanti taṇhāvijjādipaccayehi abhimukhabhāvena samāgantvā
tika-s0304t:285_5: samecca nibbattitaṃ. Cetanāyāti kammacetanāya. Pakappitanti abhisamīhitaṃ. Vedanāyāti
tika-s0304t:285_6: attānaṃ nissāya ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattāya vedanāya. Vatthūti nibbattikāraṇaṃ pavattaṭṭhānanti
tika-s0304t:285_7: vipassanāpaññāya passitabbaṃ. Kammassa nirodhenāti kilesānaṃ anuppādanirodhasiddhena
tika-s0304t:285_8: kammassa nirodhena. Vimuttiṃ phusatīti arahattaphalavimuttiṃ pāpuṇāti. Ārammaṇabhūto
tika-s0304t:285_9: nirodho nibbānaṃ “kammanirodho”ti vuccati, “kammaṃ nirujjhati etthā”ti katvā. “Jhāyatha,
tika-s0304t:285_10: bhikkhave, mā pamādatthā”ti vuttattā “pubbabhāgavipassanā kathitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t:288_1: upakārāvahaṃ paṭipadaṃ. Catūsūti dutiyādīsu catūsu. Nibbānasappāyā paṭipadā desitāti
tika-s0304t:288_2: katvā “saha vipassanāya cattāro maggā kathitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t:291_0: 151-152. Anta-saddo samīpatthe vattati “udakantaṃ vananta”ntiādīsu, kileso pana atiāsanne
tika-s0304t:291_3: samudācaraṇakilesarahitaṃ. Anto assa vasantīti assa puggalassa anto abbhantare citte
tika-s0304t:291_4: vasanti pavattanti. Te etaṃ adhibhavantīti te kilesā etaṃ puggalaṃ abhibhavitvā attano
tika-s0304t:291_5: vase vattenti. Tenāha – “ajjhottharanti sikkhāpenti vā”ti. Tehi ācariyehīti tehi
tika-s0304t:291_6: kilesasaṅkhātehi satte attano gatiyaṃ ṭhapentehi ācariyehi. Sattamaṃ heṭṭhā kathitanayamevāti
tika-s0304t:291_7: yasmā heṭṭhā khandhavasena desanā āgatā, idha āyatanavasenāti ayameva viseso.
tika-s0304t:294_0: 153. Pariyāyati parigacchati phalaṃ etassāti pariyāyo hetūti āha – “yaṃ pariyāyanti
tika-s0304t:294_1: yaṃ kāraṇa”nti. Paccakkhadiṭṭhe aviparīte atthe pavattasaddhā paccakkhasaddhā yathā
tika-s0304t:294_2: “sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākhāto dhammo”ti ca. Evaṃ kirāti iti kirāya uppanno saddahanākāro
tika-s0304t:294_3: saddhāpatirūpako. Etanti “aññatreva saddhāyā”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ. Rucāpetvāti kiñci atthaṃ
tika-s0304t:294_4: attano matiyā rocetvā. Khamāpetvāti tasseva vevacanaṃ, cittaṃ tathā khamāpetvā. Tenāha
tika-s0304t:294_5: – “atthetanti gahaṇākāro”ti. Paramparāgatassa atthassa evaṃ kirassāti anussavanaṃ.
tika-s0304t:294_6: Kāraṇaṃ cintentassāti yuttiṃ cintentassa. Kāraṇaṃ upaṭṭhātīti “sādhū”ti attano cittassa
tika-s0304t:294_7: upatiṭṭhati. Atthetanti “etaṃ kāraṇaṃ evamayamattho yujjatī”ti cittena gahaṇaṃ. Ākāraparivitakkoti
tika-s0304t:294_8: yuttiparikappanā. Laddhīti nicchayena gahaṇaṃ, sā ca kho diṭṭhi ayāthāvaggahaṇena
tika-s0304t:294_9: aññāṇamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tanti laddhiṃ. Atthesāti esā laddhi mama uppannā atthi yuttarūpā
tika-s0304t:294_10: hutvā upalabbhati. Evaṃ gahaṇākāro diṭṭhinijjhānakkhanti nāma, paṭhamuppannaladdhisaṅkhātāya
tika-s0304t:294_11: diṭṭhiyā nijjhānaṃ khamanākāro diṭṭhinijjhānakkhanti nāma. Pañca ṭhānānīti yathāvuttāni
tika-s0304t:294_12: saddhādīni pañca kāraṇāni. Muñcitvā aggahetvā. Heṭṭhimamaggavajjhānaṃ rāgādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ
tika-s0304t:294_13: sandhāya “natthi me ajjhattaṃ rāgadosamoho”ti ayaṃ sekkhānaṃ paccavekkhaṇā, sabbaso
tika-s0304t:294_14: abhāvaṃ sandhāya asekkhānanti āha – “sekkhāsekkhānaṃ paccavekkhaṇā kathitā”ti. “Santaṃ
tika-s0304t:294_15: vā ajjhatta”ntiādinā sekkhānaṃ, “asantaṃ vā ajjhatta”ntiādinā asekkhānaṃ paccavekkhaṇā
tika-s0304t:297_0: 154-155. “Sampannasīlā, bhikkhave, viharathā”tiādīsu viya paripuṇṇattho idha sampanna-saddoti
tika-s0304t:297_1: āha “paripuṇṇindriyo”ti. Indriyehi samannāgatattā paripuṇṇindriyo nāma hotīti sambandho.
tika-s0304t:297_2: Evaṃ sati samannāgamasampatti vuttā hotīti āsaṅkanto “cakkhādīni vā”tiādimāha. Taṃ
tika-s0304t:297_3: sandhāyāti dutiyavikappena vuttamatthaṃ sandhāya. Heṭṭhā khandhiyavagge khandhavasena
tika-s0304t:303_0: 156-159. Atthatoti sabhāvato. Ñāṇena ariyato ñātabbato attho, sabhāvoti. Evañhi abhijjanasabhāvo
tika-s0304t:303_1: nandanaṭṭhena nandī, rañjanaṭṭhena rāgo. Vimuttivasenāti vimuttiyā adhigamavasena.
tika-s0304t:303_2: Etthāti imasmiṃ paṭhamasutte. Dutiyādīsūti dutiyatatiyacatutthesu. Uttānameva heṭṭhā vuttanayattā.
tika-s0304t:306_1: cittekaggatañca labhantānanti yojanā. Pākaṭaṃ hotīti vibhūtaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Okkhāyati
tika-s0304t:306_2: paccakkhāyatīti catusaccadhammānaṃ vibhūtabhāvena upaṭṭhānassa kathitattā vuttaṃ
tika-s0304t:309: 162-164. Aniccānupassanādayo eva vimuttiparipācaniyā dhammā nāma. Therassa tadā saddhādīni indriyāni na paripākaṃ upagatāni, thero imāhi desanāhi indriyaparipākamagamāsi.
tika-s0304t:312: 165-167. Pāṭiyekkanti visuṃ visuṃ. Vuttanayenevāti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva apubbassa vattabbassa abhāvā.
tika-s0304t:317_0: 168-227. “Yaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ, tatra vo chando pahātabbo”tiādinā tesaṃ tesaṃ
tika-s0304t:317_1: puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena saṭṭhi suttāni kathitāni, tāni ca peyyālanayena desanaṃ
tika-s0304t:317_2: āruḷhānīti “saṭṭhipeyyālo nāma hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha “yāni panetthā”tiādi.
tika-s0304t:322_1: vuccati, cakkhussevetaṃ nippariyāyato yujjatīti dassetuṃ “yadī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0304t:322_2: duppūraṇaṭṭhenāti pūretuṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvena. Samuddanaṭṭhenāti sabbaso uparūparipakkhittagamanena.
tika-s0304t:322_3: Mahāgaṅgādimahānadīnaṃ mahatā udakoghena anusaṃvaccharaṃ anupakkhandamānopi hi samuddo
tika-s0304t:322_4: pāripūriṃ na gacchati, yañca bhūmipadesaṃ ottharati, taṃ samuddabhāvaṃ neti, abhāvaṃ
tika-s0304t:322_5: vā pāpuṇāti apayāte samuddodake, taṃ vā anudakabhāvapattiyā atathameva hoti. Kāmañcesa
tika-s0304t:322_6: duppūraṇaṭṭho samuddanaṭṭho sāgare labbhati, tathāpi taṃ dvayaṃ cakkhusmiṃyeva visesato
tika-s0304t:322_7: labbhatīti dassento “tassa hī”tiādimāha. Samosarantanti sabbaso nīlādibhāgehi osarantaṃ,
tika-s0304t:322_8: āpāthaṃ āgacchantanti attho. Kātuṃ na sakkoti duppūraṇīyattā. Sadosagamanena gacchati
tika-s0304t:322_9: sattasantānassa dussanato. Dussanaṭṭhatā cassa cakkhudvārikataṇhāvasena veditabbā.
tika-s0304t:322_10: Yathā samudde aparāparaṃ parivattamāno ūmiyā vego samuddassāti vuccati, evaṃ cakkhusamuddassa
tika-s0304t:322_11: purato aparāparaṃ parivattamānaṃ nīlādibhedaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussāti vattabbataṃ
tika-s0304t:322_12: arahati anaññasādhāraṇattāti vuttaṃ “rūpamayo vego”ti. Asamapekkhiteti sammādassane
tika-s0304t:322_13: rūpe manāpabhāvaṃ amanāpabhāvañca gahetvā, “idaṃ nāma mayā diṭṭha”nti anupadhārentassa
tika-s0304t:322_14: kevalaṃ samūhaghanavasena gaṇhantassa gahaṇaṃ asamapekkhanaṃ. Sahatīti adhibhavati,
tika-s0304t:323_0: Ūmīti vīciyo. Āvaṭṭo āvaṭṭanavasena pavattaṃ udakaṃ. Gāharakkhasamakarādayo gāharakkhaso.
tika-s0304t:323_1: Yathā samudde ūmiyo uparūpari vattamānā attani patitapuggalaṃ ajjhottharitvā anayabyasanaṃ
tika-s0304t:323_2: āpādenti, tathā āvaṭṭagāharakkhasā. Evamete rāgādayo kilesā sayaṃ uppannakasatte
tika-s0304t:323_3: ajjhottharitvā anayabyasanaṃ āpādenti, kilesuppattinimittatāya sattānaṃ anayabyasanāpattihetubhūtassa
tika-s0304t:323_4: ūmibhayassa ārammaṇavasena cakkhusamuddo “saūmisāvaṭṭo sagāho sarakkhaso”ti vutto.
tika-s0304t:324_0: Ūmibhayanti ettha bhāyati etasmāti bhayaṃ, ūmīva bhayaṃ ūmibhayaṃ. Kujjhanaṭṭhena
tika-s0304t:324_1: kodho. Sveva cittassa ca abhimaddanavasenuppādanatthena daḷhaṃ āyāsanaṭṭhena upāyāso.
tika-s0304t:324_2: Ettha ca anekavāraṃ pavattitvā satte ajjhottharitvā sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ adatvā anayabyasananipphādanena
tika-s0304t:324_3: kodhūpāyāsassa ūmisadisatā daṭṭhabbā. Tathā kāmaguṇā kilesābhibhūte satte māne viya
tika-s0304t:324_4: rūpādivisayasaṅkhāte attani saṃsāretvā yathā tato bahibhūte nekkhamme cittampi na
tika-s0304t:324_5: uppajjati, evaṃ āvaṭṭetvā byasanāpādanena āvaṭṭasadisatā daṭṭhabbā. Yadā pana gāharakkhaso
tika-s0304t:324_6: ārakkharahitaṃ attano gocarabhūmigataṃ purisaṃ abhibhuyya gahetvā agocare ṭhitampi
tika-s0304t:324_7: gocaraṃ netvā bheravarūpadassanādinā attano upakkamaṃ kātuṃ asamatthaṃ katvā anvāvisitvā
tika-s0304t:324_8: vaṇṇabalabhogaāyusukhehi viyojetvā mahantaṃ anayabyasanaṃ āpādeti, evaṃ mātugāmopi
tika-s0304t:324_9: yonisomanasikārarahitaṃ avīrapurisaṃ attano rūpādīhi palobhanavasena abhibhuyya gahetvā
tika-s0304t:324_10: vā vīrajātiyampi itthikuttabhūtehi attano hāvabhāvavilāsehi itthimāyāya anvāvisitvā
tika-s0304t:324_11: vā avasaṃ attano upakāradhamme sīlādayo sampādetuṃ asamatthaṃ karonto guṇavaṇṇādīhi
tika-s0304t:324_12: viyojetvā mahantaṃ anayabyasanaṃ āpādeti, evaṃ mātugāmassa gāharakkhasasadisatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0304t:324_13: Ūmibhayanti lakkhaṇavacanaṃ. Yathā hi ūmi bhāyitabbaṭṭhena bhayaṃ, evaṃ āvaṭṭagāharakkhasāpīti
tika-s0304t:324_14: ūmiādibhayena sabhayanti attho veditabbo. Antaṃ avasānaṃ gato, evaṃ pāraṃ nibbānaṃ gatoti vuccati.
tika-s0304t:327_1: Te hi kāmabhavavasena atintatāya na samunnā. Tayo maccūti kilesābhisaṅkhāradevaputtamāre.
tika-s0304t:327_2: Tīhi upadhīhīti kilesābhisaṅkhārakāmaguṇānaṃ vasena tīhi upadhīhi. Khandhupadhinā
tika-s0304t:327_3: pana so na nirūpadhi saupādisesasseva nibbānassa adhigatattā. Gatoti paṭipattigamanena gato.
tika-s0304t:330_0: 231-233. Appahīnaṭṭhenāti maggena asamugghāṭitabhāvena. Atthīti vijjati. Sati paccaye
tika-s0304t:330_1: vijjamānakiccakaraṇato pariyuṭṭhānaṃ appakaṃ mūsikāvisaṃ viya parittaṃ nāma hoti
tika-s0304t:330_2: appānubhāvattā. Evarūpāpīti appakāpi. Assāti appahīnakilesassa. Adhimattānanti iṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0304t:330_3: rajanīyānaṃ, vatthuvasena parittakampi iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ adhimattameva. Tenāha “nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇampī”tiādi.
tika-s0304t:330_4: Daharotiādīni tīṇipi padāni. Ābhindeyyāti bhindeyya. Taṃ ubhayanti taṃ cakkhurūpanti ubhayampi āyatanaṃ.
tika-s0304t:333_0: 234. Itipīti imināpi kāraṇena. Aniccenāti aniccabhāvena anattalakkhaṇaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-s0304t:333_1: Yasmā hetupaccayā viññāṇassa uppatti sati ca uppāde nirodhena bhavitabbaṃ, uppādavayavantatāya
tika-s0304t:333_2: aniccaṃ viññāṇaṃ, yadi ca attā siyā paccayehi vinā sijjheyya, na ca tathāssa siddhi,
tika-s0304t:336_0: 235. Kilesānaṃ anu anu byañjanato paribyattiyā uppattipaccayabhāvato anubyañjanaṃ,
tika-s0304t:336_2: nimittabhūto gāho. Saṃsandetvā gahaṇanti avayave samodhānetvā “itthipuriso”tiādinā
tika-s0304t:336_3: ekajjhaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Vibhattigahaṇanti vibhāgena anavasesaggahaṇaṃ. Kumbhīlasadisoti
tika-s0304t:336_4: kumbhīlagāhasadiso. Tenāha – “sabbameva gaṇhātī”ti hatthapādādīsu taṃ taṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ
tika-s0304t:336_5: vibhajitvā gahaṇaṃ rattapāsadiso jalūkagāhasadiso. Ekajavanavārepi labbhantīti idaṃ
tika-s0304t:337_0: Nimittassādena ganthitanti yathāvutte nimitte assādagāhena ganthitaṃ sambaddhaṃ.
tika-s0304t:337_1: Bhavaṅgenevāti mūlabhavaṅgeneva. Kilesabhayaṃ dassentoti tathā kilesuppattiyā sati
tika-s0304t:337_2: akusalacittena antaritaṃ ce maraṇacittaṃ bhaveyya, ekantato niraye vā tiracchānayoniyā
tika-s0304t:337_3: vā uppatti siyāti kilesānaṃ bhāyitabbaṃ dassento. “Samayavasena vā evaṃ vutta”nti
tika-s0304t:337_4: vatvā tamatthaṃ vivaranto “cakkhudvārasmiñhī”tiādimāha. Rattacittaṃ vāti rāgavasena
tika-s0304t:337_5: rattacittaṃ vā. Duṭṭhacittena kathaṃ ārammaṇarasānubhavananti? Domanassavedanuppatti
tika-s0304t:337_6: eva tassa ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Imassa samayassāti maraṇasamayassa.
tika-s0304t:338_0: Ubhinnaṃ nāsacchiddānaṃ majjhe ṭhita-aṭṭhitudanaṃ saha khuraṭṭhena chindanaṃ. Daṇḍakavāsīti
tika-s0304t:338_1: dīghadaṇḍakā mahāvāsi. Nipajjitvā niddokkamananti iminā pacalāyikaniddaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-s0304t:338_2: Tattha hi kadāci antarā micchāvitakkānaṃ sallakānaṃ avasaro siyā, nattheva nipajjitvā
tika-s0304t:341: 236-237. Navamaṃ “paññāyatī”ti vuccamāne bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vuttanti āha – “dasame na hotīti vuccamāne”tiādi. Ettakameva hi dvinnaṃ suttānaṃ visesoti.
tika-s0304t:346_0: 238. Ye bhikkhū tadā bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā nisinnā, tesu keci ekavihārino, keci
tika-s0304t:346_1: attadutiyā, keci attatatiyā, keci attacatutthā, keci attapañcamā hutvā araññāyatanesu
tika-s0304t:346_3: Kammaṭṭhānānuyuñjanassa kārake. Tato eva tattha yuttapayutte. Puggalajjhāsayena kāraṇabhūtena.
tika-s0304t:346_4: Paccayabhūtanti apassayabhūtaṃ. “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave”ti ārabhitvā yāva “tiṇṇo pāraṅgato
tika-s0304t:346_5: thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo”ti ayaṃ mātikānikkhepo. Tesaṃ mātikāya vitthārabhājanaṃ.
tika-s0304t:346_6: Vāsanā bhavissatīti vāsanāvahaṃ bhavissati. Sineruṃ ukkhipanto viyātiādi imissā desanāya
tika-s0304t:347_0: Mañcaṭṭhesu mañcasamaññā viya mukhaṭṭhaṃ visaṃ “mukha”nti adhippetaṃ. Sukkhakaṭṭhasadisabhāvāpādanato
tika-s0304t:347_1: “kaṭṭha”nti vuccatīti kaṭṭhaṃ mukhaṃ etassāti kaṭṭhamukho, daṃsanādinā kaṭṭhasadisabhāvakaro
tika-s0304t:347_2: sappo. Atha vā kaṭṭhasadisabhāvāpādanato kaṭṭhaṃ visaṃ vā mukhe etassāti kaṭṭhamukho.
tika-s0304t:347_3: Iminā nayena sesapadesupi attho veditabbo. Ime cattāroti ime visakiccabhedena cattāro.
tika-s0304t:347_4: Idāni taṃ nesaṃ visakiccabhedaṃ dassetuṃ “tesū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ayasūlasamappitaṃ viyāti
tika-s0304t:347_5: abbhantare ayasūlaṃ anuppavesitaṃ viya. Pakkapūtipanasaṃ viyāti paccitvā kālātikkame
tika-s0304t:347_6: kuthitapanasaphalaṃ viya. Caṅgavāreti rajakānaṃ khāraparissāvane surāparissāvane
tika-s0304t:347_7: vā. Anavasesaṃ chijjanena asanipātaṭṭhānaṃ viya. Mahānikhādanenāti mahantena nikhādanena.
tika-s0304t:348_0: Visavegavikārenāti visavegagatena vikārena. Vātenāti tassa sappassa sarīraṃ phusitvā
tika-s0304t:348_1: uggatavātena. Nāsavāte pana vattabbameva natthi. Puggalapaṇṇattivasenāti tesaṃyeva
tika-s0304t:348_2: soḷasannaṃ sappānaṃ āgatavisotiādipuggalanāmassa vasena catusaṭṭhi honti paccekaṃ
tika-s0304t:348_3: catubbidhabhāvato. Āgatavisoti āgacchaviso, sīghataraṃ abhiruhanavisoti attho. Ghoravisoti
tika-s0304t:348_4: kakkhaḷaviso, duttikicchaviso. Ayaṃ sītaudakaṃ viya hoti gāḷhadubbinimmocayabhāvena.
tika-s0304t:348_5: Udakasappo hi ghoraviso hoti yevāti vuttaṃ – “udakasappādīnaṃ visaṃ viyā”ti. Paññāyatīti
tika-s0304t:348_6: gaṇḍapiḷakādivasena paññāyati. Aneḷakasappo nāma mahāāsīviso. Nīlasappo nāma sākhavaṇṇo
tika-s0304t:348_7: rukkhaggādīsu vicaraṇakasappo. Iminā upāyenāti yoyaṃ kaṭṭhamukhesu daṭṭhavisānaṃyeva
tika-s0304t:348_8: “āgataviso no ghoraviso”tiādinā catubbidhabhāvo vutto, iminā upāyena. Kaṭṭhamukhe
tika-s0304t:348_9: daṭṭhavisādayoti kaṭṭhamukhesu daṭṭhaviso, phuṭṭhaviso, vātavibhoti tayo, pūtimukhādīsu
tika-s0304t:349_0: Ekekanti catusaṭṭhiyo ekekaṃ. Catudhāti aṇḍajādivibhāgena catudhā vibhajitvā. Chapaṇṇāsānīti
tika-s0304t:350_0: Sakalakāye āsiñcitvā viya ṭhapitavisāti hi tesaṃ phuṭṭhavisatā, vātavisatā vuccati.
tika-s0304t:350_1: Evanti “āsittavisā”tiādinā. Etthāti āsīvisasadde vacanattho niruttinayena veditabbo.
tika-s0304t:350_2: Uggatatejāti udaggatejā, attano visatejena nesaṃ kurūradabbatā vā. Dunnimmaddanavisāti
tika-s0304t:350_3: mantāgadehi animmaddanīyavisā. Cattāro āsīvisāti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho. Tenettha
tika-s0304t:351_0: Āsīvisesūti ime āsīvisā daṭṭhavisā evāti veditabbā. Sarīraṭṭhakesuyevāti tena purisena
tika-s0304t:351_1: tesaṃ kassaci aniṭṭhassa akatattā āyusesassa ca vijjamānattā naṃ na daṃsiṃsūti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0304t:351_2: Pucchi yathābhūtaṃ pavedetukāmo. Durupaṭṭhāhāti durupaṭṭhānā. Sotthimaggoti sotthibhāvassa upāyo.
tika-s0304t:352_0: Antaracaroti antaraṃ caro sukhasattu vissāsaghātī. Tenāha “vadhako”ti. Idāni tāsaṃ
tika-s0304t:352_1: pesane kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭhama”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Abhimukhagataṃ viya abhimukhagataṃ.
tika-s0304t:352_2: Īdisīpi hi vacoyutti loke nirūpīyati santiyaṃ purisaṃ ṭhapetīti viya. Tasmā abhimukhagatanti
tika-s0304t:352_3: abhimukhaṃ tena sampattanti attho. Vaṅkasaṇṭhānaṃ phalakaṃ rukkhamūle āgatāgatānaṃ
tika-s0304t:353_0: Arittahattho puriso santāreti etāyāti santāraṇī. Orimatīrato uttaraṇāya setu uttarasetu.
tika-s0304t:353_1: Ekena dvīhi vā gantabbo rukkhamayo setu rukkhasetu. Jaṅghasatthena gamanayoggo setu
tika-s0304t:353_2: jaṅghasetu. Sakaṭena gantuṃ sakkuṇeyyo sakaṭasetu. Na kho esa brāhmaṇo paramatthato.
tika-s0304t:353_3: Tadattho pana ekadesena sambhavatīti tathā vuttanti dassento “ettakānaṃ paccatthikānaṃ
tika-s0304t:353_4: bāhitattā”ti āha. Desananti uddesadesanaṃ. Vinivattentoti paṭisaṃharanto. Na laddho
tika-s0304t:354_0: Rājā viya kammaṃ sattesu issariyassa vattāpanato. Rājā…pe… puthujjano vaṭṭadukkhasaṅkhātāparādhatāya.
tika-s0304t:354_1: Ñāṇapalāyanenāti mahābhūtehi nibbinditvā virajjitvā vimuccitukāmatāvasena uppannañāṇapalāyane
tika-s0304t:354_2: maggādhigamasiddheneva ñāṇapalāyanena. Evañhettha upamāsaṃsandanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpitameva hoti.
tika-s0304t:355_0: Yatheva hītiādinā ekadesanāsamudāyassa nidassanaṃ āraddhaṃ. Yathāvuttavacanaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ
tika-s0304t:355_1: vacanena samattheti “patthaddho bhavatī”tiādinā. Tattha kaṭṭhamukhena vāti vā-saddo
tika-s0304t:355_2: upamattho. Yathā kaṭṭhamukhena sappena daṭṭho patthaddho hoti, evaṃ pathavīdhātuppakopena
tika-s0304t:355_3: so kāyo kaṭṭhamukheva hoti, kaṭṭhamukhagato viya patthaddho hotīti attho. Atha vā
tika-s0304t:355_4: vā-saddo avadhāraṇattho. So “pathavīdhātupakopena vā”ti evaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbo.
tika-s0304t:355_5: Ayañhettha attho – kaṭṭhamukhena daṭṭhopi kāyo pathavīdhātuppakopeneva patthaddho
tika-s0304t:355_6: hoti, tasmā pathavīdhātuyā aviyutto so kāyo sabbadā kaṭṭhamukhagato viya hotīti.
tika-s0304t:355_7: Vā-saddo vā aniyamattho. Tatrāyamattho – kaṭṭhamukhena daṭṭho kāyo patthaddho hoti
tika-s0304t:355_8: vā, na vā mantāgadavasena. Pathavīdhātuppakopena pana mantāgadarahito so kāyo kaṭṭhamukhagato
tika-s0304t:355_9: viya hoti ekantapatthaddhoti. Tattha kāyoti pakatikāyo. Pūtikoti kuthito. Santattoti
tika-s0304t:355_10: sabbaso tatto mahādāhappatto. Sañchinnoti sabbaso chinno cuṇṇavicuṇṇabhūto. Yadā
tika-s0304t:355_11: kāyo patthaddhādibhāvappatto hoti, tadā puriso kaṭṭhamukhādisappassa mukhe vattamāno viya hotīti attho.
tika-s0304t:356_0: Visesatoti kaṭṭhamukhādivisesato ca pathavīādivisesato ca. Anatthaggahaṇatotiādi
tika-s0304t:356_1: acetanesupi bhūtesu sacetanesu viya anatthādīnaṃ paccakkhatāya nibbedajananatthaṃ
tika-s0304t:356_2: āraddhaṃ. Tattha āsayatoti pavattiṭṭhānato. Etesanti mahābhūtānaṃ. Sadisatāti vammikāsayasusiragahanasaṅkāraṭṭhānāsayatāya ca sadisatā.
tika-s0304t:357_0: Paccattalakkhaṇavasenāti visuṃ visuṃ lakkhaṇavasena. Pathavīādīnaṃ kakkhaḷabhāvādi,
tika-s0304t:357_1: taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa kakkhaḷabhāvāpādanādinā vikāruppādanato visavegavikārato sadisatā veditabbā.
tika-s0304t:358: Anatthāti byasanā. Byādhinti kuṭṭhādibyādhiṃ. Bhave jātābhinandinoti bhavesu jātiyā abhinandanasīlā. Pañcavokāre hi jātiyā abhinandanā nāma mahābhūtābhinandanā eva.
tika-s0304t:359_1: upasaṅkamituṃ na sakkonti. Parijānāma kammanāmāni, upakārā nāma natthi. Anantadosūpaddavatoti
tika-s0304t:360_0: Rūpakkhandho bhijjamāno cattāro arūpakkhandhe gahetvāva bhijjati arūpakkhandhānaṃ
tika-s0304t:360_1: ekanirodhattā. Vatthurūpampi gahetvāva bhijjanti pañcavokāre arūpakkhandhesu bhinnesu
tika-s0304t:360_2: rūpakkhandhassa avaṭṭhānābhāvato. Ettāvatāti lobhuppādanamattena. Paññā nāma attabhāve
tika-s0304t:360_3: uttamaṅgaṃ paññuttarattā kusaladhammānaṃ, sati ca kilesuppattiyaṃ paññāya anuppajjanato
tika-s0304t:360_4: vuttaṃ – “ettāvatā paññāsīsaṃ patitaṃ nāma hotī”ti. Yoniyo upaneti tadupagassa kammapaccayassa
tika-s0304t:360_5: bhāve. “Jātibhayaṃ, jarābhayaṃ, maraṇabhayaṃ, corabhaya”ntiādinā āgatāni pañcavīsati
tika-s0304t:360_6: mahābhayāni, “hatthampi chindatī”tiādinā āgatāni dvattiṃsa kammakāraṇāni āgatāneva
tika-s0304t:360_7: honti kāraṇassa samavaṭṭhitattā. Nandīrāgo saṅkhārakkhandhoti saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t:361_0: Pāḷiyaṃyeva āgatā “cakkhuto cepi naṃ, bhikkhave”tiādinā. Kiñci alabhitvāti tasmiṃ
tika-s0304t:361_1: suññagāme corānaṃ gayhūpagassa alābhavacaneneva tassa purisassa attano paṭisaraṇassa
tika-s0304t:361_2: alābho vutto eva hotīti na uddhaṭo, purisaṭṭhāniyo bhikkhu, corā pana bāhirāyatanaṭṭhāniyā.
tika-s0304t:361_3: Abhinivisitvāti vipassanābhinivesaṃ katvā. Ajjhattikāyatanavasena desanāya āgatattā
tika-s0304t:362_0: Bāhirānanti bāhirāyatanānaṃ. Pañca kiccānīti corehi tadā kātabbāni pañca kiccāni.
tika-s0304t:362_1: Hatthasāranti attano santake hatthehi gahetabbasārabhaṇḍaṃ. Pātanādivasena hatthaparāmāsaṃ
tika-s0304t:362_2: karonti. Pahāraṭhāneti pahaṭaṭṭhāne. Ṭhānaso tasmiṃ eva khaṇeti vadanti. Attano sukhāvahaṃ
tika-s0304t:362_3: kusaladhammaṃ pahāya dukkhāvahena akusalena samaṅgitā sukhāvahaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ pahāya bahi
tika-s0304t:362_4: nikkhamanaṃ viyāti vuttaṃ sukhanissayattā tassa. Hatthaparā…pe… āpajjanakālo guṇasarīrassa
tika-s0304t:362_5: tadā pamādena bādhitattā. Pahāra…pe… kālo tato daḷhataraṃ guṇasarīrassa bādhitattā.
tika-s0304t:362_6: Pahāraṃ…pe… assamaṇakālo guṇasarīrassa maraṇappattisadisattā. Avasesajanassa dāsaparibhogena
tika-s0304t:362_8: dvāresu ārammaṇe āpāthagate”ti vuttaṃ, tameva ārammaṇaṃ nissāya samparāyiko dukkhakkhandho veditabboti yojanā.
tika-s0304t:363_1: tesaṃ lahutādivasena. Duruttaraṇaṭṭhoti uttarituṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvo oghaṭṭho. Vuttanayenāti
tika-s0304t:364_0: Kuṇṭhapādoti chinnapādova hutvā gativikalo. Mānasaṃ bandhatīti tasmiṃ citte kiccaṃ
tika-s0304t:364_1: nibandhati. “Ayaṃ ariyamaggo mayhaṃ oghuttaranupāyo”ti tattha cittassa sanniṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0304t:365_0: Tassa nāmarūpassa ime nandīrāgādayo taṇhāvijjādayoti katvā paccayo dhammāyatanekadeso.
tika-s0304t:365_1: Ariyamagganibbānataṇhāvajjo idha dhammāyatanekadesoti ca. Soḷasahākārehīti pīḷanādīhi
tika-s0304t:365_2: soḷasahi ākārehi. Satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅge āgatanayena saṭṭhinayasahassehi. Desanāpariyosāne…pe…
tika-s0304t:365_3: patiṭṭhahiṃsūti vipañcitaññū evettha gahaṇavasena adhigatavisesā paricchinditā. Te
tika-s0304t:365_4: hi tadā dhammapaṭiggāhakabhāvena satthu santike sannisinnā. Ugghaṭitaññūnaṃ pana
tika-s0304t:365_5: neyyānañca visesādhigamo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na ruḷhoti idha na gahitoti.
tika-s0304t:368_0: 239. Susaṃvutindriyassa bhojane mattaññuno satassa sampajānassa viharato kilesanimittaṃ
tika-s0304t:368_1: dukkhaṃ anavasaranti sukhasomanassabahulatā vuttā. Yavati tena phalaṃ missitaṃ viya
tika-s0304t:368_2: hotīti yoni, ekantikaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Assāti bhikkhuno. Paripuṇṇanti avikalaṃ. Anavasesaṃ
tika-s0304t:368_3: āsave khepetīti āsavakkhayo, aggamaggo. Yaṃ yanti dandhaṃ majjhaṃ javoti javādīsu
tika-s0304t:368_4: yaṃ yaṃ gamanaṃ. Rakkhaṇatthāyāti kilesacorehi rakkhaṇatthāya. Veganiggahaṇatthāyāti
tika-s0304t:368_6: vipphanditassa nirodhanāya. Kilesūpasamatthāyāti kilesānaṃ uparūpari samanatthāya vūpasamanatthāya.
tika-s0304t:369_0: Samaṇarati nāma samathavipassanāmaggaphalasukhāni. Dantānampi sindhavānaṃ sārathino
tika-s0304t:369_1: payogena siyā kāci visevanamattāti tadabhāvaṃ dassento “nibbisevane katvā pesento”ti
tika-s0304t:369_2: vuttaṃ. Ñāṇaṃ gacchatīti asaṅgamanaṃ pavattati pageva indriyabhāvanāya katattā, kilesaniggahassa
tika-s0304t:369_3: sukheneva siddhattā. Dāyakassa ajjhāsayo vaso uḷāro lāmako. Deyyadhammassa pamāṇaṃ
tika-s0304t:370: Mahāmaṇḍapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma lohapāsādassa purato eva mahābhikkhusaṅghassa sannipātakāle tesaṃ pahonakavasena mahāmaṇḍapassa kattabbaṭṭhānaṃ. Gahaṇamānanti parivisagahaṇabhājanaṃ.
tika-s0304t:371: Pakatiyā bhattakārakicce adhigato upaṭṭhākupāsako. Mudusamakharasaññitehi, dahanapacanabhajjanasaññitehi vā tīhi pākehi.
tika-s0304t:372_0: Parisodhetvāti rañño anucchavikabhāvaṃ parisodhetvā. Bhūmiyaṃ chaḍḍesi “bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-s0304t:372_1: adatvā mayā mukhe pakkhitta”nti. Mukhena gaṇhi tassa niddosabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ. Mattaṃ
tika-s0304t:372_2: jānāpetuṃ pamajji. “Tvaṃ kuto āgato”ti pucchane pamādaṃ āpajji. Anubhāgoti avasiṭṭhabhāgo.
tika-s0304t:372_3: Idamatthiyanti idaṃ payojanaṃ. Itaranti pāḷiyaṃ anāgatampi āhāre pamāṇajānanaṃ.
tika-s0304t:373_0: Sayanaṃ seyyā, kāmabhogīnaṃ seyyā kāmabhogiseyyā. Dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi
tika-s0304t:373_1: dakkhiṇahatthena kātabbakiccakaraṇato. Tejussadattāti idaṃ anutrāsasseva sīhassa
tika-s0304t:373_2: sayananti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ, pacchimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetvāti
tika-s0304t:374_0: Catutthajjhānaseyyāti catutthajjhānikaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ vadati. Yebhuyyena hi tathāgatā
tika-s0304t:374_1: phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvāva sayanti. Sā ca nesaṃ catutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāya, kilesaparinibbānassa
tika-s0304t:374_2: ca katattāti vadanti. Idha sīhaseyyā āgatā pādaṃ accādhāya pubbenāparaṃ ajahitasaṃlakkhaṇā
tika-s0304t:374_3: seyyāti katvā. Tenāha “ayaṃ hī”tiādi. Evanti “dakkhiṇena passenā”tiādinā vuttākārena seyyaṃ kappeti.
tika-s0304t:375_0: Kathaṃ niddāyanto sato sampajāno hoti? Bhavaṅgacittena hi niddūpagamananti adhippāyo.
tika-s0304t:375_1: Appahānenāti tadadhimuttatāya tadappahānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā tesu niddokkamanassa
tika-s0304t:375_2: ādipariyosānesu ajahitasatisampajaññaṃ hoti. Tenāha – “niddaṃ okkamantopi sato sampajāno
tika-s0304t:375_3: hotī”ti. Etaṃ panāti “niddaṃ okkamantopi sato sampajāno hotī”ti vuttanayaṃ vadati.
tika-s0304t:375_4: Ñāṇadhātukanti na rocayiṃsūti niddokkamanepi jāgaraṇe pavattañāṇasabhāvamevāti na
tika-s0304t:375_5: rocayiṃsu porāṇā. Nirantaraṃ bhavaṅgacittesu vattamānesu satisampajaññāsambhavoti
tika-s0304t:375_6: adhippāyo. Purimasmiñhi naye satisampajaññassa asaṃvaro, na bhavaṅgassa. Indriyasaṃvaro,
tika-s0304t:375_7: bhojane mattaññutā, jāgariyānuyogoti imehi tivaṅgikā, nimittānubyañjanaparivajjanādi
tika-s0304t:376: Tānevāti vipassanākkhaṇe pavattāni indriyādīni. Yāva arahattā desanā vitthārato kathetabbā. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṃ khayāyā”ti saṅkhepena kathitā.
tika-s0304t:379_0: 240. Aṭṭhikummoti piṭṭhiyaṃ tikhiṇaṭṭhiko kummo. Tantibandhoti byāvaṭo. Samugge viya
tika-s0304t:379_1: attano kapāle pakkhipitvā. Samodahanto sammā odahanto ajjhattameva dahanto. Ārammaṇakapāleti
tika-s0304t:379_2: ārammaṇakaṭāhe. Samodahantoti diṭṭhamattasseva ca gahaṇato manovitakke tattheva sammadeva
tika-s0304t:379_3: odahanto. Tañhi visayavasena pavattituṃ adento. Pañca dhammeti “kālena vakkhāmī”tiādinā vuccamāne.
tika-s0304t:382_0: 241. Vilāsamāno viya sāgaraṃ patvā. Antosākhoti gaṅgāya tīrassa anto onatasākho.
tika-s0304t:382_1: Temetīti tinto hoti. Tiriyaṃ patito daṇḍasetu viya ṭhitattā mahājanassa paccayo jāto,
tika-s0304t:383_0: Ayaṃ hīti anantaraṃ vuttapuggalo. Ariyamaggaṃ oruyhāti catubbidhaṃ ariyamaggavīthiṃ
tika-s0304t:383_1: otaritvā. “Cittaṃ nāmeta”ntiādinā cintetvā gihibandhanaṃ na vissajjetīti sambandho.
tika-s0304t:383_2: Attano bhajamānaketi attano bhajante. Jīvikatthāya payujjitabbato payogo, khettavatthādi.
tika-s0304t:383_3: Tato payogato uṭṭhitaṃ āyaṃ. Kiñcāpi bhikkhūnaṃ kāyasāmaggiṃ deti bhikkhatthāya.
tika-s0304t:384_0: Muṇḍaghaṭanti bhinnoṭṭhaṃ ghaṭaṃ. Khandheti aṃse. Saṅghabhoganti saṅghasantakaṃ bhogagāmaṃ
tika-s0304t:384_1: gantvā. Atthato evaṃ vadantīti tathā atthassa sambhavato evaṃ vadantā viya honti.
tika-s0304t:384_2: Yāgumattake yāgunti yāguṃ pivitvā tāya aparipakkāya eva aññaṃ yāguṃ ajjhoharitvāti sambandho.
tika-s0304t:385: Kilesānurañjitovāti yonisomanasikārassa abhāvena kilesānugatacitto eva. Akkhīni nīharitvāti kodhavasena akkhike karonto akkhīni nīharitvā vicarissati. Uddhato hoti avūpasanto.
tika-s0304t:386_0: Diṭṭhigatikoti sāsaniko evaṃ ayoniso ummujjitvā sāsanaṃ uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ katvā
tika-s0304t:386_1: dīpento ariṭṭhasadiso. Tenāha “so hī”tiādi. Arūpabhave rūpaṃ atthi, aññathā tato
tika-s0304t:386_2: cutassa kuto rūpakkhandhassa sambhavo. Asaññībhave cittaṃ atthīti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0304t:386_3: Bahucittakkhaṇiko lokuttaramaggo “yo ime cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāveyya sattavassānī”tiādivacanato.
tika-s0304t:386_4: Anusayo cittavippayutto, aññathā sāvajjānavajjadhammānaṃ ekajjhaṃ uppatti siyā. Te
tika-s0304t:386_5: ca sattā sandhāvanti saṃsaranti, aññathā kammaphalānaṃ sambandho na siyāti. Iti vadanto
tika-s0304t:387_0: Temanarukkho viya…pe… dullabhadhammassavano ca puggalo saddhāsinehena atemanato.
tika-s0304t:387_1: Katavinayo sikkhitavinayo yathā “katavijjo”ti. Dhammakathikānaṃ vicārethāti idaṃ
tika-s0304t:387_2: deyyadhammaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ ayyānaṃ tassa tassa yuttavasena vicārethāti niyyātanavasena
tika-s0304t:387_3: vatvā. Divākathiko sarabhāṇako sāyanhe katheti, purimayāmaṃ kathento rattikathiko bhāṇakapuggalo.
tika-s0304t:388_0: Nandanavanābhirāmeti nandanavanaṃ viya manorame. Assa bhārahārabhikkhūti assa kiccavāhakabhikkhū
tika-s0304t:389: Ṭhitasaṇṭhāneneva ṭhitākāreneva ṭhitaṃ, nappayuttanti attho. Cittakammamūlādīni ṭhitasaṇṭhāneneva ṭhitāti yojanā. Mudutāyāti muduhadayatāya sāpekkhatāya.
tika-s0304t:390_0: Paṭipadanti samathavipassanāpaṭipattiṃ. Dīpetvā pakāsetvā pākaṭaṃ katvā. Tatruppādoti
tika-s0304t:390_1: tatra uppajjanakaāyuppādo. Khettaṃ sandhāya vadati. Tela…pe… hatthāti telaghaṭa-madhughaṭaphāṇitaghaṭādihatthā.
tika-s0304t:390_2: Apakkamiṃsu dubbicāritattā. Pūresīti heṭṭhā ca tattha tattha atītāni kālavacanāni
tika-s0304t:391_0: Upagamanānupagamanādīni orimassa pārimassa ca upagamanānupagamanāni ceva majjhe saṃsīdanāni
tika-s0304t:391_1: ca. Paṭivijjhitunti jānituṃ. Etanti yathāvuttaṃ cakkhusabhāvaṃ. Domanassanti tasseva
tika-s0304t:391_2: mandabhāvapaccayaṃ domanassaṃ. Āpajjantopi upagacchati nāma tannimittasaṃkilesassa
tika-s0304t:391_3: uppāditattā. Tiṇṇaṃ lakkhaṇānanti hutvā abhāvato ādiantavantato tāvakālikato niccapaṭikkhepatotiādīnaṃ
tika-s0304t:392_0: Vāmatoti micchā. Dakkhiṇatoti sammā. Yathā tassa tassa sattassa orabhāvattā ajjhattikāni
tika-s0304t:392_1: āyatanāni orimaṃ tīraṃ katvā vuttāni, evaṃ nesaṃ parabhāvattā bāhirāni āyatanāni
tika-s0304t:392_2: pārimaṃ vuttāni. Apāyamajjhe saṃsaraṇahetutāya nandīrāgova “majjhe saṃsādo”ti vutto.
tika-s0304t:393: Unnatoti “seyyohamasmī”tiādinā unnatiṃ upagato. Attukkaṃsane paṃsukūlikabhāvena attānaṃ dahanato aññākāratāgahetabbo. Pāsāṇo nu kho esa khāṇukoti gahetabbadārukkhandhasadiso vutto.
tika-s0304t:394_0: Cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ hoti āvaṭṭavegassa balavabhāvato. Catūsu apāyesūti pañcakāmaguṇāvaṭṭe
tika-s0304t:394_1: patitapuggalo manussalokepi guṇasarīrabhedanena dīgharattaṃ cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ āpajjatiyeva,
tika-s0304t:394_2: tassa tathā āpannattā. Evañhi so apāyesu tādisesu jāyati.
tika-s0304t:395_0: Sīlassa duṭṭhaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā abhāvattho idha du-saddoti āha “nissīlo”ti. “Pāpaṃ
tika-s0304t:395_1: pāpena sukara”ntiādīsu viya pāpa-saddo nihīnapariyāyoti āha “lāmakadhammo”ti. Na
tika-s0304t:395_2: sucīti kāyavācācittehi na suci. Saṅkāya vāti attano vā saṅkāya paresaṃ samācārakiriyaṃ
tika-s0304t:395_3: sarati āsaṅkati. Tenāha “tassa hī”tiādi. Tāni kammāni pavisatīti tāni kammāni karontānaṃ
tika-s0304t:395_4: antare pavisati. Guṇānaṃ pūtibhāvenāti guṇabhāvena gahitānaṃ sīladhammānaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhabhāvappattiyā.
tika-s0304t:396: Aṇaṇā pabbajjāti aṇaṇasseva pabbajjā. Orimatīrādīnaṃ upagamanānupagamanādīnaṃ jotitattā vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-s0304t:399_0: 242. Yā āpatti vuṭṭhānagāminī desanāgāminī, taṃ paṭicchāditakālato paṭṭhāya saṃkiliṭṭhā
tika-s0304t:399_1: nāma antarāyikabhāvato. Āvīkatā pana anāpattiṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti asaṃkiliṭṭhā nāma.
tika-s0304t:399_2: Tenāha – “āvīkatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti. Evarūpaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhanti paṭicchāditatāya vā
tika-s0304t:402_1: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Santharantīti vissamanti, parissamaṃ vinodentīti attho. Sahāti
tika-s0304t:402_2: sannipātavasena ekajjhaṃ. Saha atthānusāsanaṃ agāranti tasmiṃ atthe ttha-kārassa
tika-s0304t:402_3: ntha-kāraṃ katvā “santhāgāra”nti vuccatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ, paṭhamaṃ tattha sammantanavasena
tika-s0304t:403_0: Tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ āgatameva bhavissatīti buddhavacanassa āgamanasīsena ariyaphaladhammānampi
tika-s0304t:403_1: āgamanaṃ vuttameva. Tiyāmarattiṃ tattha vasantānaṃ phalasamāpattivaḷañjanaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0304t:403_2: Tasmiñca bhikkhusaṅghe kalyāṇadhammā kalyāṇaputhujjanā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpentā hontīti
tika-s0304t:404_0: Allagomayenāti acchena allagomayarasena. Opuñjāpetvāti vilimpetvā. Catujjātiyagandhehīti
tika-s0304t:404_3: ‘mahāpiṭṭhikā’ti laddhasamaññe kojave”ti vadanti. Kuttake pana sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0304t:404_5: attharitabbā hatthiassarūpavicittā ca attharakā. Sīhattharakādayo pana sīharūpādivicittā
tika-s0304t:404_6: eva attharakā. Cittattharakaṃ nānāvidharūpehi ceva nānāvidhamālākammādīhi ca vicittaṃ attharakaṃ.
tika-s0304t:405_0: Upadhānanti apassayanaṃ. Upadahitvāti apassayayoggabhāvena ṭhapetvā. Gandhehi katamālā
