tika-s0304t:405_1: gandhadāmaṃ. Tamālapattādīhi katamālā pattadāmaṃ. Ādi-saddena hiṅgulatakkolajātiphalajātipupphādīhi
tika-s0304t:405_2: katadāmaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Pallaṅkākārena katapīṭhaṃ pallaṅkapīṭhaṃ. Tīsu passesu ekapasse
tika-s0304t:405_3: eva vā saupassayaṃ apassayapīṭhaṃ. Anapassayaṃ muṇḍapīṭhaṃ. Yojanāvaṭṭeti yojanaparikkhepokāse.
tika-s0304t:406_0: Saṃvidhāyāti antaravāsakassa koṇapadesaṃ itarapadesañca samaṃ katvā vidhāya. Tenāha
tika-s0304t:406_1: – “kattariyā padumaṃ kantento viyā”ti, “timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādento”ti ca. Yasmā buddhānaṃ
tika-s0304t:406_2: rūpasampadā viya ākappasampadāpi paramukkaṃsataṃ gatā, tasmā tadā bhagavā evaṃ sobheyyāti
tika-s0304t:406_5: pasādajananatthaṃ attano sabhāvapakatiyāva kapilavatthuṃ pāvisīti dasseti. Buddhānaṃ
tika-s0304t:406_6: kāyapabhā nāma pakatiyā asītihatthamattapadesaṃ visaratīti āha “asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0304t:407_0: Sabbapāliphulloti mūlato paṭṭhāya yāva sākhaggā samantato phullo vikasito. Paṭipāṭiyā
tika-s0304t:407_1: ṭhapitānantiādi parikappūpamā, yathā taṃ…pe… alaṅkataṃ aññaṃ virocati, evaṃ virocittha,
tika-s0304t:407_2: samatiṃsāya pāramitāhi abhisaṅkhatattā evaṃ virocitthāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Pañcavīsatiyā
tika-s0304t:407_3: gaṅgānanti satamukhā hutvā samuddaṃ paviṭṭhāya mahāgaṅgāya mahantamahantānaṃ gaṅgānaṃ
tika-s0304t:407_4: pañcavīsatī”ti vadanti. Papañcasūdaniyaṃ “pañcavīsatiyā nadīna”nti vuttaṃ, gaṅgādīnaṃ
tika-s0304t:407_6: Sambhijjāti sambhedaṃ missībhāvaṃ patvā mukhadvāreti samuddaṃ paviṭṭhaṭṭhāne.
tika-s0304t:408: Nāgasupaṇṇagandhabbayakkhādīnantiādi parikappavasena vuttaṃ. Sahassenāti padasahassena, bhāṇavārappamāṇena ganthenāti attho.
tika-s0304t:409_0: Kampayanto vasundharanti attano guṇavisesehi pathavīkammaṃ unnādento, evaṃbhūtopi
tika-s0304t:409_1: aheṭhayanto pāṇāni. Sabbapadakkhiṇattā buddhānaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ uddharanto.
tika-s0304t:409_2: Samaṃ samphusate bhūmiṃ suppatiṭṭhitapādatāya. Yadipi bhūmiṃ samaṃ phusati, rajasā
tika-s0304t:409_3: nupalippati sukhumattā chaviyā. Ninnaṭṭhānaṃ unnamatītiādi buddhānaṃ suppatiṭṭhitapādatāsaṅkhātamahāpurisalakkhaṇapaṭilābhassa
tika-s0304t:409_4: nissandaphalaṃ. Nātidūre uddharatīti atidūre ṭhapetuṃ na uddharati. Naccāsanne ca
tika-s0304t:409_5: nikkhipanti accāsanne ca ṭhāne anikkhipanto niyyāti. Hāsayanto sadevake loke tosento.
tika-s0304t:410_0: Buddhānubhāvassa pakāsanavasena gatattā vaṇṇakālo nāma esa. Sarīravaṇṇe vā guṇavaṇṇe
tika-s0304t:410_1: vā kathiyamāne dukkathitanti na vattabbaṃ. Kasmā? Appamāṇavaṇṇā hi buddhā bhagavanto,
tika-s0304t:411_1: Maṇiverocano yathāti caturāsītisahassamaṇiparivārito ativiya virocamāno vijjotamāno
tika-s0304t:411_2: maṇi viya. “Verocano nāma eko maṇī”ti keci. Mahāsālovāti mahanto sālarukkho viya,
tika-s0304t:411_3: suddhaṭṭhito koviḷārādi mahārukkho viya vā. Padumo kokanado yathāti kokanadasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0304t:412_0: Ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viyātiādi tassā pakiṇṇakakathāya aññesaṃ sudukkarabhāvadassanañceva
tika-s0304t:412_1: suṇantānaṃ accantasukhāvahabhāvadassanañca. Pathavojaṃ ākaḍḍhanto viyāti nāḷiyantaṃ
tika-s0304t:412_2: yojetvā mahāpathaviyā heṭṭhimatale pappaṭakojaṃ uddhaṃ mukhaṃ katvā ākaḍḍhanto viya.
tika-s0304t:413_0: Mahantanti vipulaṃ uḷārapuññaṃ. Sabbadānaṃ dinnameva hotīti sabbameva paccayajātaṃ
tika-s0304t:413_1: āvāsadāyakena dinnameva hoti. Tathā hi dve tayo gāme piṇḍāya caritvā kiñci aladdhā
tika-s0304t:413_2: āgatassapi chāyūdakasampannaṃ ārāmaṃ pavisitvā nhāyitvā paṭissaye muhuttaṃ nipajjitvā
tika-s0304t:413_3: uṭṭhāya nisinnassa kāye balaṃ āharitvā pakkhittaṃ viya hoti. Bahi vicarantassa ca
tika-s0304t:413_4: kāye vaṇṇadhātu vātātapehi kilamati, paṭissayaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya muhuttaṃ
tika-s0304t:413_5: nisinnassa visabhāgasantati vūpasammati, sabhāgasantati patiṭṭhāti, vaṇṇadhātu āharitvā
tika-s0304t:413_6: pakkhittā viya hoti, bahi vicarantassa ca pāde kaṇṭakā vijjhanti, khāṇu paharati,
tika-s0304t:413_7: sarīsapādiparissayā ceva corabhayañca uppajjati, paṭissayaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya
tika-s0304t:413_8: nisinnassa pana sabbepete parissayā na honti. Sajjhāyantassa dhammapītisukhaṃ, kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0304t:413_9: manasikarontassa upasamasukhaṃ uppajjati bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvato. Bahi vicarantassa
tika-s0304t:413_10: ca kāye sedā muccanti, akkhīni phandanti, senāsanaṃ pavisanakkhaṇe mañcapīṭhādīni
tika-s0304t:413_11: na paññāyanti, muhuttaṃ nisinnassa pana akkhipasādo āharitvā pakkhitto viya hoti,
tika-s0304t:413_12: dvāravātapānamañcapīṭhādīni paññāyanti. Etasmiñca āvāse vasantaṃ disvā manussā catūhi
tika-s0304t:413_13: paccayehi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahanti. Tena vuttaṃ – “āvāsadānasmiñhi dinne sabbadānaṃ
tika-s0304t:413_14: dinnameva hotī”ti. Bhūmaṭṭhaka…pe… na sakkāti ayamattho mahāsudassanavatthunā dīpetabbo.
tika-s0304t:413_15: Mātukucchi asambādhova hotīti ayamattho antimabhavikānaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ paṭisandhivasena dīpetabbo.
tika-s0304t:414_0: Sītanti ajjhattaṃ dhātukkhobhavasena vā bahiddhā utuvipariṇāmavasena vā uppajjanakasītaṃ.
tika-s0304t:414_1: Uṇhanti aggisantāpaṃ, tassa ca davadāhādīsu sambhavo daṭṭhabbo. Paṭihantīti paṭihanati.
tika-s0304t:414_2: Yathā tadubhayavasena kāyacittānaṃ ābādho na hanati, evaṃ karoti. Sītuṇhabbhāhate
tika-s0304t:414_3: hi sarīre vikkhittacitto bhikkhu yoniso padahituṃ na sakkoti. Vāḷamigānīti sīhabyagghādivāḷamige.
tika-s0304t:414_4: Guttasenāsanañhi pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya nisinnassa te parissayā na honti. Sarīsapeti
tika-s0304t:414_5: ye keci sarantā gacchante dīghajātike sappādike aññe ca tathārūpe. Makaseti nidassanamattametaṃ,
tika-s0304t:414_6: ḍaṃsādīnaṃ eteneva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Sisireti sītakālavasena sattāhavaddalikādivasena
tika-s0304t:414_7: ca uppanne sisirasamphasse. Vuṭṭhiyoti yadā tadā uppannā vassavuṭṭhiyo paṭihanatīti yojanā.
tika-s0304t:415_0: Vātātapo ghoroti rukkhagacchādīnaṃ ubbahanabhañjanādivasena pavattiyā ghoro sarajaarajādibhedo
tika-s0304t:415_1: vāto ceva gimhapariḷāhasamayesu uppattiyā ghoro sūriyātapo ca. Paṭihaññatīti paṭibāhīyati.
tika-s0304t:415_2: Leṇatthanti nānārammaṇato cittaṃ nivattitvā paṭisallāṇārāmatthaṃ. Sukhatthanti vuttaparissayābhāvena
tika-s0304t:415_3: phāsuvihāratthaṃ. Jhāyitunti aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu yattha katthaci cittaṃ upanibandhitvā
tika-s0304t:415_4: samādahanavasena jhāyituṃ. Vipassitunti aniccādivasena saṅkhāre sammasituṃ.
tika-s0304t:416_0: Vihāreti paṭissaye. Kārayeti kārāpeyya. Rammeti manorame. Vāsayettha bahussuteti
tika-s0304t:416_1: kāretvā pana ettha vihāresu bahussute sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme nivāseyya. Te nivāsento
tika-s0304t:416_2: pana tesaṃ bahussutānaṃ yathā paccayehi kilamatho na hoti. Evaṃ annañca pānañca vatthasenāsanāni
tika-s0304t:416_3: ca dadeyya ujubhūtesu ajjhāsayasampannesu kammaphalānaṃ ratanattayaguṇānañca saddahanena
tika-s0304t:416_4: vippasannena cetasā. Idāni gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ aññamaññūpakārataṃ dassetuṃ “te tassā”ti
tika-s0304t:416_5: gāthamāha. Tattha teti bahussutā. Tassāti upāsakassa. Dhammaṃ desentīti sakalavaṭṭadukkhapanūdanaṃ
tika-s0304t:416_6: niyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ kathenti. Yaṃ so dhammaṃ idhaññāyāti so puggalo yaṃ saddhammaṃ
tika-s0304t:416_7: imasmiṃ sāsane sammāpaṭipajjanena jānitvā aggamaggādhigamena anāsavo hutvā parinibbāyati.
tika-s0304t:417_0: Āvāseti āvāsadāne. Ānisaṃsoti udrayo. Pūjāsakkāravasena paṭhamayāmo khepito, satthu
tika-s0304t:417_1: dhammadesanāya appāvaseso majjhimayāmo gatoti pāḷiyaṃ “bahudeva ratti”nti vuttanti
tika-s0304t:417_2: āha “atirekataraṃ diyaḍḍhayāma”nti. Saṅgahaṃ nārohati vipulavitthārabhāvato. Buddhānañhi
tika-s0304t:417_3: bhattānumodanāpi thokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vuccamānā dīghamajjhimapamāṇāpi hoti. Tathā hi
tika-s0304t:417_4: suphusitaṃ dantāvaraṇaṃ, jivhā tanukā, bhavaṅgaparivāso paritto, natthi vegāyitaṃ,
tika-s0304t:417_5: natthi vitthāyitaṃ, natthi abyāvaṭamano, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ samupabyūḷhaṃ, aparikkhayā paṭisambhidā.
tika-s0304t:418_0: Sandassetvātiādīsu sandassetvā āvāsadānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā. Tato
tika-s0304t:418_1: paraṃ, mahārāja, itipi sīlaṃ, itipi samādhi, itipi paññāti sīlādiguṇe tesaṃ sammā
tika-s0304t:418_2: dassetvā hatthena gahetvā viya paccakkhato pakāsetvā. Samādapetvāti evaṃ sīlaṃ samādātabbaṃ,
tika-s0304t:418_3: sīle patiṭṭhitena evaṃ samādhipaññā bhāvetabbāti yathā te sīlādiguṇe sammā ādiyanti,
tika-s0304t:418_4: tathā gaṇhāpetvā. Samuttejetvāti yathāsamādinnaṃ sīlaṃ suvisuddhaṃ hoti, samathavipassanā
tika-s0304t:418_5: ca bhāviyamānā yathā suṭṭhu visodhitā uparūpari visesāvahā honti, evaṃ samuttejetvā
tika-s0304t:418_6: nisāmanavasena vodāpetvā. Sampahaṃsetvāti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ ṭhitasīlādiguṇehi sampati
tika-s0304t:418_7: paṭiladdhaguṇānisaṃsehi ceva upariladdhabbaphalavisesehi ca cittaṃ sampahaṃsetvā
tika-s0304t:418_8: laddhassāsavasena suṭṭhu tosetvā. Evametesaṃ padānaṃ attho veditabbo. Sakyarājāno
tika-s0304t:418_9: yebhuyyena bhagavato dhammadesanāya sāsane laddhassādā laddhappatiṭṭhā ca.
tika-s0304t:419: Upasaggasaddānaṃ anekatthattā abhi-saddo ati-saddena samānatthopi hotīti vuttaṃ “abhikkantāti atikkantā”ti.
tika-s0304t:420_0: Tatra kirātiādi kecivādoti baddhopi na hoti. Tenāha “akāraṇameta”ntiādi. Kāyacittalahutādayo
tika-s0304t:420_1: uppajjantīti idaṃ kāyikacetasikaaññathābhāvassa kāraṇavacanaṃ, lahutādiuppanne savanānuttariyapaṭilābhena
tika-s0304t:421_0: “Yathā, yathāvuso, bhikkhuno satthā vā dhammaṃ deseti aññataro vā garuṭṭhāniko sabrahmacārī,
tika-s0304t:421_1: tathā tathā so tasmiṃ dhamme labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ, labhati dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojja”ntiādi.
tika-s0304t:422_0: Piṭṭhivāto uppajji upādinnasarīrassa tathārūpattā saṅkhārānañca aniccatāya dukkhānubandhattā.
tika-s0304t:422_1: Akāraṇaṃ vā etanti yenādhippāyena vuttaṃ, tameva adhippāyaṃ vivarituṃ “pahotī”tiādi
tika-s0304t:422_2: vuttaṃ. Ekapallaṅkena nisīdituṃ pahoti yathā taṃ veluvagāmake. Ettake ṭhāneti ettake
tika-s0304t:422_3: ṭhāne ṭhānaṃ nipphannanti yojanā. Tañca khoti vuṭṭhānasaññaṃ citte ṭhapanaṃ. Dhammakathaṃ
tika-s0304t:423_0: Avassutassāti avassutabhāvassa rāgādivasena. Avassutassa kāraṇanti tintabhāvakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0304t:423_1: Kilesādhimuccanenāti kilesavasena paripphanditavasena. Nibbāpanaṃ viyāti vūpasamo
tika-s0304t:426_1: kiṃ dukkhaṃ, kā dukkhadhammāti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ “pañcasu hī”ti vuttaṃ. Teti pañcakkhandhā.
tika-s0304t:426_2: Dukkhasambhavadhammattāti dukkhuppattikāraṇattā. Assāti tena. Karaṇe hetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-s0304t:426_3: Kāmeti vatthukāme kilesakāme ca. Puna assāti sāmiatthe eva sāmivacanaṃ. Cāranti cittācāraṃ.
tika-s0304t:426_4: Vihāranti pañcadvārappavatticāravihāraṃ. “Ekaṭṭhā”ti ca vadanti. Teneva hi “anubandhitvā
tika-s0304t:426_5: carantaṃ”icceva vuttaṃ. Anubandhitvāti ca vīthicittappavattito paṭṭhāya yāva tatiyajavanavārā
tika-s0304t:426_6: anu anu bandhitvā. Pakkhandanādīti ādi-saddena kasigorakkhādivasenapi kāmānaṃ pariyesanadukkhaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0304t:427: Dāyatīti dāyo, vanaṃ. Tenāha “aṭavi”nti. Kaṇṭakagabbhanti ovarakasadisaṃ vanaṃ. Nāmapadaṃ nāma kiriyāpadāpekkhanti “vijjhī”ti vacanasesena kiriyāpadaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0304t:428_1: satiyā. Kāci kilesāti cuddasavidhe cittassa kicce javanakicce eva cittakilesānaṃ
tika-s0304t:428_2: uppattiṃ katvā tathā vuttaṃ. Niggahitāva honti pavattituṃ appadānavasena. Tenāha
tika-s0304t:428_3: “na saṇṭhātuṃ sakkontī”ti. Cakkhudvārasminti pāḷiyaṃ tassa paṭhamaṃ gahitatāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0304t:428_4: tena nayena sesadvārānipi gahitāneva honti. Rāgādīsu uppannesu paṭhamajavanavāre.
tika-s0304t:428_5: Satisammosena “kilesā me uppannā”ti ñatvā tathā paccāmāsasatiyā labbhanato. Tenāha
tika-s0304t:428_6: – “anacchariyaṃ ceta”nti. Āvaṭṭetvāti ayoniso āvaṭṭetvā. Āvajjanādīsūti tato eva
tika-s0304t:428_7: ayoniso āvajjanādīsu uppannesu iṭṭhārammaṇassa laddhattā paccayasiddhiyā sampattaṃ
tika-s0304t:428_8: pavattanārahaṃ. Nivattetvāti dutiyajavanavārepi kilesuppattiṃ nivattetvā. Kathaṃ
tika-s0304t:428_9: panassa evaṃ laddhuṃ sakkāti āha “āraddhavipassakānaṃ hī”tiādi. Bhāvanāpaṭisaṅkhāneti
tika-s0304t:428_10: bhāvanāyaṃ paṭisaṅkhāne ca yogino patiṭṭhitabhāvo. Tassa ayamānisaṃso – yaṃ paccayalābhena
tika-s0304t:428_11: uppajjituṃ laddhokāsāpi kilesā pubbe pavattabhāvanānubhāvena vikkhambhitā tathā tathā
tika-s0304t:428_12: niggahitā eva hutvā nivattanti, kusalā dhammāva laddhokāsā uparūpari vaḍḍhanti.
tika-s0304t:429_0: Abhihaṭṭhunti abhiharitvā. Anudahantīti anudahantā viya honti. Anusentīti etthāpi
tika-s0304t:429_1: eseva nayo. Anāvaṭṭanteti anivattante sāmaññatoti adhippāyo. Vipassanābalameva dīpitaṃ
tika-s0304t:432_1: nānādassanaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ, “dassananti paṭhamamaggassetaṃ adhivacana”nti. Tayidaṃ
tika-s0304t:432_2: uparimaggesu bhāvanāpariyāyassa niruḷhattā paṭhamamaggassa paṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanato.
tika-s0304t:432_3: Tenāha “paṭhamamaggo hī”tiādi. Koci yathāvuttaṃ aviparītaṃ atthaṃ ajānanto ñāṇadassanaṃ
tika-s0304t:432_4: nāma ārammaṇakaraṇassa vasena atippasaṅgaṃ āsaṅkeyyāti taṃ nivattetuṃ “gotrabhū panā”tiādi
tika-s0304t:432_5: vuttaṃ. Na dassananti vuccatīti ettha rājadassanaṃ udāharanti. Cattāropi maggā dassanameva
tika-s0304t:432_6: yathāvuttenatthena, bhāvanāpariyāyo pana upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ paṭhamamaggaupāyassa
tika-s0304t:432_7: bhāvanākārena pavattanato. Dassanaṃ visuddhi etthāti dassanavisuddhikaṃ, nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0304t:432_8: Phassāyatanaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ assa atthīti phassāyatanakammaṭṭhāniko. Esa nayo sesesupi padesu.
tika-s0304t:433_1: diṭṭhe rūpapariggaho, cakkhuviññāṇādike taṃsahagatadhammamatte diṭṭhe arūpapariggaho
tika-s0304t:434_0: Adhigatamaggameva kathesīti yena mukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ akāsi, tamevassa mukhaṃ
tika-s0304t:434_1: kathesi. Ayaṃ panāti kammaṭṭhānaṃ pucchanto bhikkhu. Imesanti phassāyatanakammaṭṭhānikapañcakkhandhakammaṭṭhānikānaṃ
tika-s0304t:434_2: vacanaṃ. “Aññamaññaṃ na sametī”ti vatvā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti “paṭhamenā”tiādinā.
tika-s0304t:434_3: Pañcakkhandhavimuttassa saṅkhārassa abhāvā “nippadesesū”ti vuttaṃ. Tathevāti yatheva
tika-s0304t:435_0: Samappavattā dhātuyoti rasādayo sarīradhātuyo samappavattā, na visamākārasaṇṭhitā
tika-s0304t:435_2: vuttaṃ. Sammasanaṃ sabbatthakameva icchitabbaṃ. Cāribhūminti gocaraṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0304t:436_0: Kārakabhāvanti bhāvanānuyuñjanabhāvaṃ. Paṇḍurogapurisoti paṇḍurogī puriso. Ariṭṭhanti
tika-s0304t:436_1: suttaṃ. Bhesajjaṃ katvāti bhesajjapayogaṃ katvā. Karissāmīti bhesajjaṃ karissāmi.
tika-s0304t:436_2: Jhāmathuṇo viyāti daḍḍhathuṇo viya khārakajālanaddhattā taruṇamakulasantānasañchannattā.
tika-s0304t:437_0: Dakkhiṇadvāragāmeti dakkhiṇadvārasamīpe gāme. Lohitakoti lohitavaṇṇo. Ocirakajātoti
tika-s0304t:437_1: jātaolambamānacirako viya. Ādinnasipāṭikoti gahitaphalapotako. Sandacchāyoti bahalacchāyo.
tika-s0304t:437_2: Yasmā tassa rukkhassa sākhā aviraḷā ghanappattā aññamaññaṃ saṃsanditvā ṭhitā, tasmā
tika-s0304t:437_3: chāyāpissa tādisīti vuttaṃ “sandacchāyo nāma saṃsanditvā ṭhitacchāyo”ti, ghanacchāyoti
tika-s0304t:438_0: Yena yenākārena adhimuttānanti chaphassāyatanādimukhena yena yena vipassanābhinivesena
tika-s0304t:438_1: vipassantānaṃ nibbānañca adhimuttānaṃ. Suṭṭhu visuddhaṃ pariññātisamayādisiddhiyā.
tika-s0304t:438_2: Tena tenevākārenāti attanādhimuttākārena. Idāni taṃ taṃ ākāraṃ upamāya saddhiṃ yojetvā
tika-s0304t:439_0: Idanti nagaropamaṃ. Taṃ sallakkhitanti kiṃsukopamadīpitaṃ atthajātaṃ sace sallakkhitaṃ.
tika-s0304t:439_1: Assa bhikkhuno. Dhammadesanatthanti yathāsallakkhitassa atthassa vasena laddhavisesassa
tika-s0304t:439_2: upabrūhanāya. Tassevatthassāti tassa dassanavisuddhisaṅkhātassa atthassa. Corāsaṅkā
tika-s0304t:439_3: na honti majjhimadesarajjassa pasannabhāvato. Tipurisubbedhānīti ubbedhena tipurisappamāṇāni
tika-s0304t:439_7: “Ime āvāsikā, ime āgantukā, tatthāpi ca imehi nagarassa nagarasāmikassa ca attho.
tika-s0304t:439_8: Imesaṃ vasena anattho siyā”ti jānanañāṇasaṅkhātena paṇḍiccena samannāgato. Aññātanivāraṇe
tika-s0304t:440_0: Raññā āyutto niyojito rājāyutto, tattha tattha rañño kātabbakicce ṭhapitapuriso.
tika-s0304t:440_1: Katipāheyevāti katipayadivaseyeva akiccakaraṇena tassa ṭhānaṃ vibbhamo jātoti katvā
tika-s0304t:441_0: Sīsamassa chindāhīti sīsabhūtaṃ uttamaṅgaṭṭhāniyaṃ tattha tassa rājakiccaṃ chindāti
tika-s0304t:441_1: attho. Aññathā tassa pākatike atthe gayhamāne pāṇātipāto āṇatto nāma siyā. Na hi
tika-s0304t:441_2: cakkavattirājā tādisaṃ āṇāpeti, aññesampi tato nivārakattā. Atha vā chindāhīti mama
tika-s0304t:441_3: āṇāya assa sīsaṃ chindanto viya attānaṃ dassehi, evaṃ so tatthovādapaṭikarattapatto
tika-s0304t:441_4: odameyyāti, tathā ceva upari paṭipatti āgatā. Tatthāti etasmiṃ paccantimanagare.
tika-s0304t:443_0: Tassevāti sakkāyasaṅkhātassa nagarassa “dvārānī”ti vuttānīti ānetvā sambandho. “Sīghaṃ
tika-s0304t:443_1: dūtayuga”nti vuttāti yojanā. Hadayavatthurūpassa majjhe siṅghāṭakabhāvena gahitattā
tika-s0304t:443_2: “hadayavatthussa nissayabhūtānaṃ mahābhūtāna”nti vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ vatthurūpameva
tika-s0304t:443_3: gahetabbaṃ, tadevettha aggahetvā kasmā mahābhūtaggahaṇanti āha “vatthurūpassa hī”tiādi.
tika-s0304t:443_4: Yādisoti sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ vasena yādiso eva pubbe āgatavipassanāmaggo. “Ayampi aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatattā
tika-s0304t:443_5: tādiso evā”ti vatvā ariyamaggo “yathāgatamaggo”ti vutto. Idaṃ tāvetthāti ettha etasmiṃ
tika-s0304t:443_6: sutte dhammadesanatthaṃ ābhatāya yathāvuttaupamāya idaṃ saṃsandanaṃ.
tika-s0304t:444_0: Idaṃ saṃsandananti idāni vakkhamānaṃ upamāya saṃsandanaṃ. Nagarasāmiupamā pañcakkhandhavasena
tika-s0304t:444_1: dassanavisuddhipattaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dassetuṃ ābhatā. Siṅghāṭakūpamā catumahābhūtavasena
tika-s0304t:444_2: dassanavisuddhipattaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dassetuṃ ābhatāti yojanā. “Catusaccameva kathita”nti
tika-s0304t:444_3: vatvā tāni saccāni niddhāretvā dassetuṃ “sakalenapi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Idha nagarasambhāro
tika-s0304t:444_4: chadvārādayo. Tena hi chaphassāyatanādayo upamitā. Te pana dukkhasaccapariyāpannāti
tika-s0304t:447_0: 246. Bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vāti kāmaṃ pāḷiyaṃ parisādvayameva gahitaṃ, sesaparisānaṃ
tika-s0304t:447_1: pana tadaññesampi devamanussānanti sabbasādhāraṇovāyaṃ dhammasaṅgahoti imamatthaṃ
tika-s0304t:447_2: upamāpubbakaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “yathā nāmā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Yajantoti dadanto. Vinditabboti
tika-s0304t:448_0: Chandoti taṇhāchando. Tenāha – “dubbalataṇhā so rañjetuṃ na sakkotī”ti. Pubbuppattikā
tika-s0304t:448_1: ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe paṭhamaṃ uppannā. Sā hi anāsevanattā mandā. Soti chando. Rañjetuṃ
tika-s0304t:448_2: na sakkoti laddhāsevanattā. Doso nāma cittadūsanattā. Tānīti daṇḍādānādīni. Tammūlakāti
tika-s0304t:448_5: saṃkilesadhammā gahitāva honti taṃmūlakattā. Yasmā pana sabbepi saṃkilesadhammā dvādasākusalacittuppādapariyāpannā
tika-s0304t:448_6: eva, tasmā tesampettha gahitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “chando rāgoti vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t:449_0: Bhāyitabbaṭṭhena sabhayo. Bheravaṭṭhena sappaṭibhayo. Kusalapakkhassa vikkhambhanaṭṭhena
tika-s0304t:449_2: appadānabhāvato ummaggo. Duggatigāmimaggattā kummaggo. Iriyanāti vattanā paṭipajjanā.
tika-s0304t:449_3: Duggatigāmitāya kileso eva kilesamaggo. Na sakkā sampattibhavaṃ gantuṃ kuto nibbānagamananti adhippāyo.
tika-s0304t:450_0: Asubhāvajjanādīhīti ādi-saddena aniccamanasikārādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Cittaṃ
tika-s0304t:450_1: nivattati sarāgacittaṃ na uppajjati paṭipakkhamanasikārena vinoditattā. Majjhattārammaṇeti
tika-s0304t:450_2: aññāṇupekkhaṭṭhāniye ārammaṇe. Uddesa…pe… āvajjantassāti uddisāpanavasena uddesaṃ,
tika-s0304t:450_3: paripucchāpanavasena paripucchaṃ, garūnaṃ santike vasanavasena garuvāsaṃ āvajjantassa.
tika-s0304t:451: Yathā “pujjabhavaphalaṃ puñña”nti vuttaṃ “evamidaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī”ti, evaṃ kiṭṭhasambhavattā “kiṭṭha”nti vuttanti āha “kiṭṭhanti kiṭṭhaṭṭhāne uppannasassa”nti.
tika-s0304t:452: Ghaṭāti siṅgayugaṃ idhādhippetanti āha “dvinnaṃ siṅgānaṃ antare”ti. Ghaṭāti goṇādīnaṃ siṅgantaraṭṭhassa samaññāti vadanti. Nāsārajjuketi nāsārajjupātaṭṭhāne.
tika-s0304t:453: Dameti puthuttārammaṇato nivāreti. Nanti cittaṃ. Yaṃ suttaṃ subhāsitaṃ mayā. Tadassāti tadā assa bhikkhuno. Ārammaṇeti kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe.
tika-s0304t:454_0: Sudujitanti nibbisevanabhāvakaraṇena jitaṃ. Sutajjitanti suṭṭhu dūrakaraṇena jitaṃ,
tika-s0304t:454_1: tathābhūtañca tajjitaṃ nāma hotīti tathā vuttaṃ. Gocarajjhattanti ajjhattabhūto gocaro.
tika-s0304t:454_3: anurakkhaṇaṃ etassāti samathānurakkhaṇaṃ. Yathā indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ samathānurakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0304t:454_4: hoti, tathā kathitanti attho. Yathā hi indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ samathassa paccayo, evaṃ
tika-s0304t:455_0: Vādiyamānāya vīṇāya. Cittaṃ rañjetīti rajjanena. Avissajjanīyatāya cittaṃ bandhatīti
tika-s0304t:455_1: bandhanīyo. Veṭṭhaketi tantīnaṃ āsajjanaveṭṭhake. Koṇanti kavaṇato vīṇāya saddakaraṇato
tika-s0304t:455_2: koṇanti laddhanāmaṃ dārudaṇḍaṃ siṅgādīsu yena kenaci kataṃ ghaṭikaṃ. Tenāha “caturassaṃ sāradaṇḍaka”nti.
tika-s0304t:456: Yasmā so rājā rājamahāmatto vā saddaṃ yathāsabhāvato na aññāsi, tasmiṃ tassa ajānanākārameva dassetuṃ “saddaṃ passissāmī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t:457_0: Asatī kirāyanti pāḷiyaṃ liṅgavipallāsena vuttanti yathāliṅgameva vadanto “asā”ti
tika-s0304t:457_1: āha. “Asatīti lāmakādhivacana”nti vatvā tattha payogaṃ dassetuṃ “asā lokitthiyo nāmā”ti
tika-s0304t:457_2: vuttaṃ, loke itthiyo nāma asatiyoti attho, tattha kāraṇamāha “velā tāsaṃ na vijjatī”ti.
tika-s0304t:457_3: Pakatiyā loke jeṭṭhabhātā kaniṭṭhabhātā mātulotiādikā velā mariyādā tāsaṃ na vijjati.
tika-s0304t:457_4: Kasmā? Sārattā ca pagabbā ca sabbesampi sambhogavasena viniyogaṃ gacchanti. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0304t:460: Aññampi tantibaddhaṃ caturassaambaṇavāditādīni. Vīṇā viya pañcakkhandhā anekadhammasamūhabhāvato. Rājā viya yogāvacaro tappaṭibaddhadhammagavesakattā. Assāti yogāvacarassa.
tika-s0304t:461_0: Nirayādito aññasmimpi gati-saddo vattati. Tato visesanatthaṃ “gatigatī”ti vuttaṃ
tika-s0304t:461_1: “dukkhadukkhaṃ, rūparūpa”nti ca yathā, gatisaññitaṃ pavattiṭṭhānanti attho. Tenāha
tika-s0304t:461_2: – “etthantare saṃsarati vattatī”ti. Sañjāyanapadeso eva gatīti sañjātigati.
tika-s0304t:462_0: Taṃ pana gatiṃ sattānaṃ saṃvegavatthubhūtassa paccakkhassa gabbhāsayassa vasena dassetuṃ
tika-s0304t:462_1: “ayamassa kāyo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Rūpadhammassa salakkhaṇaṃ gati niṭṭhā, tato paraṃ aññaṃ
tika-s0304t:462_2: kiñci natthīti salakkhaṇagati. Abhāvo accantābhāvo. Santānavicchedo vibhavagati taṃniṭṭhānabhāvā.
tika-s0304t:462_3: Bhedoti khaṇanirodho, idhāpi taṃniṭṭhānatāyeva pariyāyo. Yāva bhavaggāti yāva sabbabhavaggā.
tika-s0304t:462_4: Salakkhaṇavibhavagatibhedagatiyo “eseva nayo”ti imināva pakāsitāti na gahitā. Tassa
tika-s0304t:463_0: Sīlaṃ kathitaṃ rūpādīsu chandādinivāraṇassa kathitattā. Majjhe samādhibhāvanā kathitā
tika-s0304t:463_1: “ajjhattameva santiṭṭhati…pe… samādhiyatī”ti jotitattā. Pariyosāne ca nibbānaṃ kathitaṃ
tika-s0304t:466_0: 247. Vaṇasarīroti vaṇitasarīro. Pakkattāti kuthitattā. Saradaṇḍesu sarasamaññāti
tika-s0304t:466_1: kaṇḍa-saddo sarapariyāyoti āha – “saravananti kaṇḍavana”nti. Arugatto…pe… veditabbo
tika-s0304t:466_2: guṇasarīrassa khaṇḍachiddasīlādīhi heṭṭhā majjhe uparibhāge ca bhedavisamacchinnavikāradosattā.
tika-s0304t:466_3: Ettha kusā “kaṇṭakā”ti adhippetā kaṇṭakasadisattā, kusatiṇānaṃ eva vā vuttākārapadeso
tika-s0304t:467: Gāmavāsīnaṃ vijjhanaṭṭhenāti nārahova hutvā tesaṃ kārānaṃ paṭiggahaṇavasena pīḷanaṭṭhena.
tika-s0304t:468: Pakkhinti hatthiliṅgasakuṇaṃ. Tassa kira hatthisoṇḍasadisaṃ mukhaṃ, tasmā “hatthisoṇḍasakuṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Vissajjeyyāti rajjuyā yathābaddhaṃ eva vissajjeyya.
tika-s0304t:469_0: Bhogehīti attano sarīrabhogehi. Maṇḍalaṃ bandhitvāti yathā sarīraṃ maṇḍalākārena
tika-s0304t:469_1: tiṭṭhati, evaṃ katvā. Supissāmīti niddaṃ okkamissāmi. Ḍetukāmoti uppatitukāmo. Disā
tika-s0304t:470_0: Cha pāṇakā viya cha āyatanāni nānajjhāsayattā, nānajjhāsayatā ca nesaṃ nānāvisayaninnatāya
tika-s0304t:470_1: daṭṭhabbā. Daḷharajju viya taṇhā tesaṃ bandhanato. Majjhe gaṇṭhi viya avijjā bandhanassa
tika-s0304t:470_2: dubbinimmocanahetuto. Ārammaṇaṃ balavaṃ hoti manuññabhāvena ceva tattha taṇhābhinivesassa daḷhabhāvena ca.
tika-s0304t:471: Sarikkhakena vā upamāya āharaṇapakkhe. Appanāti saṃsandanā. Pāḷiyaṃyeva appitā upamā “evameva kho”tiādinā. Rūpacittādivisamaninnattā cakkhussa visamajjhāsayatā. Esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-s0304t:472_0: Kaṇṇacchiddakūpaketi kaṇṇacchiddasaññite āvāṭe. Tassāti sotassa. Paccayo hotīti upanissayo
tika-s0304t:472_1: hoti tena vinā saddaggahaṇassa abhāvato. “Ajaṭākāsopi vaṭṭati evā”ti vatvā tassa
tika-s0304t:472_2: paccayabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “antoleṇasmi”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Dhātuparamparā ghaṭṭentoti bhūtaparamparāsaṅghaṭṭento.
tika-s0304t:473_0: Evaṃ santeti evaṃ bhūtaparamparāvasena sadde sotapathamāgacchante. Sampattagocaratā
tika-s0304t:473_1: hoti sotassa. Ghānādīnaṃ viya “dūre saddo”ti jānanaṃ na sambhaveyya sampattagāhibhāvato.
tika-s0304t:473_2: Tathā tathā jānanākāro hoti manoviññāṇassa gahaṇākāravisesato. Sotaviññāṇappavatti
tika-s0304t:473_3: pana ubhayattha samānāva. Dūre ṭhitopi saddo tādise ṭhāne paṭighosādīnaṃ paccayo
tika-s0304t:473_4: hoti ayokanto viya ayocalanassāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dhammatāti dhammasabhāvo, saddassa
tika-s0304t:473_5: so sabhāvoti attho. Tato tato savanaṃ hoti ākāsasaññitassa upanissayassa labbhanato.
tika-s0304t:473_6: Yadi pana sotaṃ sampattagāhī siyā, cittasamuṭṭhānasaddo sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayo
tika-s0304t:473_7: na siyā. Paṭṭhāne ca avisesena “saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti
tika-s0304t:473_8: vutto, bahiddhā ca cittajassa saddassa sambhavo natthi. Atha vā cittajo saddo dhātuparamparāya
tika-s0304t:473_9: sotapasādaṃ ghaṭṭeti, na so cittajo saddo, yo paramparāya pavatto. Utujo hi so, tasmā
tika-s0304t:473_10: yathuppanno saddo, tattha ṭhitova sotapasādassa āpāthaṃ āgacchatīti niṭṭhamettha
tika-s0304t:474_0: Tadā ekaggacittataṃ āpajjati parissayānaṃ abhāvato. Nāsacchiddasaṅkhātaākāsasannissaye
tika-s0304t:474_1: vattanato ghānaṃ ākāsajjhāsayaṃ vuttaṃ. Vātena vinā gandhagahaṇassa asambhavato vātūpanissayagandhagocaraṃ.
tika-s0304t:475_0: Gāmato laddhabbaṃ āhāraṃ gāmaṃ, tanninnatāya gāmajjhāsayatā vuttā. Tathā hi jīvitanimittaṃ
tika-s0304t:475_1: raso jīvitaṃ, tasmiṃ ninnatāya taṃ avhāyatīti jivhā. Na sakkā kheḷena atemitassa
tika-s0304t:476_1: pathaviyā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇe ghaṭite eva tattha viññāṇuppatti, na aññathāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0304t:476_3: sādhakaṃ. Ajjhattikabāhirāti ajjhattikā bāhirā vā. Assāti kāyassa. Susanthatassātiādi
tika-s0304t:477_0: Nānajjhāsayoti nānārammaṇaninno. Tena manassa makkaṭassa viya anavaṭṭhitataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0304t:477_2: manassa. Evaṃ kiriyamayaṃ viññāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nānattanti bhedo.
tika-s0304t:478_1: abhāvaṃ. Nākaḍḍhatīti savisaye rūpārammaṇe cittasantānaṃ, taṃsamaṅginaṃ vā puggalaṃ
tika-s0304t:478_2: nākaḍḍhati. Pubbabhāgavipassanāva kathitā āyatanamukhena “evañhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba”nti vuttattā.
tika-s0304t:481_0: 248. Yavapuñjo suparipakkayavasamudāyo. Kājahatthāti daṇḍahatthā. Potheyyunti yathā
tika-s0304t:481_1: yavasaṅkhātaṃ dhaññaṃ vaṇṭato muccati, evaṃ potheyyuṃ. Yave sāvetvāti yavasīsato
tika-s0304t:482_0: Catumahāpatho viya cha āyatanāni ārammaṇadaṇḍakehi hananaṭṭhānattā. Yavakalāpī viya
tika-s0304t:482_1: satto tehi haññamānattā. Cha byābhaṅgiyo viya sabhāvato chadhāpi paccekaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhattavasena
tika-s0304t:482_2: aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇāni yavakalāpaṭṭhāniyassa sattassa hananato. Bhavapatthanāya aparāparuppattiṃ
tika-s0304t:482_3: sandhāya “bhavapatthanā kilesā”ti bahuvacananiddeso. Bhavapatthanā ca tassa paccayabhūtā
tika-s0304t:482_4: kilesā cāti bhavapatthanākilesāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Yasmā sattānaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ
tika-s0304t:482_5: nāma sabbampi taṃ bhavapatthanāmūlakaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ “evaṃ sattā”tiādi. Bhavapatthanakilesāti
tika-s0304t:483_0: Bhummanti samīpatthe bhummaṃ. Tenāha “sudhammāya dvāre”ti. Na katanti dukkhuppādanaṃ
tika-s0304t:483_1: na kataṃ. Navagūthasūkaraṃ viyāti navagūthabhakkhasūkaraṃ viya. Cittenevāti yo bajjhati,
tika-s0304t:483_2: tassa citteneva. Tasmāti yasmā vepacittibandhanassa bandhanamuccanaṃ viya, tasmā
tika-s0304t:483_3: “vepacittibandhana”nti vuttaṃ. Ñāṇamokkhaṃ bandhananti ñāṇena muccanaṃ bandhanaṃ.
tika-s0304t:484_0: Maññamānoti parikappitataṇhāvasena “etaṃ mamā”ti, diṭṭhivasena “eso me attā”ti, mānavasena
tika-s0304t:484_2: vuttaṃ. Etanti “mārassā”ti etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Kilesamārena baddhoti kilesamārena teneva
tika-s0304t:484_3: kilesabandhanena baddho. Muttoti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0304t:485_0: Taṇhāmaññanāya sati diṭṭhimānamaññanānaṃ pasaṅgo eva natthīti yathā “asmī”ti padena
tika-s0304t:485_1: diṭṭhimānamaññanā vuttā honti, evaṃ taṇhāmaññitāpīti vuttaṃ “asmīti padena taṇhāmaññitaṃ
tika-s0304t:485_2: vutta”nti. Ayamahamasmīti padena diṭṭhimaññitanti etarahi labbhamānadiṭṭhivatthuvaseneva.
tika-s0304t:485_4: anāgatāliṅganā sassatadiṭṭhi. Ucchedavasena diṭṭhimaññitamevāti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0304t:485_5: Rūpītiādīni padāni. Sassatassevāti sassatagāhasseva pabhedadīpanāni. Yasmā maññitaṃ
tika-s0304t:485_6: ābādhavasena rogo, antodosavasena gaṇḍo, aṅganikantavasena sallaṃ, tasmā imehi taṇhādīhi
tika-s0304t:485_7: kilesehi pākaṭacalanavasena iñjanti ceva, apākaṭasañcalanavasena phandanti ca. Papañcitaṃ
tika-s0304t:485_8: saṃsāre cirāyanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, khandhasantānassa vā vitthāraṇaṃ. Pamattākārappattā
tika-s0304t:486_1: kasmā vuttaṃ? Nanu sabbo māno taṇhāsampayutto? Sati hi byabhicāre visesanaṃ icchitabbanti.
tika-s0304t:486_2: Saccametaṃ, taṇhā pana atthi mānassa paccayabhūtā, atthi mānassa appaccayabhūtā,
tika-s0304t:486_3: yato māno aniyato vuccati. Tathā hi paṭṭhāne “saṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojano
tika-s0304t:486_4: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā”ti ettha saṃyojanāni saṃyojanehi yathālābhaṃ yojetvā
tika-s0304t:486_7: avijjāsaṃyojana”nti ca vatvā “bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaṃyojana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t:486_8: Ettha ca kāmarāgabhavarāgasaṃyojanehi mānassa aniyatabhāvo pakāsito. Tattha yā taṇhā
tika-s0304t:486_9: balavatī, taṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “taṇhāya sampayuttamānavasenā”ti. Balavataṇhāsampayutto
tika-s0304t:486_10: hi māno sayampi balavā hutvā asmīti savisesaṃ majjanavasena pavattatīti.
tika-s0304t:487_1: puggalassa rūpādīsu ekaṃ uddissa ayamahamasmīti diṭṭhiyā uppannāya mānassa appahīnattā
tika-s0304t:487_2: mānopi tattha tattheva uppajjati. Iti mānamūlakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ sandhāyāha “ayamahamasmīti
tika-s0304t:487_3: diṭṭhivasena vutta”nti. Codako pana imamatthaṃ ajānanto anupalabbhamānameva sampayogatthaṃ
tika-s0304t:487_4: gahetvā “nanu cā”tiādinā codeti. Itaro “āma natthī”ti tamatthaṃ sampaṭicchitvā “mānassa
tika-s0304t:497_0: 249. Vedanā ca pajānātīti saccābhisambodhavasena vuccamānavedanānaṃ pajānanaṃ sātisayasamādhānapubbakanti
tika-s0304t:497_1: bhagavatā “samāhito”ti vuttanti āha “upacārena vā appanāya vā samāhito”ti. Vedanāti
tika-s0304t:497_2: tissopi vedanā. Dukkhasaccavasenāti dukkhasaccabhāvena, parijānanavasenāti attho.
tika-s0304t:497_4: pajānātī”ti. Yatthāti yaṃnimittaṃ, yaṃ āgamma kāmataṇhāvijjādinirodhā vedanānirodho,
tika-s0304t:497_5: tesaṃ ayaṃ nirodho. Nibbānaṃ ārabbha ariyamaggappavattiyā hi nibbānaṃ vedanānirodhoti
tika-s0304t:497_6: vutto. Khayaṃ gametīti khayagāmī, taṃ khayagāminaṃ. Chātaṃ vuccati taṇhā kāmānaṃ
tika-s0304t:497_7: pātukāmatāvasena pavattanato, accantameva samucchinnattā natthi etasmiṃ chātanti
tika-s0304t:497_9: padehīti “samāhito sampajāno”ti imehi dvīhi. “Sato”ti pana idaṃ sampajānapadasseva
tika-s0304t:497_10: upabrūhananti adhippāyo. Sesehi catūhi catusaccaṃ kathitaṃ, itarehi pana dvīhi catusaccabujjhanameva
tika-s0304t:497_11: kathitaṃ. Sabbasaṅgāhikoti sabbasabhāvadhammānaṃ saṅgaṇhanako. Tenāha “catubhūmakadhammaparicchedo vutto”ti.
tika-s0304t:500_0: 250. Dukkhaṃ na hotīti adukkhaṃ, sukhaṃ na hotīti asukhaṃ, ma-kāro padasandhikaro.
tika-s0304t:500_2: ajjhattabahiddhāgahaṇanti āha “attano ca parassa cā”ti. Tena sabbampi vedayitaṃ gahitanti
tika-s0304t:500_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nassanasabhāvanti ittarakhaṇatāya bhaṅgato uddhaṃ apassitabbasabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0304t:500_4: Paloko bhedo etassa atthīti palokinaṃ. Tenāha “bhijjanasabhāva”nti. Ñāṇena phusitvā
tika-s0304t:500_5: phusitvāti pubbabhāge vipassanāñāṇena aniccā pabhaṅgunoti ārammaṇato, uttarakālaṃ
tika-s0304t:500_6: asammohato maggaparamparāya phusitvā phusitvā vayaṃ passanto. Virajjatīti maggavirāgena
tika-s0304t:500_7: virajjati. Sammasanacāravedanā kathitā āraddhavipassakānaṃ vasena desanāti. Lokiyalokuttarehi
tika-s0304t:503_0: 251. Sabbampi aṭṭhasatapabhedaṃ taṇhaṃ chindi samucchedapahānavasena pajahi. Tenāha
tika-s0304t:503_1: “samucchindī”ti. Yadaggena taṇhā sabbaso samucchinnā, tadaggena sabbānipi saññojanānīti
tika-s0304t:503_2: āha “dasavidhampī”tiādi. Sammāti suṭṭhu. Pahānañca nāma upāyena ñāyena pahānanti
tika-s0304t:503_3: āha “hetunā kāraṇenā”ti. Dassanābhisamayāti asammohapaṭivedhā. Arahattamaggo hi uppajjamānova
tika-s0304t:503_4: sabhāvapaṭicchādakaṃ mohaṃ viddhaṃsento eva pavattati, tena māno yāthāvato diṭṭho
tika-s0304t:503_5: nāma hoti, ayamassa dassanābhisamayo. Yathā hi sūriye uṭṭhite andhakāro viddhaṃsiyamāno
tika-s0304t:503_6: vihato, evaṃ arahattamagge uppajjamāne so sabbaso pahīno eva hoti, na tasmiṃ santāne
tika-s0304t:503_7: patiṭṭhaṃ labhati, ayamassa pahānābhisamayo. Tena vuttaṃ “arahattamaggo hī”tiādi.
tika-s0304t:504_0: Ye ime cattāro antāti sambandho. Mariyādantoti mariyādasaṅkhāto anto. Esa nayo sesattayepi.
tika-s0304t:504_1: Tesūti catūsu antesu. Aduṃ catutthakoṭisaṅkhātaṃ sabbasseva vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ
tika-s0304t:504_2: paricchedaṃ arahattamaggena mānassa diṭṭhattā pahīnattā ca akāsīti yojanā. Samussayo attabhāvo.
tika-s0304t:505_0: Na riñcatīti na viveceti na vissajjeti. Tenāha “sampajaññaṃ na jahatī”ti, sampajaññaṃ
tika-s0304t:505_1: na pariccajatīti attho. Saṅkhyaṃ nopetīti imassa “diṭṭhadhamme anāsavo”ti imassa
tika-s0304t:505_2: vasena atthaṃ vadanto “ratto duṭṭho”ti avoca saupādisesanibbānavasena. Saṅkhyaṃ nopetīti
tika-s0304t:505_3: vā diṭṭhe-dhamme anāsavo dhammaṭṭho vedagū kāyassa bhedā manusso devoti vā paññattiṃ
tika-s0304t:505_4: na upetīti anupādisesanibbānavasenapi attho vattabbo. Ettha ca sukhādīsu vedanāsu
tika-s0304t:505_5: yathākkamaṃ rāgānusayādayo kathitāti āha – “imasmiṃ sutte ārammaṇānusayo kathito”ti.
tika-s0304t:505_6: Yo hi rāgādi paccayasamavāye atiiṭṭhādīsu uppajjanāraho maggena appahīno, so “rāgānusayo”tiādinā
tika-s0304t:505_7: vutto, appahīnattho so maggena pahātabbo, na pariyuṭṭhānābhibhavatthoti.
tika-s0304t:508_0: 252. Yattha patiṭṭhā natthi ekantikāti ekantikassa mahato pātassa alanti ayamettha
tika-s0304t:508_1: attho adhippetoti āha “natthi ettha patiṭṭhā”ti. Asambhūtatthanti na sambhūtatthaṃ,
tika-s0304t:508_2: musāti attho. Soti assutavā puthujjano. Yaṃ taṃ udakaṃ patatīti yojanā. Yasmā samuddapiṭṭhe
tika-s0304t:508_3: antarantarā verambhavātasadiso mahāvāto uṭṭhahitvā mahāsamudde udakaṃ uggacchāpeti,
tika-s0304t:508_4: taṃ kadāci cakkavāḷābhimukhaṃ, kadāci sinerupādābhimukhaṃ gantvā taṃ patihanati,
tika-s0304t:508_5: tasmā vuttaṃ “balavāmukhaṃ mahāsamuddassā”tiādi. Vegena pakkhanditvāti mahatā vātavegena
tika-s0304t:508_6: samuddhataṃ teneva vegena pakkhandantañca hutvā. Mahānarakapapāto viyāti yojanāyāmavitthāragambhīrasobbhapapāto
tika-s0304t:508_7: viya hoti. Tathārūpānanti tattha vasituṃ samatthānaṃ. Asantanti abhūtaṃ. Atthavasena
tika-s0304t:509_0: Na patiṭṭhāsīti patiṭṭhaṃ na labhi. Anibaddhanti anibandhanatthaṃ yaṃkiñci. Dubbalañāṇoti
tika-s0304t:509_2: dhura”nti vuttaṃ. Itaresu ariyasāvakesu vattabbameva natthi. Tesañhi vedanā supariññātā.
tika-s0304t:509_3: Balavavipassako…pe… yogāvacaropi vaṭṭati mattaso vedanānaṃ pariññātattā.
tika-s0304t:512_0: 253. Vipariṇāmanavasena dukkhato daṭṭhabbāti kiñcāpi sukhā, pariṇāmadukkhatā pana
tika-s0304t:512_1: sukhavedanāya ekantikāti. Vinivijjhanaṭṭhenāti pīḷanavasena attabhāvassa vijjhanaṭṭhena.
tika-s0304t:512_2: Hutvāti paccayasamāgamena uppajjitvā. Tena pākabhāvapubbako attalābho vutto. Abhāvākārenāti
tika-s0304t:512_3: bhaṅgupagamanākārena. Tena viddhaṃsabhāvo vutto. Ubhayena udayabbayaparicchinnatāya
tika-s0304t:512_4: sikhappattaṃ aniccataṃ dasseti. Svāyaṃ hutvā abhāvākāro itarāsupi vedanāsu labbhateva,
tika-s0304t:512_5: adhiko ca pana dvinnaṃ dukkhasabhāvo. Dukkhatāvasena purimānaṃ vedanānaṃ daṭṭhabbatāya
tika-s0304t:512_6: dassitattā pacchimāya vedanāya evaṃ daṭṭhabbatā dassitā. Addāti ñāṇagatiyā sacchikatvā
tika-s0304t:512_7: adakkhi. Ñāṇagamanañhetaṃ, yadidaṃ dukkhato dassanaṃ. Santasabhāvaṃ sukhadukkhato upasantarūpattā.
tika-s0304t:515_0: 254. Dvīsu janesūti sutavantaassutavantesu dvīsu janesu. Anugatavedhanti pubbe pavattavedhassa
tika-s0304t:515_1: anugatavedhaṃ. Balavatarā diguṇā viya hutvā daḷhatarapavattiyā. Evamevāti yathā viddhassa
tika-s0304t:515_2: purisassa anuvedhanā balavatarā, evameva. Samādhimaggaphalāni nissaraṇaṃ vikkhambhanasamucchedapaṭippassaddhivasena.
tika-s0304t:515_3: Samādhisīsena hettha jhānañca gahitaṃ. So na jānāti anadhigatattā. Nissaraṇanti jānāti
tika-s0304t:515_4: anissaraṇameva. Tāsaṃ samadhigatānaṃ sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ. Na vippayutto appahīnakilesattā.
tika-s0304t:515_6: Imasmimpi sutte purimasutte viya ārammaṇānusayova kathito, so pana tattha vuttanayeneva
tika-s0304t:515_7: veditabbo. Anurodhavirodhapahānassa vuttattā khīṇāsavo dhuraṃ. Anāgāmīpi vaṭṭati,
tika-s0304t:518_0: 255. Saddahitvā gilāne upaṭṭhātabbe maññissantīti yojanā. Tatthāti tasmiṃ ṭhāne.
tika-s0304t:518_1: Kammaṭṭhānānuyogo sappāyo yesaṃ te kammaṭṭhānasappāyā, satipaṭṭhānaratāti attho.
tika-s0304t:518_2: Aniccataṃ anupassantoti kāyaṃ paṭicca uppannāya vedanāya ca aniccataṃ anupassanto.
tika-s0304t:518_3: Vayaṃ anupassantotiādīsupi eseva nayo. Vayanti pana tāya eva khayasaṅkhātaṃ. Virāganti
tika-s0304t:519_1: na lokuttarā. Sampajaññaṃ pubbabhāgiyameva. Tisso anupassanā pubbabhāgāyeva vipassanāpariyāpannattā.
tika-s0304t:522_0: 256-257. Phassaṃ paṭiccāti ettha phassasīsena phassāyatanānaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Na hi phassāyatanehi
tika-s0304t:522_1: vinā phassassa sambhavo. Tenāha “kāyova hi ettha phassoti vutto”ti, phassasīsena
tika-s0304t:522_2: vuttoti adhippāyo. Navamaṃ uttānameva heṭṭhā vuttanayattā.
tika-s0304t:525_0: 258. Sukhavedanāya hitaṃ sukhavedaniyaṃ. So panesa hitabhāvo paccayabhāvenāti āha
tika-s0304t:525_1: “sukhavedanāya paccayabhūta”nti. Imasmimpi suttadvayeti imasmiṃ navame dasame ca
tika-s0304t:525_2: suttepi. Sammasanacāravedanāti sammasanīyavedanā eva kathitā, na lokuttarāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0304t:530_0: 259. Yaṃkiñci vedayitanti “sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ adukkhamasukha”nti vuttaṃ vedayitaṃ dukkhasmiṃ
tika-s0304t:530_1: antogadhaṃ, dukkhanti vattabbataṃ labhati pariyāyenāti attho. Tenāha “taṃ sabbaṃ
tika-s0304t:530_2: dukkhanti attho”ti. Yā esātiādīsu yo saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatāsaṅkhāto hutvā abhāvākāro,
tika-s0304t:530_3: yā khayasabhāvatā vinassanasabhāvatā jarāya maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmanasabhāvatā,
tika-s0304t:530_4: etaṃ sandhāya uddissa sabbaṃ vedayitaṃ dukkhanti mayā vuttanti ayaṃ saṅkhepattho.
tika-s0304t:530_5: Sāti saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatā. Vedanānampi aniccatā eva saṅkhārasabhāvattā. Tāsaṃ aniccatā
tika-s0304t:530_6: ca nāma maraṇaṃ bhaṅgoti katvā tato uttari dukkhaṃ nāma natthīti sabbā vedanā “dukkhā”ti
tika-s0304t:530_7: vuttā, yathā “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti ca, “pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t:530_8: Idaṃ suttapadaṃ. Cattāro āruppāti catasso arūpasamāpattiyo. Etthāti ca etasmiṃ paṭippassaddhivāre.
tika-s0304t:533_0: 262. Puratthimāti vibhattilopena niddeso, nissakke vā etaṃ paccattavacanaṃ. Paṭhamajjhānādivasenāti
tika-s0304t:533_2: savitakkacārassa nirāmisassa sukhassa labbhanato. Tassapi vā paṭhamajjhānādīti ettha
tika-s0304t:533_3: ādi-saddena saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Kāmahetu dukkhappattānaṃ dukkhavedanā kāmāmisena sāmisā
tika-s0304t:533_4: vedanā. Anuttaravimokkhā nāma arahattaphalaṃ. “Kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja
tika-s0304t:533_5: viharissāmī”ti evaṃ pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato tasmiṃ anijjhamāne pihappaccayā uppannadomanassavedanā.
tika-s0304t:533_6: Nekkhammanissitā upekkhāvedanā nirāmisā adukkhamasukhā nāma. Savisesaṃ pana dassetuṃ
tika-s0304t:536_0: 263-266. Heṭṭhā kathitanayāneva, veneyyajjhāsayato pana tesaṃ desanāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0304t:536_1: Etthāti etesu catūsu suttesu. Purimāni dve “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā paṭippassaddhā
tika-s0304t:536_2: hotī”tiādinā nayena yāva khīṇāsavassa kilesapaṭippassaddhi, tāva desanāya pavattattā
tika-s0304t:536_3: “paripuṇṇapassaddhikānī”ti vuttāni. Tāva paripūraṃ katvā adesitattā “pacchimāni upaḍḍhapassaddhikāni,
tika-s0304t:539_1: pañca aṅgāni assāti pañcakaṅgo. Vatthuvijjāya vuttavidhinā kattabbanissayāni ṭhapetīti
tika-s0304t:539_2: thapati. Paṇḍitaudāyitthero, na lāḷudāyitthero. Dvepānandāti aṭṭhakathāya paduddhāro
tika-s0304t:539_3: kato – “dvepi mayā ānandā”ti pana pāḷiyaṃ. Pasādakāyasannissitā kāyikā, cetosannissitā
tika-s0304t:539_4: cetasikā. Ādhipaccaṭṭhena sukhameva indriyanti sukhindriyaṃ. Upavicāravasenāti rūpādīni
tika-s0304t:539_5: upecca vicaraṇavasena. Atīte ārammaṇe. Paccuppanneti addhāpaccuppanne. Evaṃ aṭṭhādhikaṃ sataṃ aṭṭhasataṃ.
tika-s0304t:540_0: Pāṭiyekko anusandhīti pucchānusandhiādīhi visuṃ tehi asammisso eko anusandhi. Ekāpi
tika-s0304t:540_1: vedanā kathitā “tatra, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako”ti āharitvā “phassapaccayā vedanā”ti.
tika-s0304t:540_2: Yasmā bhagavā catutthajjhānupekkhāvedanaṃ vatvā – “atthānanda, etasmā sukhā aññaṃ
tika-s0304t:540_3: sukha”ntiādiṃ vadanto thapatino vādaṃ upatthambheti nāma. Tena hi upekkhāvedanā “sukha”nteva
tika-s0304t:540_4: vuttā santasabhāvattā. Abhikkantataranti ativiya kantataraṃ manoramataraṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0304t:540_6: Sukhanti vuttā paṭipakkhassa suṭṭhu khādanena, sukaraṃ okāsadānamassāti vā. Nirodho
tika-s0304t:540_7: sukhaṃ nāma sabbaso udayabbayābhāvato. Tenāha “niddukkhabhāvasaṅkhātena sukhaṭṭhenā”ti.
tika-s0304t:541_0: Sukhasmiṃyevāti sukhamicceva paññapeti. Nirodhasamāpattiṃ sīsaṃ katvāti nirodhasamāpattidesanāya
tika-s0304t:541_1: sīsaṃ uttamaṃ katvā. Desanāya uddesādhimutte uṭṭhāpetvā vitthāritattā “neyyapuggalassa
tika-s0304t:541_2: vasenā”ti vuttaṃ. Dasamaṃ anantarasutte vuttanayattā uttānatthameva.
tika-s0304t:546_0: 269. Cūḷā pana assa mahatī atthi savisesā, tasmā “moḷiyasīvako”ti vuccati. Channaparibbājakoti
tika-s0304t:546_2: vedanā”ti vatvā tāsaṃ sambhavaṃ dassetuṃ “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Kusalavedanā uppajjati
tika-s0304t:546_3: pittapaccayā. Pittabhesajjaṃ karissāmīti bhesajjasambharaṇatthañceva tadatthaṃ āmisakiñjakkhasambharaṇatthañca
tika-s0304t:546_4: pāṇaṃ hanatīti yojanā. Majjhatto bhesajjakaraṇe udāsīno.
tika-s0304t:547_0: Tasmāti yasmā pittādipaccayahetukanti attano ca lokassa ca paccakkhaṃ atidhāvanti
tika-s0304t:547_1: ye samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā, tasmā tesaṃ micchā. Pittādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi samodhānasannipāte
tika-s0304t:547_2: jātāni sannipātikāni. Purimautuno visadiso utuvipariṇāmoti āha “visabhāgaututo jātānī”ti.
tika-s0304t:547_3: Anudako thaddhalūkhabhūmivibhāgo jaṅgaladeso, vuttavipariyāyena anupadeso veditabbo.
tika-s0304t:548_0: Attano pakaticariyānaṃ visamaṃ kāyassa pariharaṇavasena, jātāni pana asayhasahanaadesaakālacaraṇādinā
tika-s0304t:548_1: veditabbānīti āha “mahābhāravahanā”tiādi. Parassa upakkamato nibbattāni opakkamikānīti
tika-s0304t:548_2: āha – “ayaṃ coro vā”tiādi. Kevalanti bāhirapaccayaṃ anapekkhitvā kevalaṃ teneva.
tika-s0304t:548_3: Tenāha “kammavipākatova jātānī”ti. Sakkā paṭibāhituṃ patīkārena. Lokavohāro nāma
tika-s0304t:548_4: kathito pittasamuṭṭhānādisamaññāya lokasiddhattā. Kāmaṃ sarīrasannissitā vedanā kammanibbattāva,
tika-s0304t:548_5: tassā pana paccuppannapaccayavasena evamayaṃ lokavohāroti vuttañceva gahetvā paravādapaṭisedho katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0304t:551_0: 270-278. Vedanānaṃ aṭṭhādhikaṃ sataṃ, tassa aṭṭhasatassa tabbhāvassa pariyāyo kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0304t:551_1: ettha atthīti aṭṭhasatapariyāyo, suttaṃ. Tenāha “aṭṭhasatassa kāraṇabhūta”nti. Dhammakāraṇanti
tika-s0304t:551_3: labbhantī”ti, kāmabhūmikāti attho. Arūpāvacare natthi, tibhūmikāti attho. Tenāha
tika-s0304t:551_4: – “arūpe tikacatukkajjhānaṃ uppajjati, tañca kho lokuttaraṃ, na lokiya”nti. Itarā
tika-s0304t:551_5: upekkhāvedanā. Upavicaranti upecca pajjantīti attho. Taṃsampayuttānanti vicārasampayuttānaṃ.
tika-s0304t:552_0: Paṭilābhatoti paṭiladdhabhāvato. Samanupassatoti paccavekkhato passato. Atītaṃ khaṇattayātikkamena
tika-s0304t:552_1: atikkantaṃ, niruddhappattiyā niruddhaṃ, pakativijahanena vipariṇataṃ. Samanussaratoti
tika-s0304t:552_2: cintayato. Gehassitanti kāmaguṇanissitaṃ. Kāmaguṇā hi idha gehanissitadhammena gehapariyāyena vuttā.
tika-s0304t:553_1: Pubbeti atīte. Etarahīti idāni vattamānā. Sammappaññāya passatoti vipassanāpaññāya
tika-s0304t:553_2: ceva maggapaññāya ca yāthāvato passato. Ussukkāpetunti vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā maggapaṭivedhaṃ
tika-s0304t:553_3: pāpetuṃ. Nibbānaṃ uddissa pavattitattā nekkhammassitasomanassāni nāma. Lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttānanti
tika-s0304t:553_4: kāmaguṇanissitānaṃ. Tadāyatananti taṃ āyatanaṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ arahattaṃ. Anuttaresu
tika-s0304t:554_0: Upekkhāti somanassarahitaaññāṇupekkhā. Bālyayogato bālassa, tato eva mūḷhassa puthujjanassa.
tika-s0304t:554_1: Kilesodhīnaṃ maggodhīhi ajitattā anodhijinassa. Sattamabhavādito uddhaṃ pavattanavipākassa
tika-s0304t:554_2: ajitattā avipākajinassa. Anekādīnave vaṭṭe ādīnavassa ajānanena anādīnavadassāvino.
tika-s0304t:554_3: Paṭipattipaṭivedhabāhusaccābhāvena assutavato puthujjanassa. Rūpaṃ sā nātivattati
tika-s0304t:554_4: na atikkamati ñāṇasampayuttābhāvato. Sabbasaṅgāhakoti sabbadhamme saṅgaṇhanako. Tatiyādīni
tika-s0304t:557_0: 279. Ārammaṇato sampayogato ca kilesāmisena sāmisā. Nirāmisāyāti nissakkavacanaṃ.
tika-s0304t:557_1: Nirāmisatarāvāti ekaṃsavacanaṃ tassā tathā nissametabbatāya. Sā hi pīti sabbaso santakilesāmise
tika-s0304t:557_2: santāne pavattiyā accantasabhāvadhammārammaṇavisayatāya sayampi sātisayaṃ santasabhāvākārena
tika-s0304t:557_3: pavattiyā nirāmisāyapi nirāmisatarā vuttā. Tenāha “nanu cā”tiādi. Idāni tamatthaṃ
tika-s0304t:557_4: upamāya sādhetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādimāha. Appaṭihārikanti paṭiharaṇarahitaṃ appaṭihāraṃ,
tika-s0304t:558_0: Vimokkhavāro pana na atidiṭṭho itarehi visadisattā. Tenāha “vimokkhavāre panā”tiādi.
tika-s0304t:558_1: Rūpapaṭisaṃyuttoti bhāvitarūpapaṭisaṃyutto. Sāmiso nāma yasmā sāmisarūpapaṭibaddhavutti
tika-s0304t:558_2: ceva sāmisarūpapaṭibhāgañca, tasmā “rūpāmisa”nti vuccati, tena rūpāmisena sāmiso
tika-s0304t:558_3: nāma. Arūpāmisassa abhāvato arūpapaṭisaṃyutto vimokkho nirāmiso nāma.
tika-s0304t:567_0: 280-281. Aguṇaṅgehīti aguṇakoṭṭhāsehi. Rūpayatīti rūpaṃ, sarīrarūpaṃ. Sarīrarūpaṃ
tika-s0304t:567_1: pāsaṃsaṃ etassa atthīti rūpavā, tappaṭikkhepena na ca rūpavā, sampannarūpo na hotīti
tika-s0304t:567_2: attho. Ñātikulato aññato vā āgatāya bhogasampadāya abhāvena na bhogasampanno. Dussīloti
tika-s0304t:567_3: nissīlo. Nissīlatāya eva cassā pubbuṭṭhāyitādiācārābhāvo vutto. Ālasiyoti ālasiyatāya
tika-s0304t:567_4: yutto. Pajañcassa na labhatīti pajābhāvasīsena tassā parivārahāni vuttā. Parivattetabbanti
tika-s0304t:570: 282. Āveṇitabbato mariyādāya visuṃ asādhāraṇato passitabbato āveṇikāni. Paṭipacceke puggale niyuttānīti pāṭipuggalikāni. Paricārikabhāvanti upaṭṭhāyikabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0304t:573_1: kiñci adānena ca. Etaṃ “maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vilokento vicarati
tika-s0304t:577: 304. Rūpasampatti rūpabalaṃ taṃsamaṅgino upatthambhakabhāvato. Esa nayo sesesupi. Balāni hi sattānaṃ vuḍḍhiyā upatthambhakapaccayo hoti, yathā taṃ āhāro. Tenāha – “imānī”tiādi.
tika-s0304t:580: 305-313. Abhibhavitvā sabbaṃ antojanaṃ sāmikañca. Nāsentīti nāsanaṃ adassanaṃ nenti nīharantīti attho.
tika-s0304t:587_0: 314. Nibbānaṃ āgammāti ettha āgammāti sabbasaṅkhārehi nibbinnassa visaṅkhāraninnassa
tika-s0304t:587_1: gotrabhunā vivaṭṭitamānasassa maggena sacchikaraṇenāti attho. Sacchikiriyamānañhi
tika-s0304t:587_2: taṃ adhigantvā ārammaṇapaccayabhūtañca paṭicca adhipatipaccayabhūte ca tasmiṃ paramassāsabhāvena
tika-s0304t:587_3: vimuttasaṅkhārassa paramagatibhāvena ca patiṭṭhānabhūte patiṭṭhāya khayasaṅkhāto
tika-s0304t:587_4: maggo rāgādike khepetīti taṃsacchikaraṇābhāve rāgādīnaṃ anuppattinirodhagamanābhāvato
tika-s0304t:588_0: Imināva suttenāti imināva jambukhādakasuttena. Kilesakkhayamattaṃ nibbānanti vadeyya
tika-s0304t:588_2: “kassā”tiādi. Addhā attanoti vakkhati “parassa kilesakkhayena parassa nibbānasampatti
tika-s0304t:588_3: na yuttā”ti. Nibbānārammaṇakaraṇena gotrabhukkhaṇe kilesakkhayappattitā ca āpannāti
tika-s0304t:588_4: āha – “kiṃ pana tesu akhīṇesuyevā”tiādi. Nanu ārammaṇakaraṇamattena kilesakkhayo
tika-s0304t:588_5: anuppattoti na sakkā vattuṃ. Cittañhi atītānāgatādisabbaṃ ālambanaṃ karoti, na nipphannamevāti.
tika-s0304t:588_6: Gotrabhūpi maggena yā kilesānaṃ anuppattidhammatā kātabbā, taṃ ārabbha pavattissatīti?
tika-s0304t:588_7: Na, appattanibbānassa nibbānārammaṇañāṇābhāvato. Na hi aññe dhammā viya nibbānaṃ,
tika-s0304t:588_8: taṃ pana atigambhīrattā appattena ālambituṃ na sakkā, tasmā tena gotrabhunā pattabbena
tika-s0304t:588_10: gotrabhuto puretaraṃ nipphannena kilesakkhayena bhavitabbaṃ. Appattakilesakkhayārammaṇakaraṇe
tika-s0304t:589_0: Tasmātiādi vuttasseva atthassa nigamanaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ nibbānaṃ. Rūpino dhammā arūpino
tika-s0304t:589_1: dhammātiādīsūti ādisaddena lokuttaraanāsavādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Arūpadhammādibhāvaggahaṇena
tika-s0304t:589_2: cassa parinipphannatā dīpitā. Tenāha “na kilesakkhayamattamevā”ti. Kilesakkhayamattatāya
tika-s0304t:589_3: hi sati nibbānassa bahutā āpajjati “yattakā kilesā khīyanti, tattakāni nibbānānī”ti.
tika-s0304t:589_4: Abhāvassabhāvato gambhīrādibhāvo asaṅkhatādibhāvo ca na siyā, vutto ca so nibbānassa,
tika-s0304t:589_5: tasmāssa paccetabbo parinipphannabhāvo. Yasmā ca sammutisaccārammaṇaṃ saṅkhatadhammārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0304t:589_6: vā samucchedavasena kilese pajahituṃ na sakkoti, yato mahaggatañāṇaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ
tika-s0304t:589_7: vā kilesavikkhambhanavasena tadaṅgavasena vā pajahati, tasmā ariyamaggañāṇassa sammutisaccasaṅkhatadhammārammaṇehi
tika-s0304t:589_8: viparītasabhāvena ārammaṇena bhavitabbaṃ. Tathā hi taṃ samucchedavasena kilese pajahīti
tika-s0304t:592_0: 316-328. Pahāya gatattāti ariyamaggena jahitvā ñāṇagamanena gatattā. Suṭṭhu gatāti
tika-s0304t:592_1: sammā gatā paṭipannāti sugatā. Parijānanatthanti tīhi pariññāhi parijānanatthaṃ.
tika-s0304t:592_2: Dukkhasaṅkhātoti “dukkha”nti saṅkhātabbo viditabbo ca dukkhasabhāvo dhammo dukkhadukkhatā.
tika-s0304t:592_3: Yasmā dukkhavedanāvinimuttasaṅkhatadhamme sukhavedanāya ca yathā idha saṅkhāradukkhatā
tika-s0304t:592_4: vipariṇāmadukkhatāti dukkhapariyāyo niruppateva, tasmā dukkhasabhāvo dhammo ekena
tika-s0304t:592_6: vipariṇāmadukkhatāti etasmiṃ padadvaye. Saṅkhārabhāvena dukkhasabhāvo saṅkhāradukkhatā.
tika-s0304t:595: 329. Pabbajjāyāti pabbajitapaṭipattiyaṃ. Dhammānudhammappaṭipanno bhikkhūti dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjamāno bhikkhu. Pātanti pāto. Nacirassanti khippameva. Tenāha “lahuyevā”ti.
tika-s0304t:601: 330-331. Imināva nayenāti yo jambukhādakasaṃyutte atthanayo, imināva nayena. Iminā hi dve saṃyuttāni pāḷito atthato ca aññamaññaṃ sadisānevāti dasseti.
tika-s0304t:607_2: Nīvaraṇānañhettha nidassanamattametaṃ, yadidaṃ kāmaggahaṇaṃ. Pahīnāvasesā cettha
tika-s0304t:607_3: nīvaraṇā veditabbā, tasmā pañcaggahaṇaṃ na kattabbaṃ. Tassāti mahāmoggallānattherassa
tika-s0304t:607_4: santato upaṭṭhahiṃsu aciṇṇavasitāya. Tenāha “hānabhāgiyaṃ nāma ahosī”ti. Ārammaṇa…pe…
tika-s0304t:610_0: 340. Vipassanāsamādhiṃyeva, na phalasamādhiṃ. Chejjakiccaṃ na nipphajjati avicchedavasena
tika-s0304t:610_1: appavattanato. Nikantīti vipassanaṃ assādentī pavattataṇhā. Sādhetuṃ nāsakkhi upakkiliṭṭhattā.
tika-s0304t:610_3: Vuṭṭhāna…pe… samādhinti etena yāva maggo nādhigato, tāva vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanamanuyuñjantopi
tika-s0304t:610_4: yathārahaṃ animittaṃ appaṇihitaṃ suññataṃ cetosamādhiṃ anuyutto viharatīti vattabbataṃ
tika-s0304t:610_6: cittasīsena vipassanāsamādhimāha. Uparimaggaphalasamādhinti paṭhamamaggasamādhissa pageva adhigatattā.
tika-s0304t:613_0: 341-342. Aveccappasādenāti vatthuttayaṃ yāthāvato ñatvā uppannapasādena, maggenāgatapasādenāti
tika-s0304t:613_1: attho. So pana kenaci asaṃhāriyo asampavedhīti āha “acalappasādenā”ti. Abhibhavanti
tika-s0304t:620: 343. Bhogagāmanti bhoguppattigāmaṃ. Pavattatīti appaṭihataṃ hutvā pavattati paṭisambhidappattiyā.
tika-s0304t:623_0: 344. Avisāradattāti pañhaṃ byākātuṃ veyyattiyābhāvena asamatthattā. Upāsako theresu
tika-s0304t:623_1: byākātuṃ asakkontesu sayaṃ byākātukāmo pucchati, na vihesādhippāyo. Paṭhamavacanena
tika-s0304t:623_2: abyākaronte disvāva punappunaṃ pucchitaṃ viheso viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ “vihesetī”ti.
tika-s0304t:626_0: 345. Avantiyāti avantiraṭṭhe, taṃ pana majjhimapadesato dakkhiṇadisāyaṃ. Tenāha “dakkhiṇāpathe”ti.
tika-s0304t:626_1: Adhippāyenāti tassa vacanassa anumodanādhippāyena vadati, na pana tato kiñci gahetukāmatādhippāyena.
tika-s0304t:629_0: 346. Tesaṃ anujānantoti tesaṃ dāsakammakarānaṃ sesake yathāruci vicāraṇaṃ anujānanto.
tika-s0304t:629_1: Kudhitanti balavatā sūriyasantāpena saṅkuthitaṃ. Tenāha “heṭṭhā”tiādi. Atitikhiṇanti
tika-s0304t:629_2: ativiya tikkhadhātukaṃ. Asambhinnapadanti aññattha anāgatattā tipiṭake avomissakapadaṃ,
tika-s0304t:629_3: idheva āgatapadanti attho. Paṭilīyamānenāti paṭikaṃsena visesanena vilīyamānena kāyena.
tika-s0304t:630_0: Ettha cāti etasmiṃ adhiṭṭhāniddhikaraṇe. Abbhamaṇḍapaṃ katvāti samantato chādanavasena
tika-s0304t:630_1: maṇḍapaṃ viya meghapaṭalaṃ uppādetvā. Devoti megho. Ekamekaṃ phusitakaṃ phusāyatu
tika-s0304t:630_2: jālavinaddhaṃ viya vassatu. Evaṃ vuttappakārena nānāparikammaṃ nānādhiṭṭhānaṃ ekato
tika-s0304t:630_3: parikammaṃ ekato adhiṭṭhānanti catukkamettha sambhavatīti dasseti “ettha cā”tiādinā.
tika-s0304t:630_4: Yathā tathāti yathāvuttesu catūsu pakāresu yena vā tena vā pakārena karontassa. Kataparikammassāti
tika-s0304t:630_5: “evaṃ vā evaṃ vā hotū”ti pavattitaparikammacittassa. “Parikammānantarenāti adhiṭṭhānacittuppādanatthaṃ
tika-s0304t:633_0: 347. Elaṃ vuccati doso, taṃ etassa natthīti nelaṃ, taṃ aṅgaṃ etassāti nelaṅgo, suvisuddhasīlaguṇo.
tika-s0304t:633_1: Tenāha “nelaṅganti kho, bhante, sīlānametaṃ adhivacana”nti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana dosābhāvameva
tika-s0304t:633_2: dassetuṃ “nelaṅgoti niddoso”ti vuttaṃ. Etaṃ bhikkhuṃ āgacchantanti mahākappinattheraṃ
tika-s0304t:633_3: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Attano diṭṭhena kathesīti attano sabbaññutaññāṇena paccakkhato upalakkhitena
tika-s0304t:633_4: atthena kathesi. Ayaṃ pana nayaggāhenāti ayaṃ pana gahapati asutvā kevalaṃ nayaggāhena āha.
tika-s0304t:636_0: 348. Nirodhaṃ valañjeti anāgāmibhāvato. Ime saṅkhārāti ime “kāyasaṅkhāro, vacīsaṅkhāro,
tika-s0304t:636_1: cittasaṅkhāro”ti vuccamānā tayo saṅkhārā. Saddatopi, atthatopi aññamaññaṃ missā,
tika-s0304t:636_2: tato eva āluḷitā ākulā, avibhūtā dubbibhāvanā, duddīpanā asaṅkarato dīpetuṃ dukkarā.
tika-s0304t:636_5: saññāvedanāpi “cittasaṅkhāro”ti vuccanti. Tena vuttaṃ “tathā hī”tiādi. Tattha ākaḍḍhitvā
tika-s0304t:636_6: gahaṇaṃ ādānaṃ, sampattassa hatthe karaṇaṃ gahaṇaṃ, gahitassa vissajjanaṃ muñcanaṃ,
tika-s0304t:636_7: phandanaṃ copanaṃ pāpetvā nipphādetvā. Hanusañcopananti kāyaviññattivasena pubbabhāge
tika-s0304t:636_8: hanusañcopanaṃ katvā. Evañhi vacībhedakaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ imetiādi yathāvuttassa atthassa nigamanaṃ.
tika-s0304t:637_0: Padatthaṃ pucchati itarasaṅkhārehi padatthato visesaṃ kathāpessāmīti. Kāyanissitāti
tika-s0304t:637_1: ettha kāyanissitatā ca nesaṃ tabbhāvabhāvitāya veditabbā, na kāyassa nissayapaccayatāvasenāti
tika-s0304t:637_2: dassento “kāye sati honti, asati na hontī”ti āha. Kāyoti cettha karajakāyo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0304t:637_3: Cittanissitāti cittaṃ nissāya taṃ nissayapaccayabhūtaṃ labhitvā uppannā.
tika-s0304t:638_1: eva bhavituṃ yuttaṃ, na itaranti āha – “padadvayena nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattikālo
tika-s0304t:638_2: kathito”ti. Tayidaṃ tassa tathā vattabbatāya vuttaṃ, na pana tassa tathā cittapavattisambhavato.
tika-s0304t:638_3: Samāpannepi eseva nayo. Purimehīti “samāpajjissaṃ samāpajjāmī”ti dvīhi padehi. Pacchimenāti
tika-s0304t:639_0: Bhāvitaṃ hoti uppāditaṃ hoti nirodhasamāpannatthāya. Anupubbasamāpattisamāpajjanasaṅkhātāya
tika-s0304t:639_1: nirodhabhāvanāya taṃ cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hoti. Tenāha “yaṃ ta”ntiādi. Dutiyajjhāneyevāti
tika-s0304t:639_2: dutiyajjhānakkhaṇe nirujjhati. Tattha anuppajjanato anuppādanato heṭṭhā nirodhoti
tika-s0304t:639_3: adhippeto. Catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ tajjā parikammasiddhā yā appavatti, tattha “nirodhasamāpattisaññā”ti,
tika-s0304t:639_4: yā nesaṃ tathā appavatti. Sā “antonirodhe nirujjhatī”ti vuttā.
tika-s0304t:640_0: “Cittasaṅkhāro niruddho”ti vacanato tadaññesaṃ anirodhaṃ icchantānaṃ vādaṃ dassento
tika-s0304t:640_2: taṃ vādaṃ nisedhetuṃ “te vattabbā”tiādimāha. Abhinivesaṃ akatvāti yathāgate byañjanamatte
tika-s0304t:640_3: abhinivesaṃ akatvā. Ācariyānaṃ nayeti ācariyānaṃ paramparāgate dhammanaye dhammanettiyaṃ ṭhatvā.
tika-s0304t:641_2: pavattamāneti attho. Tenāha – “bahiddhārammaṇesu pasāde ghaṭṭentesū”ti. Makkhitāni
tika-s0304t:641_3: viyāti puñchitāni viya honti ghaṭṭanāya vibādhitattā. Etenāyaṃ ghaṭṭanā pañcadvārikaviññāṇānaṃ
tika-s0304t:641_4: vegasā uppajjanāya na ārammaṇanti dasseti. Tenevāha – “antonirodhe pañca pasādā ativiya virocantī”ti.
tika-s0304t:642_0: Tato paraṃ sacittako bhavissāmīti idaṃ atthato āpannaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ – “ettakaṃ
tika-s0304t:642_1: kālaṃ acittako bhavissāmī”ti eteneva tassa atthassa siddhattā. Yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitanti
tika-s0304t:642_2: ettha visuṃ cittassa bhāvanā nāma natthi, addhānaparicchedaṃ pana katvā nirodhasamāpattatthāya
tika-s0304t:643_0: Sā panesā nirodhakathā. Dvīhi balehīti samathavipassanābalehi. Tayo ca saṅkhārānanti
tika-s0304t:643_1: tiṇṇaṃ kāyavacīcittasaṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā. Soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhīti aniccānupassanādīnaṃ
tika-s0304t:643_2: aṭṭhannaṃ anupassanāñāṇānaṃ, aṭṭhannañca maggaphalañāṇānaṃ vasena imāhi soḷasahi
tika-s0304t:643_3: ñāṇappavattīhi. Navahi samādhicariyāhīti aṭṭha samāpattiyo aṭṭha samādhicariyā, tāsaṃ
tika-s0304t:643_4: upacārasamādhi samādhibhāvasāmaññena ekā samādhicariyāti evaṃ navahi samādhicariyāhi.
tika-s0304t:643_5: Vasībhāvatāpaññāti vasībhāvatāsaṅkhātā paññā. Sabbākārena visuddhimagge kathitā,
tika-s0304t:643_6: te tāva ākārā tiṭṭhantu, sarūpamattassa panassa vattabbanti āha – “ko panāyaṃ nirodho
tika-s0304t:643_7: nāmā”ti. Yadi khandhānaṃ appavatti, atha kimatthametaṃ jhānasukhādiṃ viya samāpajjantīti
tika-s0304t:644_1: vuttattā āha “kiṃ pana…pe… na samuṭṭhāpetī”ti. Samuṭṭhāpeti rūpasamuppādakattā. Imassāti
tika-s0304t:644_2: nirodhaṃ samāpannabhikkhuno. Sā na samuṭṭhāpetīti sā catutthajjhānikā phalasamāpatti
tika-s0304t:644_3: na samuṭṭhāpeti assāsapassāse. Phalasamāpattiyā catutthajjhānikabhāvo kathaṃ nicchitoti
tika-s0304t:644_4: āha – “kiṃ vā etenā”tiādi. Vakkhamānākārenapi parihāro hotīti. Santasamāpattitoti
tika-s0304t:644_5: nirodhasamāpattimeva sandhāya vadati. Abbohārikā honti atisukhumasabhāvattā, sañjīvattherassa
tika-s0304t:644_6: pubbe samāpattikkhaṇe assāsapassāsā abbohārikabhāvaṃ gacchanti. Tena vuttaṃ “bhavaṅgasamayenevetaṃ kathita”nti.
tika-s0304t:645_0: Kiriyamaya …pe… uppajjatīti kasmā vuttaṃ? Nanu bhavaṅguppattikālampi vitakkavicārā
tika-s0304t:645_1: uppajjantevāti? Kiñcāpi uppajjanti, vacīsaṅkhāralakkhaṇappattā pana na hontīti imamatthaṃ
tika-s0304t:646_0: Suññato phassotiādayo saguṇenapi ārammaṇenāti ārammaṇabhūtametaṃ. Suññatā nāma phalasamāpatti
tika-s0304t:646_1: niccasukhaattasabhāvato suññattā. “Suññato phasso”ti vuttaṃ vuttanayena suññasabhāvattā.
tika-s0304t:646_2: Animittā nāma phalasamāpatti rāganimittādīnaṃ abhāvato. Appaṇihitā nāma phalasamāpatti
tika-s0304t:646_4: nayo”ti. Rāganimittādīnanti ettha ādi-saddena saṅkhāranimittassapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0304t:646_5: Yadaggena phalasamāpattisamphasso suññato nāma, tadaggena phalasamāpattipi suññatā
tika-s0304t:646_6: nāma, phassasīsena pana desanā āgatāti tathā vuttaṃ. Animittappaṇihitesupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0304t:647_0: Āgamanaṃ ettha, etāyāti vā āgamanikā, sā eva āgamaniyā ka-kārassa ya-kāraṃ katvā.
tika-s0304t:647_1: Vuṭṭhāti nimittato maggassa uppādanena. Animittā nāma niccanimittassa ugghāṭanato.
tika-s0304t:647_2: Ettha ca vuṭṭhānameva pamāṇaṃ, na pariggahadassanāni. Appaṇihitā nāma sukhapaṇidhiyā
tika-s0304t:647_3: paṭipakkhato. Suññatā nāma attadiṭṭhiyā ujupaṭipakkhattā sattasuññatāya sudiṭṭhattā.
tika-s0304t:647_4: Maggo animitto nāma vipassanāgamanato. Phalaṃ animittaṃ nāma maggāgamanato. Vikappo
tika-s0304t:647_5: āpajjeyya āgamanassa vavatthānassa abhāvena, vipassanāya animittādināmalābho avavatthitoti
tika-s0304t:647_6: adhippāyo. Tena vuttaṃ “tasmā”tiādi. Yasmā pana sā maggavuṭṭhānakāle evarūpāpi hotīti
tika-s0304t:647_7: tassa vasena maggaphalānaṃ viya phassassapi pavattirūpattā yathāvutto vikappo anavasaroti
tika-s0304t:647_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tayo phassā phusantīti puggalabhedavasena vuttaṃ. Na hi ekaṃyeva puggalaṃ
tika-s0304t:647_9: etasmiṃ khaṇe tayo phassā phusanti. “Tividho phasso phusatī”ti vā bhavitabbaṃ. Yasmā
tika-s0304t:647_10: pana “nirodhaphalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhitassā”tiādi yassa yathāvuttā tayo eva phassā
tika-s0304t:647_11: sambhavanti, tassa anavasesaggahaṇavaseneva vuttaṃ “tayo phassā phusantī”ti.
tika-s0304t:648_0: Nibbānaṃ viveko nāma sabbasaṅkhāravivittabhāvato. Tasmiṃ viveke ekanteneva ninnapoṇattā
tika-s0304t:648_1: eva hi te paṭippassaddhasabbussukkā uttamapurisā catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ appavattiṃ anavasesaggahaṇalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0304t:651_1: nānāti ānetvā yojanā. Pharaṇaappamāṇatāya “appamāṇā cetovimuttī”ti laddhanāmaṃ brahmavihārajjhānanti
tika-s0304t:651_3: Vipassanāti aniccānupassanā, sabbāpi vā. Pamāṇakaraṇo nāma yassa sayaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0304t:652_0: Pharaṇaappamāṇatāyāti pharaṇavasena appamāṇagocaratāya. Nibbānampi appamāṇameva pamāṇagocarānaṃ
tika-s0304t:652_1: kilesānaṃ ārammaṇabhāvassapi anāgamanato. Khalanti khale pasāritasālisīsādibhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-s0304t:652_2: Kiñcehīti maddassu. Tenāha “maddanaṭṭho”ti. Ārammaṇabhūtaṃ, palibuddhakaṃ vā natthi
tika-s0304t:653: Rūpanimittassāti kasiṇarūpanimittassa. Na gahitāti sarūpato na gahitā, atthato pana gahitā eva. Tenāha – “sā suññā rāgenātiādivacanato sabbattha anupavitthāvā”ti.
tika-s0304t:654_0: Nānāti saddavasena. Ekatthāti ārammaṇavasena ārammaṇabhāvena ekasabhāvā. Tenāha “appamāṇaṃ…pe…
tika-s0304t:654_1: ekatthā”ti. Ārammaṇavasenāti ārammaṇassa vasena. Cattāro hi maggā, cattāri phalāni
tika-s0304t:654_2: ārammaṇavasena nibbānapaviṭṭhatāya ekatthā ekārammaṇā. Aññasmiṃ pana ṭhāneti idaṃ
tika-s0304t:654_3: visuṃ visuṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ appamāṇādi pariyāyavuttaṃ, nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattanato.
tika-s0304t:654_4: Tasmā “aññasmi”nti idaṃ tena tena pariyāyena tattha tattha āgatabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t:657_1: Tenāha “anāgāmī”tiādi. Naggabhogganti avasanabhāvena naggaṃ, kuṭilajjhāsayatāya bhoggaṃ,
tika-s0304t:657_2: tato eva nissirikaṃ. Naggatāya hi so rūpena nissiriko, bhoggatāya cittena. Bhagavato
tika-s0304t:657_3: saddhāyāti bhagavati saddhāya. Tasmiṃ saddahanā okappanā tassa saddhātipi vattabbataṃ
tika-s0304t:657_4: labhati. Gacchāmīti āgacchāmi, bujjhāmīti attho. Etaṃ nigaṇṭhena pucchitamatthamāha.
tika-s0304t:658_0: Kāyaṃ unnāmetvāti kāyaṃ abbhunnāmetvā. Kucchiṃ nīharitvāti piṭṭhiyā ninnamanena kucchiṃ
tika-s0304t:658_1: purato nīharitvā. Gīvaṃ pasāraṇavasena paggayha paggahetvā sabbaṃ disaṃ pekkhamāno.
tika-s0304t:658_2: Sabbamidaṃ nigaṇṭhassa pahaṭṭhākāradassanatthaṃ “idāni samaṇassa gotamassa upari
tika-s0304t:658_3: vādaṃ āropetuṃ labbhatī”ti. Tenāha “vātaṃ vā so”tiādi. Sakāraṇāti yuttisahitā. Pañhamaggoti
tika-s0304t:658_4: pañhasaṅkhāto vīmaṃsā, evaṃ bhavitabbanti citteneva parivīmaṃsā pañhā. Eko uddesoti
tika-s0304t:658_5: ekaṃ uddisanaṃ atthassa saṃkhittavacanaṃ. Veyyākaraṇanti niddisanaṃ atthassa vicāretvā
tika-s0304t:658_6: kathanaṃ. Evanti iminā nayena. Sabbatthāti sabbesu pañhuddesaveyyākaraṇesu attho
tika-s0304t:661_0: 351. Alaṃ samattho ariyabhāvāyāti alamariyo. Ñeyyajānanaṭṭhena ñāṇameva paccakkhato
tika-s0304t:661_1: dassanaṭṭhena ñāṇadassanaṃ, soyeva atisayaṭṭhena ñāṇadassanaviseso. Pāvaḷā vuccati
tika-s0304t:661_2: ānisadapadeso, taṃ pāvaḷaṃ rajoharaṇatthaṃ nipphoṭīyati etāyāti pāvaḷanipphoṭanā, morapiñchavatti.
tika-s0304t:664_0: 352. Mattarājā nāma eko bhummadevo bhūtādhipati surāpotalarukkhanivāsī. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0304t:664_2: rukkhesu cā”ti āha. Patthanāvasena cittaṃ ṭhapehi. Samijjhissatīti yathādhippāyaṃ
tika-s0304t:664_3: samijjhissati. Tena hīti yasmā taṃ devāpi āsannamaraṇaṃ maññanti, tasmā sā varameva
tika-s0304t:664_4: bhavissati, taṃ tumhākaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0304t:671: 353. “Yena midhekacco caṇḍo caṇḍotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti evaṃ pañhapucchanena dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi caṇḍoti gahitanāmo. Pākaṭaṃ karotīti dasseti attano caṇḍabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0304t:674_0: 354. Vāloti vuccati tālo, tassa tālapuṭaṃ nāma. Yathā āmalakīphalasamānakaṃ, so pana
tika-s0304t:674_1: tālasadisamukhavaṇṇattā tālapuṭoti evaṃnāmako. Tenāha “tassa kirā”tiādi. Abhinīhārasampanno
tika-s0304t:674_2: anekesu kappesu sambhatasāvakabodhisambhāro. Tathā hesa asītiyā mahāsāvakesu abbhantaro
tika-s0304t:674_3: jāto. Sahassaṃ denti naccaṃ passitukāmā. Samajjavesanti nepaccavesaṃ. Kīḷaṃ katvāti
tika-s0304t:675_0: Pubbe tathāpavattavuttantadassane saccena, tabbipariyāye alikena. Rāgapaccayāti rāguppattiyā
tika-s0304t:675_1: kāraṇabhūtā. Mukhato…pe… dassanādayoti ādi-saddena mukhato aggijālanikkhamadassanādike
tika-s0304t:675_2: saṅgaṇhāti. Aññe ca…pe… abhinayāti kāmassādasaṃyuttānaṃ siṅgārahassaabbhutarasānañceva
tika-s0304t:675_3: “aññe cā”ti vuttasantabībhaccharasānañca dassanakā abhinayā. Dosapaccayāti dosuppattiyā
tika-s0304t:675_5: dassanakā abhinayā. Mohapaccayāti mohuppattiyā kāraṇabhūtā. Evamādayoti ādi-saddena
tika-s0304t:675_6: saṅgahitānaṃ karuṇāsantabhayānakarasānaṃ dassanakā abhinayā. Te hi rase sandhāya
tika-s0304t:675_7: pāḷiyaṃ “ye dhammā rajanīyā, ye dhammā dosanīyā, ye dhammā mohanīyā”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t:676_0: Naṭavesaṃ gahetvāva paccanti kammasarikkhavipākavasena. Taṃ sandhāyāti taṃ yathāvuttaṃ
tika-s0304t:676_1: niraye paccanaṃ sandhāya. Etaṃ “pahāso nāma nirayo, tattha upapajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t:676_2: Yathā loke atthavisesavasena sakammakānipi padāni akammakāni bhavanti “vimuccati
tika-s0304t:676_3: puriso”ti, evaṃ idha atthavisesavasena akammakaṃ sakammakaṃ katvā vuttaṃ – “nāhaṃ,
tika-s0304t:676_4: bhante, etaṃ rodāmī”ti. Ko pana so atthaviseso? Asahanaṃ akkhamanaṃ, tasmā na rodāmi
tika-s0304t:676_5: na sahāmi, na akkhamāmīti attho. Rodanakāraṇañhi asahanto tena abhibhūto rodati.
tika-s0304t:676_7: vuttaṃ. Mataṃ vā, amma, rodantīti etthāpi mataṃ rodanti, tassa maraṇaṃ na sahanti,
tika-s0304t:679_0: 355-357. Yujjhanaṃ yodho, so ājīvo etassāti yodhājīvo. Tenāha – “yuddhena jīvikaṃ
tika-s0304t:679_1: kappanako”ti, ussāhaṃ vāyāmaṃ karotīti yujjhanavasena ussāhaṃ vāyāmaṃ karoti. Pariyāpādentīti
tika-s0304t:679_2: maraṇapariyantikaṃ āpadaṃ pāpenti. Tenāha “maraṇaṃ paṭipajjāpentī”ti. Duṭṭhu ṭhapitanti
tika-s0304t:679_3: duṭṭhākārena attano paresañca atthāvahabhāvaṃ na gataṃ paṭipannaṃ. Parehi saṅgāme
tika-s0304t:679_4: jitā hatā ettha jāyantīti parajito nāma nirayo. Asidhanugadāyasaṅkucakkāni pañcāvudhāni.
tika-s0304t:679_5: Taṃ sandhāyāti taṃ yodhājīvaṃ puggalaṃ sandhāya. Etaṃ “yo so”tiādi vuttaṃ. Catutthapañcamesūti
tika-s0304t:679_6: hatthārohaassārohasuttesu. Eseva nayoti eso tatiye vutto eva atthato visesābhāvato.
tika-s0304t:682_1: udakasuddhikabhāvaṃ jānanatthañceva lokassa ca udakena suddhi hotīti imassa atthassa
tika-s0304t:682_2: jānanatthañca. Upari yāpentīti upari brahmalokaṃ yāpenti. Sammā ñāpentīti sammā ujukaṃyeva
tika-s0304t:682_3: saggaṃ lokaṃ gamenti. Tenāha – “saggaṃ nāma okkāmentī”ti, avakkāmenti ogāhāpentīti
tika-s0304t:685_0: 359. Thaddhanti kathinaṃ lūkhaṃ. Ūsaranti ūsajātaṃ. Catūhipi oghehi anabhibhavanīyatāya
tika-s0304t:685_1: ahaṃ dīpo. Sabbaparissayehi anabhibhavanīyatāya ahaṃ leṇo. Sabbadukkhaparittāsanato
tika-s0304t:685_2: tāyanaṭṭhena ahaṃ tāṇaṃ. Sabbabhayahiṃsanato ahaṃ saraṇanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0304t:686_0: Udakamaṇikoti mahantaṃ udakabhājanaṃ. Bahi vissandanavasena udakaṃ na haratīti ahārī,
tika-s0304t:686_1: parito na paggharatīti aparihārī. Sakkaccameva desenti saddhammagāravassa sabbasattesu
tika-s0304t:686_2: mahākaruṇāya ca buddhānaṃ samānarasattā. Catasso pana parisā satthugāravena attano
tika-s0304t:686_3: ca saddhāsampannatāya saddahitvā okappetvā suṇanti, tasmā tā desanāphalena yujjanti.
tika-s0304t:686_4: Kiccasiddhiyā satthu desanā tattha sakkaccadesanā nāma jātā.
tika-s0304t:689_0: 360. “Yo koci puriso pāṇātipātī musāvādī, sabbo so āpāyiko”ti vatvā puna “yaṃbahulaṃ
tika-s0304t:689_1: yaṃbahulaṃ karoti, tena duggatiṃ gacchatī”ti vadanto attanāva attano vādaṃ bhindati.
tika-s0304t:689_2: Evaṃ santeti yadi bahuso katena pāpakammena āpāyiko, “yo koci pāṇamatipātetī”tiādivacanaṃ
tika-s0304t:689_3: micchāti. Cattāri padānīti “yo koci pāṇamatipātetī”tiādinā nayena vuttā cattāro atthakoṭṭhāsā.
tika-s0304t:689_4: Diṭṭhiyā paccayā honti “atthi kho pana mayā”tiādinā ayoniso ummujjantassa. Balasampannoti
tika-s0304t:689_5: samattho. Saṅkhadhamakoti saṅkhassa dhamanakicce cheko. Adukkhenāti sukhena. Upacāropi
tika-s0304t:689_6: appanāpi vaṭṭati ubhinnaṃ sāmaññavacanabhāvato. Appamāṇakatabhāvo labbhateva. Tathā
tika-s0304t:689_7: hi taṃ kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanasamatthatāya dīghasantānatāya vipulaphalatāya ca “mahaggata”nti vuccati.
tika-s0304t:690_0: Na ohīyatīti yasmiṃ santāne kāmāvacarakammaṃ, mahaggatakammañca katūpacitaṃ vipākadāne
tika-s0304t:690_1: laddhāvasaraṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ, tesu kāmāvacarakammaṃ itaraṃ nīharitvā sayaṃ tattha ohīyitvā
tika-s0304t:690_2: attano vipākaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti, mahaggatakammameva pana itaraṃ paṭibāhitvā attano
tika-s0304t:690_3: vipākaṃ dātuṃ sakkoti garubhāvato. Tenāha “taṃ kāmāvacarakamma”ntiādi. Kilesavasenāti
tika-s0304t:690_5: Kilesavasenāti vā kammakilesavasena. Vuttañhetaṃ – “pāṇātipāto kho, gahapatiputta,
tika-s0304t:693_0: 361. Evaṃ pavattaīhitikāti evaṃ dvidhā pavattaīhitikā. Dvīhitikā dukkarajīvikapayogā.
tika-s0304t:693_1: Salākamattaṃ vuttaṃ etthāti salākā vuttā, purimapade uttarapadalopo. Ubhatokoṭikanti
tika-s0304t:693_2: yadi “kulānudayaṃ na vaṇṇemī”ti vadati, “bhūtā nikkaruṇā samaṇa tumhe”ti vādaṃ āropehi.
tika-s0304t:693_3: Atha sabbadāpi “kulānudayaṃ vaṇṇemī”ti vadati. Evaṃ sante “kasmā evaṃ dubbhikkhe
tika-s0304t:693_4: kāle mahatiyā parisāya parivuto janapadacārikaṃ carantā kulūpacchedāya paṭipajjathā”ti
tika-s0304t:693_5: evaṃ ubhatokoṭikaṃ vādaṃ āropehīti gāmaṇiṃ uyyojesi.
tika-s0304t:694_0: Dve anteti ubho koṭiyo. Bahi nīharitunti na vaṇṇemi vaṇṇemīti dve ante mocento taṃ
tika-s0304t:694_1: pucchitamatthaṃ bahi nīharati nāma. Tattha dosaṃ datvā codento taṃ apucchaṃ karonto
tika-s0304t:695_0: Ito so gāmaṇītiādi attano bhikkhūnaṃ aññesañca atthakāmānaṃ bhikkhappadānena aniṭṭhappattiabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0304t:695_1: āraddhaṃ. Dānena sambhūtānīti dānamayena puññakiriyavatthunā sammadeva bhūtiṃ vaḍḍhiṃ
tika-s0304t:695_2: pattāni. Saccena ariyavohārena sammadeva bhūtāni uppannāni saccasambhūtānīti āha
tika-s0304t:695_3: “saccaṃ nāma saccavāditā”ti. Sesasīlanti aṭṭhavidhaariyavohārato aññasīlaṃ. Nihitanti
tika-s0304t:695_4: tasmiṃ kule pubbapurisehi nidhānabhāvena nihitaṃ. Duppayuttāti kasivāṇijjādivasena
tika-s0304t:695_5: duṭṭhu payuttā kammantā. Vipajjantīti nassanti. Kulaṅgāroti kulassa aṅgārasadiso
tika-s0304t:695_6: vināsakapuggalo. Aniccatāti maraṇaṃ. Tasmiṃ kule padhānapurisānaṃ bhogānaṃ vā sabbaso
tika-s0304t:698: 362. Taṃ parisanti taṃ rājantepure nisinnaṃ rājaparisaṃ. Nayaggāheti kutocipi asutvā kevalaṃ attano eva matiyā nayaggahaṇe ṭhatvā.
tika-s0304t:699_0: Kāretuṃ vaṭṭati sati sambhave paṭisaṅkhārassa, senāsanavināso na ajjhupekkhitabboti
tika-s0304t:699_1: adhippāyo. Attano ettha kiccāvasāne yaṃ gihīnaṃyeva santakaṃ tāvakālikaṃ, taṃ gihivikatanti
tika-s0304t:702_0: 363. Evaṃnāmaketi mallā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā, nesaṃ nivāsatāya “mallā”icceva
tika-s0304t:702_1: bahuvacanavasena laddhanāmattā evaṃnāmake janapade. Natthi etassa pattiyā kālantarasaññito
tika-s0304t:702_2: kāloti akālo, so eva akāliko. Tenāha – “kālaṃ anatikkamitvā pattenā”ti. So pana “yaṃkiñci
tika-s0304t:702_3: dukkhaṃ uppajjamānaṃ uppajjati, sabbaṃ taṃ chandamūlaka”nti evaṃ vutto dukkhassa
tika-s0304t:702_4: chandamūlabhāvo, evaṃ chandamūlakassa dukkhassa kathitattā “imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭadukkhaṃ kathita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t:705_0: 364. Rāsiṃ katvā mārapāsavasena, tatrāpi antarabhedena vibhajitvā pucchitabbapañhe
tika-s0304t:705_1: ekato rāsiṃ katvā. Tapanaṃ attaparitāpanaṃ tapo, so etassa atthīti tapassī, taṃ tapassiṃ.
tika-s0304t:705_2: So pana taṃ tapaṃ nissāya ṭhito nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “tapanissitaka”nti. So pana anekākārabhedena
tika-s0304t:705_3: lūkhaṃ pharusaṃ jīvanasīlattā lūkhajīvī nāma. Tenāha “lūkhajīvika”nti. Majjhimāya
tika-s0304t:705_4: paṭipattiyā uppathabhāvena avaniyā gandhabbāti antā, tato eva lāmakattā antā. Lāmakampi
tika-s0304t:705_5: “anto”ti vuccati “antamidaṃ, bhikkhave, jīvikānaṃ, eko anto”ti evamādīsu. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0304t:705_6: pana aññamaññaādhārabhāvaṃ urīkatvā “koṭṭhāsā”ti vuttaṃ. Hīno gāmoti pāḷi. Gāma-saddo
tika-s0304t:705_7: hīnapariyāyoti adhippāyenāha “gāmmo”ti. Gāme bhavoti gāmmo. Gāma-saddo cettha gāmavāsivisayo
tika-s0304t:705_8: “gāmo āgato”tiādīsu viya. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “gāmavāsīnaṃ dhammo”ti vuttaṃ, tesaṃ
tika-s0304t:705_9: cārittanti attho. Atta-saddo idha sarīrapariyāyo “attantapo”tiādīsu viyāti āha “sarīradukkhakaraṇanti attho”ti.
tika-s0304t:706_1: Attakilamathānuyogo tāva gayhatu idamatthitāyāti adhippāyo. Kāmabhogītapanissitakanijjaravatthūnaṃ
tika-s0304t:706_2: dassane yathādhippetassa atthassa vibhajitvā kathanaṃ sambhavatīti te dassetvā adhippetattho kathito.
tika-s0304t:707_1: ca pasaṃsatī”ti vutto attho, tamatthaṃ pakāsento. Sāhasikakammenāti ayuttena kammena.
tika-s0304t:707_2: Dhammena ca adhammena cāti dhammikena adhammikena ca. Ayoniso pavattaṃ bāhirakaṃ
tika-s0304t:707_3: sandhāya codako “katha”ntiādimāha. Itaro nayidaṃ tādisaṃ attaparitāpanaṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-s0304t:707_4: atha kho yoniso pavattaṃ sāsanikamevāti dassento “caturaṅgavīriyavasena cā”ti āha.
tika-s0304t:707_5: Tattha “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatū”tiādinā nayena vuttā sarīrenirapekkhavipassanāya
tika-s0304t:707_6: ussukkāpanavasena pavattā vīriyabhāvanā “caturaṅgavīriyavasenā”ti vuttā. Tathā abbhokāsikanesajjikatapādinissitāva
tika-s0304t:707_7: kilesanimmathanayogyā vīriyabhāvanā “dhutaṅgavasena cā”ti vuttāti. Ariyamaggena nissesakilesānaṃ
tika-s0304t:707_8: pajahanā nijjarā. Sā ca attapaccakkhatāya sandiṭṭhikā tiṇṇaṃ mūlakilesānaṃ pajahanena
tika-s0304t:710_0: 365. “Māyañcāhaṃ pajānāmī”ti vacanaṃ kāmaṃ tesaṃ māyāvībhāvadassanaparaṃ, bhagavato
tika-s0304t:710_1: pana māyāsāṭheyyādikassa sabbassa pāpadhammassa bodhimūle eva setughāto, tasmā sabbaso
tika-s0304t:710_2: pahīnamāyo, sabbaññutāya māyaṃ aññe ca ñeyye sabbaso jānāti. Tena vuttaṃ “māyañcāhaṃ,
tika-s0304t:710_3: gāmaṇi, pajānāmī”tiādi. Māyañca pajānāmīti na kevalamahaṃ māyaṃ eva jānāmi, atha
tika-s0304t:711_0: Itthikāmehīti itthīhi ceva tadaññakāmehi ca. Ekasmiṃ ṭhāneti ekasmiṃ padese. Ekekasseva
tika-s0304t:711_1: āgantukassa gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā. Sattianurūpenāti vibhavasattianurūpena.
tika-s0304t:711_2: Balānurūpenāti parivārabalānurūpena. Sattianurūpenāti vā saddhāsattianurūpena. Balānurūpenāti
tika-s0304t:711_3: vibhavabalānurūpena. Dhammesu samādhi dasakusaladhammesu samādhānaṃ. Aggahitacittatā
tika-s0304t:711_4: pariyuṭṭhakāritā. Tena lokiyasīlavisuddhi diṭṭhivisuddhi ca vuttā. Tathā cāha – “ko
tika-s0304t:711_5: cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ, sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ diṭṭhi ca ujukā”ti. Tattha patiṭṭhitassa
tika-s0304t:711_6: upari kattabbaṃ dassetuṃ “dhammasamādhismiṃ ṭhito”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ paṭipadāti tassa
tika-s0304t:711_7: kammaphalavādino satthu vacanaṃ sabbesañca ayaṃ mayhaṃ sīlasaṃvarabrahmavihārabhāvanāsaṅkhātāpaṭipadā
tika-s0304t:711_8: anaparādhakatāya eva saṃvattati. Jayaggāhoti ubhayathāpi mayhaṃ kāci jāni natthi.
tika-s0304t:712_0: Pañca dhammā dhammasamādhi nāma, vipassanāmaggaphaladhammamattaṃ vā. Tatiyavikappe
tika-s0304t:712_1: sīlādivisuddhiyā saddhiṃ brahmavihārā yathāvuttatividhadhammāvahattā eva dhammasamādhi
tika-s0304t:712_2: nāma. Pūrentassa uppannā cittekaggatāti vuttakhaṇikacittekaggatā. Sāpi cittassa samādhānato
tika-s0304t:712_3: “cittasamādhī”ti vuttā, tassa paṭipakkhaṃ vikkhambhantī samucchindantī ca hutvā pavattā
tika-s0304t:720_0: 366-376. Asaṅkhatanti na saṅkhataṃ hetupaccayeti. Tenāha “akata”nti. Hitaṃ esantenāti
tika-s0304t:720_1: mettāyantena. Anukampamānenāti karuṇāyantena. Upādāyāti ādiyitvāti ayamatthotiāha
tika-s0304t:720_3: sāvakā viya garuko bhagavā. Dāyajjaṃ attano adhiṭṭhitaṃ niyyāteti.
tika-s0304t:721_0: Bhikkhāsampattikālādīnaṃ sattannaṃ sappāyānaṃ sampattiyā labbhanakāle. Vipattikāle
tika-s0304t:721_1: pana ettha vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo. Bhāriyanti dukkhabahulatāya dāruṇaṃ.
tika-s0304t:721_2: Amhākaṃ santikā laddhabbā. Tumhākaṃ anusāsanīti tumhākaṃ dātabbā anusāsanī.
tika-s0304t:725_0: 377-409. Tattha ca natthi ettha taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ nataṃ, natthi etasmiṃ vā adhigate
tika-s0304t:725_1: puggalabhāvoti anataṃ. Anāsavanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Saccadhammatāya saccaṃ. Vaṭṭadukkhato
tika-s0304t:725_2: pārametīti pāraṃ. Saṇhaṭṭhenāti sukhumaṭṭhena nipuṇaṃ. Tato eva duddasatāya. Ajajjaraṃ
tika-s0304t:725_3: niccasabhāvattā. Natthi etassa nidassananti vā anidassanaṃ. Etasmiṃ adhigate natthi
tika-s0304t:726: Etasmiṃ adhigate puggalassa maraṇaṃ natthīti vā amataṃ. Atappakaṭṭhena vā paṇītaṃ. Sukhahetutāya vā sivaṃ. Taṇhā khīyanti etthāti taṇhakkhayaṃ.
tika-s0304t:727_0: Aññassa tādisassa abhāvato vimhāpanīyatāya abhūtamevāti. Kutoci paccayato anibbattameva
tika-s0304t:727_1: hutvā bhūtaṃ vijjamānaṃ. Tenāha “ajātaṃ hutvā atthī”ti. Natthi ettha dukkhanti niddukkhaṃ,
tika-s0304t:727_2: tassa bhāvo niddukkhattaṃ. Tasmā anītikaṃ ītirahitaṃ. Vānaṃ vuccati taṇhā, tadabhāvena
tika-s0304t:727_3: nibbānaṃ. Byābajjhaṃ vuccati dukkhaṃ, tadabhāvena abyābajjhaṃ. Paramatthato saccato
tika-s0304t:727_4: suddhibhāvena. Kāmā eva puthujjanehi allīyitabbato ālayā. Esa nayo sesesupi. Patiṭṭhaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0304t:727_5: patiṭṭhābhāvena vaṭṭadukkhato muccitukāmānaṃ dīpasadisaṃ oghehi anajjhottharaṇīyattā.
tika-s0304t:727_7: Bhayasaraṇaṭṭhenāti bhayassa hiṃsanaṭṭhena. Seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ. Gatīti gandhabbaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0304t:734_0: 410. Bimbisārassa upāsikāti bimbisārassa orodhabhūtā upāsikā. Paṇḍiccaṃ sikkhitabhāvena.
tika-s0304t:734_1: Veyyattiyaṃ visāradabhāvena. Visāradā nāma tihetukapaṭisandhisiddhasābhāvikapaññā, tāya samannāgatā.
tika-s0304t:735_0: Acchiddakagaṇanāya kusaloti navantagaṇanāya kusalo. Aṅgulimuddāya gaṇanāya kusaloti
tika-s0304t:735_1: aṅgulikāya eva gaṇanāya kusalo seyyathāpi pādasikā. Piṇḍagaṇanāyāti saṅkalanapaṭuppannakārino
tika-s0304t:735_2: piṇḍavasena gaṇanā. Tathāgatoti khīṇāsavo, tathāgataṃ sandhāya pucchatīti khīṇāsavoti
tika-s0304t:735_3: cassa arahattaphalavasibhāvitakhandhe upādāya ayaṃ paññatti hoti. Tesu khandhesu
tika-s0304t:735_4: sati khīṇāsavā sattasaṅkhātā hontīti vohārena paññapetuṃ sakkā bhaveyya, asantesu
tika-s0304t:735_5: na sakkā, tasmā paraṃ maraṇāti vuttattā tesaṃ abhāvā “abyākatameta”nti vuttaṃ. Yadi
tika-s0304t:735_6: evaṃ tesaṃ abhāvato “na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti puṭṭhāya “āmā”ti paṭijānitabbā
tika-s0304t:735_7: siyā, taṃ pana sattasaṅkhātassa pucchitattā na paṭiññātanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yena rūpenāti
tika-s0304t:735_8: sattatathāgate vuttarūpaṃ sabbaññutathāgate paṭikkhipituṃ “taṃ rūpa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0304t:735_9: Yaṃ upādāyāti yaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ upādāya. Tadabhāvenāti tassa khandhapañcakassa
tika-s0304t:735_10: abhāvena. Tassā paññattiyāti sattapaññattiyā abhāvaṃ. Niruddhaṃ na nidasseti.
tika-s0304t:736: Khemāya theriyā vuttaṃ paṭhamaṃ suttaṃ bhagavato seṭṭhatthadīpanato aggapadāvacaraṃva hotīti vuttaṃ “aggapadasmi”nti.
tika-s0304t:741: 412-417. Rūpamattanti ettha matta-saddo visesanivattiattho. Ko pana so visesoti? Yo bāhiraparikappito idha tathāgatoti vuccamāno attā. Anupalabbhiyasabhāvoti anupalabbhiyattā.
tika-s0304t:744_0: 418. Nānāvidhanti taṃtaṃdiṭṭhivādapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ aññampi vā nānāvidhaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ.
tika-s0304t:744_1: Bahūnaṃ kutūhaluppattiṭṭhānatoti yojanā. Yāva ābhassarabrahmalokā gacchatīti agginā
tika-s0304t:744_2: kappavuṭṭhānakāle gacchati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Imañca kāyanti imaṃ rūpakāyaṃ. Cuticittena
tika-s0304t:744_3: nikkhipatīti cuticittena bhijjamānena nikkhipati. Cuticittassa hi oraṃ sattarasamassa
tika-s0304t:744_4: cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ kammajarūpaṃ cuticittena saddhiṃ nirujjhati, tato
tika-s0304t:744_5: paraṃ kammajarūpaṃ na uppajjati. Yadi uppajjeyya, maraṇaṃ na siyā, cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ
tika-s0304t:744_6: na samuṭṭhāpeti, āhārajassa ca asambhavo eva, utujaṃ pana vattateva. Yasmā paṭisandhikkhaṇe
tika-s0304t:744_7: satto aññataraṇāya upapajjati nāma, cutikkhaṇe paṭisandhicittaṃ aladdhaṃ aññataraṇāya,
tika-s0304t:747_0: 419. Tesaṃ laddhiyāti tesaṃ sassatavādānaṃ laddhiyā saddhiṃ etaṃ “atthattā”ti vacanaṃ
tika-s0304t:747_1: ekaṃ abhavissa. Tato eva anulomaṃ taṃ nābhavissa ñāṇassāti asāraṃ etanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0304t:747_2: Api nu metassāti me etassa anattāti vipassanāñāṇassa anulomaṃ api nu abhavissa, vilomakameva tassa siyāti attho.
tika-s0304t:750_0: 420. Yassapa’ssāti pāṭhassa ayaṃ piṇḍattho “āvuso”tiādi. Tatthāyaṃ sambandho – āvuso,
tika-s0304t:750_1: yassapi puggalassa tīṇi vassāni vuṭṭho, ettakena kālena “hetumhi sati rūpītiādipaññāpanā
tika-s0304t:750_2: hoti, asati na hotī”ti ettakaṃ byākaraṇaṃ bhaveyya, tassa puggalassa ettakameva bahu,
tika-s0304t:750_3: ko pana vādo atikkante! Ito atikkante dhammadesanānaye vādoyeva vattabbameva natthīti
tika-s0304t:750_4: therassa pañhabyākaraṇaṃ sutvā paribbājako pītisomanassaṃ pavedesi.
